Summary: This hotel gets a Very Good, Based on it's location of being on the grounds of Knott's Berry Farm, No parking issues, just walk right over and back. Otherwise, it is your basic overpriced tourist hotel, with outdated rooms.NO "WOW" factor at this property, which it should have at the prices they charge. In all fairness they are planning renovations, but at the time of our visit the rooms were very outdated. Staff were all friendly & helpful and the rooms and property were clean as they should be. We would stay here again just for the convenience factor/location. There is a 7/11 on the corner, a short walk from the Hotel Lobby which can and will save you tons of money on coffee and snacks, etc... You are also a very short car ride away from a Wall-Mart, as well as all the Fast

We came for a little family getaway. We used the ticket package. What a wonderful experience. The hotel was pretty and had clean rooms. The staff was super friendly. We ate at the restaurant twice while there. Every time was a hit with all of us. We ordered pies and cake through room service, which was cool. Pool, water area and hot tub were a big hit. The walk to the park was about 5 minutes. I am already booking again for December. The packages are such a great deal. Thank you for making this trip memorable!!

The staff is so nice and friendly, always feels like home when we go. Comfortable rooms, easy access and great parking. Very clean hotel. Pool, hot tub, Basketball court, tennis court. Lots to choose from. We did everything except tennis. Room service was great. Very easy walking to the park. Snoopy meat and greet in the lobby every morning.
Room tip: All are great but the best would be the upper floors facing soak city

Summary Heading: Amazing check in at Knottsberry Farm Hotel
Summary: We've been to Knotscary Farms many times in the last twenty years,  and always stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott a mile down the street, since it was cheaper bu still walking distance. However, we haven't been here for 6 years, and in that time, Knottsberry Farm Hotel has now become the same price. We figured, 'Why not?', and bought the Gruesome Getaway Package. It includes hotel, parking, early entry, fright and fast lane (vip entry for hoth rides and haunts), souvenir t-shirts, pre-entry 'Boo-fet', and breakfast in the morning.  That's a lot to keep track of for anyone. Additionally, we had requested extra pillows when we made the reservation.  Now here's where I extol the virtues of one of the best front desk people I have ever encountered.   Andrew pulled up my name upon

Nice hotel, we found it quiet despite all the kids. The pool however was a too busy with them. No chance to get a quiet swim. Restaurant in the hotel was very nice. Just a bit far out from the centre of LA for us.

Convenient not especially great. This hotel is near Knotts berry farm. It’s within walking distance. At one time this was likely a nice hotel but whatever corporation owns it now has let it go. It’s old looking and doesn’t have room conveniences like adequate electrical outlets or even a refrigerator. The room was clean, but the bed was very firm.  Not a bed for side sleepers. We were on 5th floor but could still hear kids playing in pool below. All quiet after pool closing time. Parents allowing their kids to run down hall and scream was an often occurrence. Someone nearby lit up MJ which stunk up the hall and crept into our room. Not pleasant. If you need a luggage cart you have to leave your ID with front desk. That seems odd considering the hotel has your credit card
Room tip: No refrigerator in room. Ice machine on each floor. Bring ice chest. Stay opposite side from pool...

Summary: We read the reviews after booking and prepared for the worst. On arrival we were pleasantly surprised. The hotel is a little dated, but charming. The front desk was helpful & friendly and check in was quick & painless. We got a room in the “snoopy” wing and loved the decor leading to the room. The hall was filled with excited children running from room to room. I started 2nd guessing my room choice. Maybe the non snoopy side would be more calm. Hmmm. The room was nicer than the reviews had pictured. We had a pool view w/king bed. Yes the room is dated but it’s also a fourth of the cost of a Disney room. The bed was nice and firm and the cable channels were awesome. Better than Disney! The only “bad” part was the room had a joining room which to me equals noise, but immediately I

Summary Heading: Tired and outdated, but lots of potential
Summary: This hotel could be so much more. The staff is great, but the hotel itself is just tired and dated and kind of trashy. We stayed there for the first time in October 2020 for their Halloween tasting event at the theme park, and we remembered loving the hotel. However, I think we probably loved it so much because it was our first hotel experience during Covid, and we were just thrilled to not be at home.   We checked in Saturday, July 23. We upgraded to a Snoopy Room, and our kids loved the Snoopys. However the room itself needs to be completely updated. The bedding is cheap, the towels are rough, paint was chipping everywhere, and the bathroom just looked exhausted. For what they’re charging, the rooms should be nicer. The non snoopy rooms look even worse. The crowd is kind of

The hotel was horrible because what they have advertised is untrue when u arrive to the location no towels for the pool, no housekeeping, the rooms had roaches and the TV was stolen and the reception was close when u needed them

Summary Heading: worst experience. old  hotel and not clean
Summary: We reserved a snoopy room for my daughter and we were very disappointed for it. The room is very old and not clean. The pool was very dirty. We paid more money for our room and got very worst experience. The room was very noisy, too. Our room was in 2nd floor.我定了一個史努比的房間，而且選了套票專案，比正常房間多花很多錢，結果卻非常失望，我的房間在2樓，非常吵，隔音很差，房間非常老舊也不乾淨，地毯髒污，我不敢置信我花了四百多塊美金訂了這樣的房間，所謂的史努比只有簡單的裝飾，完全不值得，泳池非常髒，我們到了池邊不敢下去，非常糟糕的經驗

This did not feel like a 3 star hotel. It's beautiful, but the beds are uncomfortable, pillows are lumpy, and service is sub-par. I've never stayed at such a pricey place that didn't provide housekeeping for multi day stays. They only provide 1oz of shampoo so I could only shower one day. There were people getting drunk in the hot tub at 5pm and no enforcement of rules about pets. Dogs barking on our floor. The pool is nice and the staff are polite but I wish we had stayed somewhere else.

Summary Heading: Fun stay with very nice staff!
Summary: I really appreciated the friendliness of the staff. They were so helpful and accommodating. For instance we found out our rooms were right by the elevator and since we have had a bad experience being by an elevator in past hotels we asked for something different and they went out of their way to get us a different room. The snoopy rooms were darling and my son was so excited to get a stuffed snoopy. I also really liked the staffs helpfulness. We had a glass item we had bought from Knotts break and an employee saw it happen and even though it was an accident said we could probably get it replaced at the store. We did and really appreciated it.

The hotel is a little tired around the edges  We upgraded to a Camp Snoopy room, the walk down the corridor was great, seeing all the snoopy characters along the walls was fun, the room was also impressive Room was clean again dated   Amber waves was ok had two meals there, but would would pop in for a beer, staff excellent   Major gripe was you don’t get discounts in any of the shops attached to the theme park, also they don’t allow you into the park before other guests arrive. I really feel this would attract more people to stay in the hotel.  Great location to explore and other restaurants within walking distance   Huge walmart’s a short drive away  Location is quiet, pool is great   The management could improve the experience by incorporating the theme park more with the

Just back from an Excellent Stay at Knotts Berry Farm  the hotel staff are amazing and very friendly  all the staff are very helpful  i need to have a conference call back to uk for my business  and all though there isn't a business centre in the hotel the staff found table and chair and put it somewhere quite so i could do this  we also were having a package delivered which did not arrive before we checked out  but the staff informed us when it did arrive and held on to it safely until we could have it collected   all the staff will go out of the way to help and assist   we went for the oversized Queen room  and for a family of 2 adults and 2 children the room was great very big loads of storage space and clean and also very quite   the food in the hotel and staff at breakfast

This is a pretty basic and tired hotel but fabulous location for visiting Knotts Berry Farm.  The staff without exception was accommodating and they did an excellent job with our convention.  We had three meals a day and the meals were excellent and very hearty.  We had one lunch in the restaurant because we got there early plus one take out lunch because our meetings ran over.  Both were excellent and served quickly.  Excellent parking.

Summary Heading: It's The Employees That Save This Hotel!
Summary: Have to admit sometimes you can go by other peoples reviews and sometimes you simply cannot, because one things goes wrong and everything is negative. The way I did my review was for each portion from entering the Hotel and observing how clean it is, not to sit and point out every flaw, and customer service, and how the room was, and etc.  Needless to say, me, my wife, and two children arrived here a little earlier than normal on Tuesday, March, 22nd, 2022. We arrived a little after 12:15pm and Jackelyn or Jacky was beyond polite, informative, respectful, and truly helpful when it came to asking questions or having basic concerns.  So for starters when I first pulled up, they have a security check point to verify you are a guest staying at the Hotel which is a plus, so you don't

Just back from an Excellent Stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. Staff very friendly, Andrew manager was extremely helpful with couple niggling issues. All in all an Excellent Stay. Would definitely recommend

We hadn’t done much homework on this hotel but the front desk staff helped out a lot, especially Steve.  There is a shuttle to Disney (which is free) and the drivers are fab!!!  The timings of the shuttles give you adequate time in the park.  The rooms are like a Quality Inn (Orlando style) but most of the time it’s somewhere just to sleep.  Would thoroughly recommend staying here.

Summary Heading: Great Place Near Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: This was a great hotel to stay in with my grandson the night before we went to Knott's Berry Farm.  We could keep our car parked at the hotel and was a short distance to the amusement park. The staff was great, and we loved the room.

Check in was smooth and front desk was friendly and nice.  Parking was easy but granted it was a slow period midweek in early December.  Got a room on 8th floor for an additional 15 dollars a night but was worth it for the view and the floor was super quiet and nice especially on first of the two nights.  Faced the gardens, parking lot and could see ghostrider coaster and Independence Hall, really think this is best direction myself to be facing at least on weeknights. The windows by the way open a few inches just enough to give you a tiny breeze and to reach out and feel the temperature outside.  The room was a 400 sq foot the larger size they offer and had a king bed and pull out sofa. Bed was super comfy and room was very clean very nice vast improvement over previous stays

By far this is the best hotel for a family to stay, very friendly and caring staff. Very clean and comfortable as well as accommodating requests. Don't forget this is a happy place and they are there to ensure your happy with your visit.  We are season pass holders and glad we made the choice. Thomas as well as the rest of the staff are fantastic. Covid testing is Down the block at CVS, very easy and walking distance.

The hotel is excellent, rooms are spacious and very clean . The restaurant is fabulous and the buffet breakfast is a must. There are quite lengthy queues to get into the restaurant and turn around times for tables are a bit erratic. However the 5 stars for me are for the staff especially the reception staff. They are so helpful and friendly with a fantastic knowledge of  the areas amenities and go above and beyond to help. Excellent would highly recommend. Currently staying .

Went to Knotts Scary Farm. and overnighted at this hotel.  Parking was a snap. It is clean, fresh, looks vibrant.  My room was huge. had a stand up bar area. with seats. and a sofa bed. it looked newer and spruced up.  You can tell it was built many years ago, but it is well maintained. and attached to the Theme Park.  Do not think Disneyland, or the Ritz Carlton.  This is neither.  Know what you want , and plan accordingly.  The theme park (I think) is more fun, less crowded, and less expensive,  than the other Theme Parks in Anaheim. The Hotel is Great.   its not yucky. But, its also not the Waldorf Astoria either.  They have done a good job with maintenance, considering the world was shut down for 18 months.

Summary Heading: Over-night visit to Knott’s Berry Farm.
Summary: Stayed here one night while visiting Knott’s Berry Farm. I knew from reviewed and others who have stayed here not to expect a luxury resort. Furnishings were comparable to a Hampton Inn or other mid-cost hotel. But room was clean and has what we needed.  We were able to check in early and from the time we entered the parking lot “Rey” the attendant was friendly and made us smile, the desk people were awesome and the service at Amber Waves Restaurant top-notch. Location to park was perfect and parking was only $10 for the 24-hours. Would stay here again.

This is my first time that I stayed at knotts berry farm hotel for one night to visit knotts scary farm on 9/23/21. I at budget hotels to go to knotts scary farm for 25 plus years and until this year , I decided to give knotts berry hotel a try after the area budget gone downhill. Once I checked in , I love my experience from fast check in /  out , snoopy room was very well appointed and feel safe with the property. The location is very convenient to the main entrance to knotts, a five min walk. I will make this hotel my lodging every year I visit knotts scat farm.

Summary Heading: A theme park hotel should be better than this
Summary: First, let me preface by saying first that the staff in the hotel  was very nice and helpful.  I never needed info regarding the park so I don't know what they're knowledge levels are.  That being said, I've stayed in Motel 6's that were less run down than this hotel.  The bathroom light switchplate color didn't even match anything. It felt as though someone said, "Just grab one that fits."  There were paint wear marks all over the room.  The furniture and lights looked like something I could have picked up at Goodwill (though I have to say there are sometimes really good finds at Goodwill).   I sat out by the pool for a while and wish I hadn't looked up at the rooms.  There was paint, etc peeling from the undersides of the balconies which did not reassure me that they were

Let me preface this by saying I understand the rules about Covid are archaic and change at a pace that make it hard for businesses to comply with them. My comments have nothing to do with Covid. I once thought this was the best hotel in the area but my last trip changed my opinion. The Hotel staff seems clueless as to what is going on at the park. We were told by the Hotel staff the information office for season passes opened at noon, it opened at 10 Am. We were not told that on some days the park opens early. As for the hotel itself, the ice maker on our floor did not work. The TV in my room got very spotty reception of all channels. The hotel used have complementary coffee at the restaurant,  it is now 4 dollars. The in room coffee service only had enough coffee for one day.

We have season passes that we finally got to use since C19. We had conjoining rooms on the 3rd floor. You can't beat the location within walking distance to the park. They give you a 20% discount to eat at the Amber Waves restaurant in the hotel - super convenient. The pool is nice and  the area is cleaned daily (some shade umbrellas would be nice). There is also a little splash pad area for the kids. They don't service your room daily, but reception sid because we were staying two days, just let them know if we needed any additional items. I saw a maid in the hallway and she was very kind and happy to get us more coffee, trash bags, and toiletries. All the staff was genuine and kind. Tip your maid!  Check out was a bit inconvenient. They emailed me that I could check out via

I recently visited Knotts Berry Farm with my daughters, someplace I have not been to since I was a child.  I purchased the room, day pass to the park and what I thought was the Food Sampler card for each of us.  Turns out that you only get 1 (ONE) Food sampler card for the entire family. I had to purchase an additional 2 once we got to the park and got hungry.  The park blames the hotel and the hotel blames the park, thus resulting in a stalemate for a refund.  Additionally, they only clean the rooms every 5 days.  No mention of this, making clean towels and new coffee non-existent.  To make matters worse, we happened to arrive on the same day as a Cheer Leading Competition, and for 3 days had little disrespectful girls running, yelling, and doing flips down the hallways and in

We recently stayed at Knott's Berry Farm for 4 nights.  We were very disappointed with amount of noise in the hotel. We were woke up the first night by drunk people in the hallway at midnight. Then again the same night from fighting in the parking lot.   They also had cheer teams practicing early in the morning on the basketball courts. We left the hotel on the fourth day completely exhausted.  The staff was very polite. The hotel just needs to do a better job with noise control. Overall we were very disappointed with our stay.

My family has stayed here several times over the last few years and have always experienced great customer service. The price is great, the rooms are decent sized, beds are so comfortable. The restaurant food is delicious. We have had both the breakfast buffet and dinner there. Walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm, stores, and places to eat. Large pool. Gift shop in the lobby and ample parking. Looking forward to our next stay later this year.

This hotel really needs a redesign. The room was clean and had good space, but for a theme park room, it just wanted anything special. As THE Knott's Berry Farm I expected a bit more quality. But it literally could have been any other hotel in the area. I don't expect a "Disney" quality room, but certainly did expect more than what I would get at a Choice/Hampton Inn brand. The theme parking was very convenient though and would be the ONLY reason I would stay here again.

Our family has had our vaccinations. And that’s why we are on vacation.. The park is totally open.  Came back to the hotel expecting my room would be cleaned and we  would have towels. Nope. When I called down to the front desk they said they don’t clean rooms because of Covid restrictions. This makes no sense because the park and hotel are totally open. They just don’t want to clean the rooms!  On the flip side the hotel itself is an ok value and the rooms are clean upon check in. They are a bit outdated and worn though. Pool is nice.

Exceptionally poor customer service. I am surprised the great park has a hotel full of people unwilling to help or even figure out who you need to speak to. Spend 20 minutes on hold to not get answers.  Hopefully they will find competent employees that can restore the brand.

Summary Heading: Knott's Berry Farm Hotel Adapts Well To Covid-19 Safety
Summary: Recently we stayed at the Knott’s Berry Farm hotel and got a chance to see how they are operating under the pandemic. We had stayed at the hotel three times prior and despite the challenges of operating under the current guidelines; the hotel exceeded all of our expectations.   We called about thirty minutes out from the hotel to ask if we could check-in upon arrival as while we were not expecting the room to be ready for several hours, we hoped to save some time by completing the desk work ahead of time.   We were told that the room was ready and we were able to do a prompt check-in and get our luggage to our room and went ahead with our plans with ease.   Our room was spacious and very clean and we were informed that under the new guidelines; maid service would not happen on a

Everyone was helpful and we had a great time Remy had a good time we where able to enjoy the pool as well the breakfast was good liked the burrito the fridge leaked I'm my room maintenance came to check it out

We stayed here to relax during the Fall-o-Ween event held at Knott's Berry Farm. The room looked a little dated (like straight from the late '80s), but otherwise very quaint and cozy. The rooms were very clean, the beds very firm (to our own personal liking), and the A/C was phenomenal (we had a small heat wave, so it was very nice to have the A/C).  The only complaint was that the closet doors were very loud when opening them - they banged really loudly against the walls, so maybe the facilities maintenance can put a little bumper to soften the noise?   Our only disappointment came when we went to the pool (after making a reservation with Bell Desk). We noticed that we were given colored strips to put on our left wrist to signify our time at the pool (from 9:30-11pm). Once we

Summary Heading: Great experience and close to everything!
Summary: Less than a block away from stores, restaurants and bars and much more.  From the moment you step in the lobby you see that is Halloween. Lobby and Bar Beautifully decorated. Staff very friendly and very knowledgeable of what’s going on in and out the Hotel.  Rooms are clean with beautiful amenities
Manager Response: Hi zuadvise,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: This place is nice and clean with a nice pool area for adults and kids   Has a gift shop and restaurant and waking distance to the park and eateries  Our favorite place to stay in that area  with a shuttle to Disneyland
Manager Response: Hello fresnobeachlover,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our outdoor pool area, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: Small room. Facility is getting a bit long in the tooth. Easy parking. Good location. Friendly and helpful front de ask staff. 200 words is a bit too much to ask for in these reviews! Good grief, Sherlock!

Very good hotel food excellent especially breakfast buffet.  stayed there 4 times already and staying again in September for our 25th wedding anniversary would recommend. staff very pleasant and very helpful
Manager Response: Hello cvwalker71,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed Amber Waves Restaurant, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary Heading: Use as base if visiting Disney
Summary: The hotel is around an hour transfer from LAX. We stayed here at the end of February which is just before the season really kicks off. Most of the surrounding attractions were open except the water park opposite. The hotel was well priced at this time, saving around 65% compared to peak season price. The outside of the hotel was clean and tidy and the grounds were well maintained. The lobby was a large open space which was clean with manual check-in but that was OK as staff were polite, helpful in pointing out local attractions and amenities. We had a standard double queen room, bland and basic in setup, dated dark furniture and one of my pet hates which is a carpeted skirting board, it could do with sprucing up. Based on the 7th floor with a side view of a car park but as we
Manager Response: mrelms,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your experience and for leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We hope to see you again soon.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary Heading: Thin walls, could not sleep due to noise
Summary: The location is good, and the room was clean.  Chose this hotel because of its proximity to the park.  We figured we would spend most of the time outside anyway.  But we did not sleep well at this hotel.  An average hotel (three-star review) to me is a place where we can rest, but we did not even get that at this property.  Our room had poor noise insulation.  We could hear our neighbor checking in at midnight, waking up at 6:30AM to go to Disney, snoring (seriously), talking on the phone, etc.  We could also hear our neighbor across the hall getting a delivery to their room at 10PM.  The neighbors were not particularly loud, it was just that the walls are thin at this old hotel.  We did not take the upgrades suggested to us when we checked in:  oversized room ($60 extra) or
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  We will be taking your review into consideration when we fully renovate our property in 2021.  We will recognize the associates you mentioned in your review.  We hope you will visit us again to see our new product in the near future.  Thank you

Summary: Beautiful hotel, rooms were massive and beds so comfortable. Also just next to Knots berry farm and not far from Disneyland. Staff was very friendly and welcoming. The outdoor swimming pool and jacuzzi were great. We really enjoyed our stay
Manager Response: Hi Lussysmiles,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: Hotel is average but in a perfect location. You can walk right over to Knott’s Berry Farm. The hotel has a restaurant called Amber Waves. The staff is friendly. You can buy packages that include tickets to the park. Would definitely stay here again. But ask for a room away from the elevator, we should have asked to change as it was noisy, especially at night with excited children coming back from the park. Enjoy!!
Manager Response: LindaKayC,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and we hope to see you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: At the price point, just over $100 off season, I don’t think this place can be beat.  Our room was clean, comfortable, and quiet!  Staff were extremely friendly and courteous.  Parking was $10 a night.  They offer a free shuttle to Disney which is a nice little perk.  Tons of restaurants around.  About a 20 min drive to Downtown Disney. Also the pool is not heated.    The only downsides were that the hotel is dated, but for us it wasn’t a deal breaker, and our room did not have a mini fridge which was disappointing.
Manager Response: Hello  jetsetmom,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: Wow, very surprised at this room. I've seen better furniture at a yard sale. The desk chair is gross & the back is wobbly. $20 for a fridge for 1 night, really? Thank goodness the bathroom is clean. Wish I was never here & definitely won't be back. This room should have been $50 regardless of the proximity to a Park.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience.  We strived to provide the best service and product.  We will be renovating in 2021 and would love for you to give us another try to win back your business.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Great Deal for a decent hotel.
Summary: I have stayed here many times and have never had a bad experience. The staff is very pleasant. The rooms are okay. Nothing fancy but a nice place to sleep and being next to Knott's is a perk since i have a annual pass.
Manager Response: Hello 678jasonf,  We’re thrilled you always find value in your decision to stay with us, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Only thing good about this hotel was the staff who are amazing! The entrance to the hotel is very nice, but the rooms need a serious upgrade. First off, there is no fridge in the snoopy room. I was a little shocked at this because a lot of families stay here, you’d think they have a fridge to keep any left over food/snacks/drinks (apparently this is extra charge, but should be a standard). Second the beds are extremely stiff! And I’m not exaggerating that. The beds where like sleeping on the floor. Third the pillows are very uncomfortable, and definitely showed they were well used past their time. The area where the rooms were do have an odd smell. For the price I paid I was definitely disappointed. The kids did enjoy snoopy tucking them in, and that was the only thing I would
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are in the middle of design and will be renovating  the whole hotel in phases during 2021.  Please come back and see our new product that we are excited to build for our guest.  Your comments will definitely be taken into consideration.

Summary: We just got back from two nights at the hotel. When I first checked in I was disappointed. There’s a little bit of dinginess to the place and the room felt like a step up from the red roof. However, the service was great, the front desk people couldn’t be nicer, beds were comfortable and the convenience to knotts and the free shuttle to Disney were fantastic.  I actually think we would stay here again if we were visiting the park. If not, probably would find a more up to date hotel.
Manager Response: Hi 2011travellover,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: My family and family friends stayed here in two connecting rooms.  We were greeted immediately and checked in quickly.  Our rooms appeared to be clean but there was room for improvement due to how old this hotel is.  This location is in need of a remodel and according to their website one is scheduled soon after our two night stay.    The Amber Waves restaurant was good and the food we had was fresh and made to order at dinner and breakfast.  It’s a bit over priced but that is to be expected in almost any hotel restaurant. All of the staff in the restaurant at night and during the day were very friendly and service oriented.   There was a pool and splash pad and the pool appeared to be heated which is a huge plus for the next time we come to Knotts Berry Farm.   We paid slightly
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for your review of our property.  We will be going into renovation in phases in 2021.  Please come back and see our new product that we are excited to bring to our property.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: What’s Knott to like? Well let me tell you....
Summary: I’ve been coming to this hotel for 15 years, and not much has changed. It’s the lowest family amusement park deal in town. The free breakfast Buffett is good ( But the bacon could be cooked a little longer, just sayin) The problem is the room, no fridge ( Now that’s extra) and the NOISE! The toilets run, the maids vacuum in the middle of the night and you can hear people going in and out. All night. The walls are thin. This has been a consistent problem EVERYtime I go here. Everything else is ok.
Manager Response: seajay11,  Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I'm sorry to hear about the inconveniences that you experienced, however, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Our family stayed at Knott's hotel for a few days right after Christmas to enjoy Knott's Merry Farm. The staff at check-in were kind and efficient. We didn't pay for a room on the Camp Snoopy wing and I regretted it. By the time we checked in, they were all booked. We did add on a Snoopy plush, which was a perfect little addition. Like other reviewers pointed out, the room was a little outdated but ours was incredibly clean. We loved having a view of Ghostrider out the window.  We checked in after a long day on the road and after a short walk to Marketplace for dinner were in bed pretty quickly. We all slept like babies and we loved hearing the laughter and excitement as Ghost Rider zipped down the track. It was the best way to fall asleep for our coaster-loving family.
Manager Response: Hi 3travelbells,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: The way my event is handled is way below my expectation. The customer service from the catering to the bartender,maintenance, front desk is so bad. I dont know if because im only hosting a 170 people guest for my daughters birthday. But i never feel that they want my business at all. Debbie from catering is so busy that she did t got to see my email for my food selection. Good thing I stop by the hotel to pay otherwise it will be a big mess. Next, front desk agent we try to check in at around 1pm, from the time we arrived i can tell that she doesnt want to help us, she looks annoyed to the fact that we are trying to check in early. Next is Steven from maintenance, the circuit breaker blew in our ballroom, instead of them to just reset it this guy argued and lectured me and the
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  I believe after your review that my staff called and addressed your concerns.  We strive to improve our service and have looked into your event to see what we can do better next time.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Food Poison and Rain Marred The Still Enjoyable Visit
Summary: During our recent trip to California my wife and I checked into the Knott’s Berry Farm hotel for a few days of rest and fun.  This was our third time covering the hotel as we made in our base of operations for E3 2018 and last year we stayed for an evening ahead of our stay and coverage for the D23 Expo.  This time out our plan was for three days of rest and enjoying the park, hotel and surrounding area around our end of year travel coverage.  Our visit got off to a rough start due to heavy rains which caused Knott’s to close for the day. While our check in was very friendly; we did have to wait for a bit but thankfully the room was ready earlier than expected.  While we have stayed at the hotel and knew what to expect; I had to remind myself that there are no refrigerators or
Manager Response: Garethmb,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your recent visit and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We look forward to your next stay.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: You can't go wqrong with this hotel, very friendly staff and clean rooms. We stayed as a family and found we were more than pleased with the pool area, room size and amenities offered including a free shuttle to disneyland. Great hotel for the price and we understand they intend to renovate in spring which will be even better. Easy walking distance to places such as medevil times, pirates dinner theatres, as well as rock and brew restartaunt. There are other food options along the way as well.
Manager Response: Hello TasteofTuscany,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our convenient location, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: This was so fun. We took our grandson. Knotts hotel was comfortable, accommodating, and friendly. Yes we’d stay again and yes we would recommend! The room itself was clean and roomy. We love the fact that it’s right next to the amusement park, shopping, restaurants. The hotel also has a small gym and restaurant right in the hotel.
Manager Response: Brodysazgrama,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed all that we have to offer and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary: For our family holiday we stayed here for 6 nights as we were visiting my auntie in Redondo Beach. We decided on Knotts as it had some great reviews and was close to Disneyland and also had the Knotts Berry farm theme park next door. The hotel provided a free shuttle to Disney and also a pick up at your preferred time.The rooms were excellent. Spacious and clean. Would highly recommend this hotel for anyone wanting to visit Disneyland. Even the Knotts Scary Farm was a really good experience. Not one for kids under 9 but for older kids and adults it was heart in your mouth type of experience. Would definitely come back to LA and most definitely stay at Knotts again!
Manager Response: Hello TimH478,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our amenities, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Good location with plenty of parking. Helpful and friendly staff. The rooms were clean and the beds comfy. But hotel and especially the rooms did seem to be a bit tired. The amber waves bar had a great atmosphere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are in the design stage of updating our property.  Summer of 2021 you see our new room product.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: My wife and I and our 3 yr old decided to stay at the hotel during a one day trip at the park because the price to include the hotel was so reasonable (October/weekday).  We arrived at the hotel at 11am and was allowed to check in early.  Every staff member was so welcoming.  You can tell the management has a good attention to detail.  The hotel was a 5 min walk to the gate entrance.  The rooms were nice and clean.  You can tell it's an older hotel but the keep it up.  We saw snoopy once in the lobby and once at the on site restaurant.  We all had a great time and would highly recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi michael z,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: We picked this place because our daughter likes snoopy, we reserved a room with the peanuts. When we checked in, the receptionist told us if we wanted a room with the snoopy beds we need to pay $60 extra per night, WHAT??? Yes that what she told us, so we just stay on a regular room, then we requested to have a king bed instead of Two queens bed and they stated they didn’t have any rooms, clearly they did bc the hotel seems empty for the rest of the nights we stayed.  Then housekeeping don’t change sheets when I asked to do so, they don’t place lotion or shampoo on daily basis just like twice during the whole staying.  I think is overpriced for the service and rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  I apologize that you were unable to get your room type.  During Scarey farm, our King rooms are the most popular and are the first to go.  Please visit again and we can make sure you get a snoopy room prior to arriving.  Thank you again

Summary: This was worth every penny!! When we greet us, my granddaughters loved it. Good way to dip your toe into Scary Farm  for first timers.  It was so great after the event ending at 2am to just have a short walk to our room. The room was simple, had everything we needed (Beds,shower). Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Beverlee R,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel.  The room was clean, the beds were comfortable and linens were of good quality.  It was a convenient location for our activities. Surprisingly, the hotel was very quiet at night which was wonderful as the Scary Halloween was going on at Knott's Berry Farm theme park a few nights we were there. The Hotel offers a free bus shuttle to Disneyland which was a plus. The bellman was able to recommend a great car rental place for the two days we needed a car.  They brought the car to the hotel and picked it up at the hotel.  We felt it was very reasonable.  The restaurant located in the hotel offered very tasty food and had a nice hot buffet each day for, what we thought, was an affordable price. We were very pleased.
Manager Response: Hello GraceyOregon,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Great hotel after a long day at the Knottsberry theme park! Easy to walk to and from the park. Heated pool. Clean and cute touches for Halloween! Snoopy was around too:) also super close to downtown Disney!!
Manager Response: Leefamholly,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our convenient location and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary: Front desk staff were bland, not helpful. My family were told when going out for the day that they had to change rooms because someone else wanted 3 rooms together. Very close obviously to Knottsberry farm park. Shuttle bus is offered for Disneyland but at a cost. We had booked the bus for a 5:30 return and then rung and told due to a private function they wouldn’t be picking us up till 9:30. We certainly felt that everyone was more important than us. If your going to Disneyland stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We strive to continue in making our guest experience better from your comments.  I hope you could give use a chance to win back your business in the near future.

Summary: Location and amenities fine. The bride and groom gave us their honeymoon suite and what a joke. (They left right after the wedding) 2 King beds for the Honeymoon?? Beds were hard with box springs. Room not updated at all!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will be renovating in 2021 and we would love to see you come back to visit.

Summary: We stayed here for four nights and overall it was a good place to stay. It has a free shuttle to Disneyland, and it doesn’t take too long to get there , depending on traffic of course. We arrived on a Sunday, easy and friendly check in. Spent a bit of time in the pool and then decided to head to Knott’s Berry Farm (separate review). First night and our neighbors were very loud speakers, proving that the walls are very thin. Our room was cleaned each day, staff were very efficient and friendly. We saw Snoopy a couple of times. So overall a good stay and I would’ve given a four, but on our final night some scaffolding was being dismantled and dropped on the ground...very loud and late into the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay overall.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: After reading previous reviews I was slightly concerned, although we have now been at the hotel for 9 nights and could of happily stayed for longer! Myself and boyfriend haven’t got a bad word to say!  Staff are so lovely and friendly, rooms cleaned with fresh towels etc daily, they also reduced the parking charge for us as we were staying for 9 nights.  No the rooms are not completely up to date - but we didn’t book our holiday to spend in the hotel room.  It’s honestly been great- really comfortable bed, pool view, lovely quiet room no noise at all, iron, shower and bath, hair dryer, lots of storage. We can’t thank Knott’s berry enough for our stay here
Manager Response: Hi Sophielauren1,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: My family and I have been to the Southern California theme park circuit several times in the last few years, and each time, we’ve stayed in a Disney Good Neighbor hotel. This time, it was just my wife and I, and we opted for the Knott’s hotel because we intended to spend the most time at Knott’s Berry Farm during our trip. I strongly suspect we’ll be back. I’ll summarize my pros and cons lists, then go into further detail below for anyone who hasn’t already fallen asleep.   Pros: Proximity to KBF, friendly service (only one exception during our stay), free shuttle to/from Disneyland, nice pool, fast elevators, has safe in room, hotel FEELS SAFE, decent enough breakfast buffet if you got the package that includes it.   Cons: Room had a weird (not necessarily bad, just weird)
Manager Response: Hi stoney21804,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We appreciate you taking the time to tell future guests about all that we have to offer and we look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: This hotel is pretty terrible. You are paying only for the name and proximity to the park.  It is extremely dated to the point of feeling dirty. There were large pieces missing from our furniture.   I booked the hotel for 1 night leading up to a day at KBF to celebrate my mother's 60th bday (her request) with my family. The fact that you could walk into KBF was the biggest selling point since we were with small children.   We checked in around 4 and then hit the pool with our daughters, ages 3 and 5. The pool is fine-- pretty much your standard budget hotel pool but a little bigger. They do have a splash pad, which is great for the kids. There were a couple towel areas at the pool but sadly they were basically empty almost the entire time. There was never anyone going around to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Sorry to hear of your experience at our property.  We strive to ensure your experience is the best,  Please let us know when you are coming back and we will ensure you get the best deal on your next visit.  You can contact Luz in my office.  We have some exciting renovations coming over the next two years so we hope you can give us another chance to win back you business.  Thank you again Don

Summary: Our wedding party stayed here the night before the wedding. I was quite embarrassed by the shody furniture and very uncomfortable beds. I regretted that we suggested that our guests stay here. The furniture was chipped and looked like it came from a garage sale. The walls throughout the room were chipped and needed a good paint job. At 2:30 am a leaf blower was being used outside my bedroom window. Not one of our guests slept well. It was a huge disappoint even though it was Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience at our property.  We appreciate your review so we can continue to improve our product.  I hope you can give us another chance due to we will be renovating the next two years to bring a new product to our guest.  Thank you Don

Summary: We only stayed here for one night and we were pleasantly surprised.  We drove in from Vegas and we booked this place as we wanted to check out the amusement park.  By reading the reviews, we knew that the hotel is on the older side.  All staff we encountered were very nice which made our stay more enjoyable.  The price to stay here was quite reasonable and included discounts for the restaurant and park.  We stayed in a Snoopy themed room and the experience of Snoopy tucking in my youngest boy was awesome.  As we checked out in the morning, Bell service held our luggage for us and we took advantage of the early park entry for hotel guests.  All my boys had alot of fun at the park and we are definitely planning on coming back again next year.  As I said earlier, it is an older
Manager Response: Hello V6857RDanthonyl,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Great base for a Disney trip
Summary: We booked through Virgin and switched to this hotel rather than one in Beverly Hills as we wanted to go to Disneyland. The free hotel shuttle was fantastic- it is definitely punctual so you have to be on time! The rooms were clean and spacious, coffee making in the room was a bonus for the early starts, as was the iron and ironing board for my hastily packed crumpled clothes!   Yes- you can hear noise from other rooms but if you’re coming back late it’s not a big issue.  We had food in the restaurant one evening, just appetisers, and it was great.  All the staff we dealt with were fantastic, nothing was a problem.  Thank you for making the first part of our trip so easy.
Manager Response: Hello Lel H,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our shuttle service, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary Heading: Where is the money going to?
Summary: So, I wasn’t going to do this. But this place is horrible. Customer service was great. But when I got to my room (the outside door had signs it had been broken into) I was horribly disappointed. I had read reviews on here but thought to save parking fees, I would stay there and to see if all was true. The room is OLD, not updated, ok clean, but the drapes need a good cleaning... AC didn’t work. I woke up to sewer smells, that lasted all morning. Elevators were old and not clean. Hallways not vacuumed.  Where is the money going that this places takes in? Clearly not to the up keep! Seriously, if you have ever stayed at an awesome Hampton Inn, you’ll understand how poor of a place this is.  Totally bummed they can’t get it together.  Oh! There’s no place to plug in the coffee
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are currently going into a 2 year renovation and hope to have you back to see our product.  We appreciate your comments so we can improve our property.  Please contact my office the next time you plan your trip and we can get you the best deal.  Thank you

Summary: My husband and I were in town for a trade show last week and stayed three nights at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel.  The staff at this hotel is absolutely wonderful.  This applies to everyone we came in contact with - front desk, restaurant and housekeeping.    Front Desk:  They provided us a room about two hours before their official check-in time of 4 pm.  We had booked through a third party (Hotwire).  At other hotels, this seems to be a problem.  But, at this hotel, this didn't seem to have any negative effect at all.  We were given a terrific room.  Restaurant:  We ate at the restuarant two of the three nights.  I am gluten intolerant and they handled my dietary restrictions perfectly.  And the food was really tasty.    The rooms are a bit dated, but very clean and nice.  We
Manager Response: Hi kalgemini,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a good location
Summary: We have just returned after a 10 day stay here. After reading some reviews I was a little dubious as to what to expect but upon arrival we were pleasantly surprised! The huge car park and very attractive entrance to the hotel was good to see after a long 2 hr wait at immigration. We were checked in very quickly into our two rooms by the lovely Trish and as per my email requests a few weeks previous we were given two adjoining rooms in a quieter part of the hotel overlooking the basketball courts (and not the swimming pool which could occasionally be noisy!). The rooms are a little ‘dated’ but perfectly clean and spacious with everything you could need. We had lovely clean bedding, plenty of plug sockets, FREE WI-FI, coffee maker, tv, hairdryer, safe, alarm clock, ice bucket and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  All your points are being looked at as we start our two year renovation.  We hope your can come back after and review our new product again.  We appreciate your opinion so we can continue to improve our property.  Thank You again!

Summary: This hotel makes me feel like i can release all the stress of the family. The room was really nice with a great view of the whole park. The meals that the hotel has in the resturant are really good and the resturaunt is decorated very well. The room service was really really nice and gave me lots of tips about the park. I hope this review gives a good idea on why to stay there.
Manager Response: Hello carnooshkamalar,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced Amber Waves, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: I didn't have high expectations for this hotel, given that it was attached to an amusement park, but it was much nicer than I expected.It's definitely a clean and reasonably updated place to stay with one's family.  My son enjoyed the pool and splash park.  Guests at the hotel also get early admission to the amusement park.
Manager Response: Hello Tara K,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenience to Knott's Berry Farm, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: For such a great price and deal with season pass this is a great escape for families who want to totally experience an amazing theme park and a very close themed hotel with all the amenities your family needs to be comfortable and memorable. The staff is amazing ( hotel rooms amd decor feels outdated) and those staff members who welcome you at first glance bring a five star feel and comfort level that's extremely memorable. BTW i tapped a high rating because of the amazing staff and services...the room decor amd feel needs to definitely be comparable with service Once this happens im sure price will go up but the experience would surely make up for it.
Manager Response: Hello Patrick S,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that our staff made your stay special, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Crappy rundown worse than a motel
Summary: We stayed with Knotts Berry Farm hotel in room 340 for four nights from March 11 to March 15  Rooms were out dated with filthy floors, walls, windows, coverings, water pressure while taking shower would change automatically. ( like if Neighbour was using water) Floors were disgusting and dirty, windows and coverings were very dirty, wall and ceiling paint was peeling.  This hotel is in serious need of upgrades.  I have travelled to California many time this was the worst hotel experience ever and it was very depressing,  We arrived at 1 am and was waken up by loud noise coming from next room. The rooms are not sound proof at all. I requested to change rooms and was denied.  This hotel is worse than a motel.

Spur of the moment trip and was able to book a room a few days out. Service was great, snoopy visited the lobby and at breakfast. We purchased our tickets for Knotts Berry Farm and Soak City through the hotel because of the discounted prices. Walking distance to both parks and close to multiple restaurants and activities. Very convenient!!!
Manager Response: Hello allenaac,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary Heading: A great place with wonderful staff!
Summary: I stayed at Knott’s Berry Farm for three days and came away very pleased.  I would stay here again and would gladly recommend to friends back home that may visit SoCal and be looking for accommodations.  I got a great deal when I booked my stay via a local airline that offered an air/hotel package.  That being said, I didn’t know what to expect.  I’ve read a lot of the reviews and do agree, the hotel is older.  That isn’t the fault of the staff.  I’ve also read that it is noisy.  That was true on one night of my stay but was because children were allowed to run in the hall by the adults they were with and were not using quiet voices.  Again, not the fault of hotel staff.  I’ve read management responses that they are in the process of upgrading.  If this is true - it will be
Manager Response: minnetravels77,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your stay and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: Still at the Hotel, rooms are maybe a bit tired, but having said that they are clean, bedding and towels are spotless.  Restaurant food, as a family of five found we really good at a reasonable price. Staff are very helpful. Pool area never crowded. On the whole I from my personal experience I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Sue T,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: Hotel needs renovation.  Thin walls.  Staff try hard
Summary: Recently went to Knotts Berry Farm Hotel for the first time with family for a vacation.  We choose the hotel because they offered a package on reduced tickets to the Knotts Berry Amusement park and was close by.  First, the hotel is on the older side as others have written, perhaps similar to a hotel from the 1990's early 2000.   The rooms are functional but are dated.  Our room faced the splash pad/pool and at 11pm I could hear the people from the pool (i was in 5th floor) and windows were closed....so as others have written, thin walls.  My room came with power surge bar as there were not enough electrical outlets on wall.  A power surge bar does not show as a higher end hotel  in my view...as I do not recall seeing a power surge bar for guests in other major hotels.  Amber

Summary Heading: In need of an update throughout
Summary: If you're going to Knott's Berry Farm, you won't beat the location. But you could very likely beat this property for most everything else. The rooms - from carpet to furnishings to bathroom layout - are all dated. While they can't fix ceiling height without re-doing the whole building, the ceilings only add to the cramped, dated feeling. Hallways are loud, as other reviewers have mentioned. The bed itself was comfortable, and the A/C worked well in my room to cool to the low temperature I like to sleep at! Overall, I'd pick somewhere else unless being on property was an absolute necessity.

We stayed at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel about 10 days ago.  I was hoping for so much better.  You can tell the moment you walk in that the hotel is dated.  You get the same feeling once you make it to your room.  An advantage is that it is right next to the Amusement Park and Water Park.  Unfortunately there is no shuttle to the Parks.  The service is what was so disappointing.  The young kids working the desk at check in was a bit frustrating.  It seemed like they weren't 100% sure of what they were doing.  Of course we could;t check in at arrival time and had to wait a bit.  The most frustrating thing was the restaurant.  It started with trying to get a reservation for 8 and we were told no, we don't take reservations.  We ate at the restaurant for brunch Sunday morning on our

Summary Heading: Was a very nice place to stay, and walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: These rooms are very nice rooms, and very reasonablly priced for their location.  This is the most inexpensive and best place to stay if you are taking your family to knott's Berry Farm.  You can also enjoy all the different shops that they have around Knott's Berry Farm, without even having to got inside the theme park.
Manager Response: Hello bill91505,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Good location for park but noisy
Summary: I read reviews complaining about the noise and it was true. I took a white noise machine which helped but there was a Spirit (cheerleading?) convention with tons of screaming girls who made noise in the hall and their room adjoining ours way after 10:30pm. One in our party was under the 9th floor ballroom and the noise started there at 9am. I paid extra for the Snoopy rooms for the families with children in our group. That was worth it, as the Snoopy decorations were cute, they got Snoopy dolls to keep, and Snoopy came about 8pm to tuck them in. They loved it. We saw him other times too. You could easily walk to the park if you're healthy, the parking lot was convenient to the hotel but out in the sun. You had to request & pay for refrigerators for the standard and Snoopy rooms
Manager Response: Hello J W,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed meeting Snoopy, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: We had two adjoining queen rooms for eight people and we were comfortable in the time that we spent in the rooms.  Very nice comfortable beds and clean rooms.  My only complaint was the mini soap bars, I am happy that I did not forget to bring my own soap.  I would gladly stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello Jacqueline C,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are happy to hear that you had a comfortable stay, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Great for a Day at Knott's - I wouldn't stay longer
Summary: Knott's hotel is a pretty standard hotel with standard accommodations.  If you are looking for magic similar to a Disney property hotel you will be disappointed. This is all about convenience and an economical way to visit Knott's.  They have good deals including hotel and tickets. We were going to the park the same day we were checking in to the hotel and were able to pre-check-in at 8:00am.  The front desk provides you everything we needed for the park that day. They were friendly and helpful. You can leave your luggage with the front desk or hold onto it until your room is ready. They will text you when the room is ready and since it's a 5 minute walk from the park you can easily break away and complete the check in process.  I enjoyed my one night visit, but I think it may
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are always striving to make our guest experience better from your comments.  We hope you can come back in the future to see our property once we complete renovations the next 2 years.

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT PLACE, STAFF IS VERY HELPFUL, KIDS LOVE IT
Summary: Thanks Knotts berry farm hotel, we enjoyed staying there. Lovely staff, Free wifi, available parking, clean, well maintained, safe area, huge water park and we love scary park too. Food variety and lots of candies.
Manager Response: Hello OMAR H,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced all that Knott's Berry Farm has to offer, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: We stayed for 2 weeks as part of Virgin package. It seemed like a good deal but regretted it once we arrived.  Positives: close to theme park and water park, discounted tickets, gym is always empty, staff in bar and reception nice and friendly Negatives: noisy hotel, various events going on which means lots of noise after 11pm. I had to phone reception to complain on the Friday and Saturday as folk allowed to hang around front door as leaving wedding after midnight. I complained and they moved us to room next to hotel generator, different type of noise but affected our sleep. Hotel really dated. Our first bedroom was so smelly, dampness, carpets at door of bathroom. Shower old and like water canon when used. Tiles were not grouted and dirty. Bedrooms ‘cleaned’ every day but not
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience at our property.  I would hope you could give us a chance to change your image of our property on you next trip.  We will be renovating the next year and will have a new fresh product to experience within the next 2 years.  Please contact Luz in my office if you come before that and we can make sure you get a newer room.  Again, we want to make things better if you decide to return. Thank you for your review.

Summary: went to knotts berry farm on saturday julu 6th 2019, had not been in years it is a very fun place to visit and see all of the rides and things to do have some awesom roller coasters for adults or trill seeking kids and a very good kids area for their type of rides
Manager Response: Hello Jc F,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience in the park, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: We stayed 2 nights and purchased discounted tickets for Knott's Berry farm.  The hotel is nothing fancy but everyone was friendly and knowledgeable.  The room was clean. The location is perfect if you are going to the park,  shops, swim place. I would recommend as it is a good deal.  Most places cost much more.  Plenty to do,  a pool, restaurant and a gift shop.  Our room was convenient for all. Nice view of roller coaster.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our property,  We strive to hear your comments so we can continue to improve our property.  We will be starting a renovation the in late 2019 and should have an exciting product upon your return in the future.

Summary: Staff at front desk was ok. They seemed to be wanting not to be there. We booked this hotel to be next to the park and easy with grandkids. That was the only perk. Hotel is really old and I don't think a renovation would help. Bathroom was pretty much horrible. Door had holes in the bottom almost like rot. Beds were just alright since you were tired anyway. Double rooms were nice but an old musty smell to them. Breakfast was ok and staff there was nice. Would find another hotel in the area if we went back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I hope on your return in the future, you will give us a chance to win back your business.  We will be starting a renovation in late 2019 and after completed, we will have a new product for you.

Summary Heading: Perfect if you're going to Knott's Berry Farm.  Nice Hotel
Summary: I've stayed here twice in 2 years.  Just a short walk to Knott's Berry Farm.  I wouldn't stay anywhere else but here.  The staff is very accommodating and pleasant.  The only down side was the breakfast buffet in the morning.  The items were cold and it was crowded.  Next time I won't pay extra for the buffet and either order off menu or go somewhere else a little bit cheaper.
Manager Response: Hello Carol M,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our proximity to Knott's Berry Farm, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: We would like to say a belated thank you to the staff at Knotts Berry Farm hotel who ensured we had the best time. Clean, Friendly and all aspects of LA easily accessible. Good onsite food and breakfast served with a smile by Mario who made our trip even lovelier.  We would visit again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will let Mario know that he made a great impression during your stay.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel was very good to stay at. They offer a free shuttle for their guests to Disney Land. This shuttle starts early in the morning, and runs till 11:30PM at night. The entire staff of the hotel is very friendly, and helpful. The hotel is nicely located right beside Knotts Berry Farm park, along with Soak City. Many stores such as Walmart, Seats Target and many popular name restaurants are all close by.
Manager Response: Hello Sharon N,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our convenient shuttle service, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Convenience to the Park is a real plus
Summary: Stayed here for two nights as we had a group event at Knotts Berry Farm.  The hotel is just a couple blocks walk to the park so it's really convenient and you save on parking charges for the park, which is a plus.  Rooms were a bit dated, but seemed okay. Staff was generally friendly, but there wasn't a real sense of urgency at check in. Room was fairly quiet.
Manager Response: Hi  Hokiechip,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: We stayed at The Knott's Berry Farm Hotel and I read all the reviews prior to booking so I knew that the hotel rooms were dated and furnishings were tired.  I was okay with this because of the proximity to the park.The lobby was beautiful and the free coffee at Amber Waves was greatly appreciated,  The landscaping was beautiful and I loved all the foliage. My only issue was the bathroom had mold not just a little bit but quite a lot.  I went down to the front desk and made a compliant and they said someone would come up to clean up the problem.  We went to the pool to swim but that was cut short because someone found a condom in the pool and they said the pool would have to close for an hour. We all went back up to the room and someone had tried to clean the tub/shower but to no

We had a Snoopy themed, which was very cute. But, heads up, the walls are so THIN!!! We could hear the full conversation our neighbor was having. They were having some family drama...just in case you wanted to know. Anyways, we felt like we needed to whisper for our privacy. The lobby had an odd musky odor too.  For the price, I feel like I could have gone somewhere else and a better experience.   Pros: Great restaurant and bar. Snoopy tuck in was adorable. Close to the park.

My whole family loves knotts berry farm and we have been seasonal pass holders for two years now and we will be coming back for many years to come ! We definitely love snoopy and Charlie Brown and the whole group we look forward to coming every time! The hotel is amazing the staff is great and the theme park is our favorite!
Manager Response: Hello Gastelum18,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you have chosen to create a family tradition with us and we can't wait for the years to come!  -Tyler

Summary: I recently stayed at this property as part of a group event.  We were able to pre-check in in the morning, as official check in time is at 4pm.  This process was very slow and took about 5-10 minutes per room. We had 16 rooms, which took more than 1 hour to have everyone settled in.  The lobby is nice, clean presentable.  It is very conveniently located next to Knott’s Berry Farm.  It is a short walk away from the entrance.  The hotel and park entrance is connected by a variety or shops and eateries.  It provides for a pleasant walk.   We had a room on the 6th floor.  The room is outdated compare to the condition of the lobby. Small bathroom with very low sealing.   Room did not provide a refrigerator. It was a basic stay in a basic room.   The pool area is quite large with a

This hotel is right next to Knott's Berry Farm. We love staying here, even though we live about 30 minutes away, it's a little staycation for us and the kids. It's very convenient located to both Knotts Berry Farm and Soak City. The rooms are a little small, but are well kept. You can also find very good deals that include tickets and a room. They have Snoopy rooms for the kids (all Snoopy decor) and Snoopy comes by to "tuck in" your child at night, it's a very cool experience.
Manager Response: Hello Lorena C,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your staycation with Snoopy, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: We love everything Knotts. We’ll be back again this summer maybe more than once. We love the morning buffet, it’s delicious. It’s really cute to see the little ones getting their pictures taken with Snoopy under the Amber Waves sign. The Gift Shop is very friendly, and it feels like they know you personally. It’s “Home away from Home...”
Manager Response: Gary A,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that we always make you feel right at home and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary: The food is great and the staff are very polite and helpful. However looking for a rest at the end of a route 66 trip this hotel is not the place to stay. It is ideal for families staying for the park and thus it is not restful. It can be noisy to the point of disturbed sleep and on our last night there appeared to be an event in the ballroom to the floor above. This was very loud and disturbing. As said great for the park, if you are looking for a rest, go elsewhere.

We always have a great time when we stay here.The place needs a face lift other then that its great.The staff is helpful and friendly.They don't rush you out of the pool area when its closing.We just enjoy it so much.
Manager Response: Hi ShawnAZ1,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: Comfortable, convenient for local attractions and the price was right
Summary: Overall, we enjoyed our stay in this property.  The room was comfortable and included a big in-room safe (a real plus), a small coffee maker, but no refrigerator.  The staff is friendly.  On the other hand, there were a couple of minuses:  The carpet in the room was dirty enough that we left black marks on the bottom of the bathtub; the beds are firm but not as cushy as some of the local competitors'; and our Expedia reservation was not immediately available in the system when we checked in.  The latter was fixed quickly.
Manager Response: moakleyman50,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback as we are always looking to improve, and we hope to see you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Service: first rate hotel: second rate at best
Summary: If you have trouble sleeping move along. As reported ad nauseam the beds are atrocious. They have more bumps and bulges then can be counted and are hard as rocks. The pillows were passable but that could be because I did request extra, so possibly we got newer ones. The walls are paper thin and the place could use a good overall steam cleaning. We opted for an extra large room which was spacious and somewhat decently appointed. In it's day it probably was considered a decent upgrade. Not so much anymore. They have not moved into the 21st century and after having read previous reviews, knew enough to bring a small power strip for my assorted electronics. The room did have a nice small refrigerator and coffee maker which we made use of. The shower drain cover was recessed about 2

We were really happy with this hotel. The rooms are a good size and are clean just a little dated. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The pool and gym are good. We had dinner one evening in the on site restaurant and were impressed with the food both the choice and the taste. The waiting staff were really good too. The hotel is well situated for getting around Anaheim and the local area. It's close enough to be on the freeway within a few minutes to get to Downtown LA. There are plenty of restaurants close by to allow plenty of choice. We enjoyed our stay here and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Alison M,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your experience and for leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful.
