It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We look forward to your next visit.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: Hotel staff were very accommodating. The we're friendly, professional and polite. However, Maddie at Amber Waves restaraunt was not friendly. She mumbled did not smile and was short with me. She never let me use my 20% off discount that I was told I could use. The food was great but I would have preferred not to have to deal with her.

8 of us went on holiday to LA and stayed here, had 2 family rooms,  ample space, 2 x large beds in rooms, beds made & towels changed every day, everyone was friendly & helpful at reception, only used the restaurant once, food was okay, but very slow there, 20 min wait to be seated when only 3 people in the restaurant..  All clean & friendly, would definitely stay again.. 😉😎
Manager Response: Hi Cooks75,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: More of a 3.5, but the staff, location and Snoopy experience are the main selling points
Summary: Like others have posted, this hotel could use some updating, a fresh coat of paint or a wall scrubbing. But the selling points are the helpful staff, convenient location and the snoopy tuck-in experience for the kids. The best value, assuming you are staying for the purposes of visiting Knotts Berry Farm, is the package that includes admission tickets. So worth it.
Manager Response: Hello latindrummer2112,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are happy to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: Have a love/hate relationship with this hotel. Staff is super nice and helpful, but rooms are a little tired, uncomfortable pillows, and walls are PAPER THIN! Your neighbors WILL hear your conversation or ANYTHING ELSE YOU MIGHT BE DOING. On the plus side only steps away from the park and also close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello steph2tdf,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. I apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay, however, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Visited this hotel as it is close to where our daughter is living in Long Beach while she is studying at CAL state university. On arrival you are greeted by a beautiful display of flowers all around the entrance and reception area. The staff on reception are very polite and helpful checking us in and explaining a bit about the hotel. The rooms are a little bit dated by today’s modern standards and expectations, however they were very clean. The coffee machine was next to useless and a kettle would of been a nice touch as not everyone drinks coffee and my wife likes Tea in the morning. Had breakfast in the Hotel restaurant Amber Waves one morning and chose the buffet, plenty of choice however most of the hot selection was not very hot, so did not return. All in all a very
Manager Response: Hi Richard B,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: Awesome time so close to park everyone's friendly had a good time food was probably the best part way better for a day or two trip and more affordable than Disneyland planning on going back when get a chance
Manager Response: Hello steven G,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced Amber Waves, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: I do not know where to begin!  1. great hotel if you like staying in a college sleep dorm!!! i have no idea why they even have walls & doors, you can hear EVERYTHING in EVERY ROOM on every floor around you!  i have been running our sink water ALL NIGHT long just to create some kind of background noise!  the park doesn’t open until 10am & people are stomping around at 5:30am...every single morning!!   2. NO SMOKING: must be a new rule this week, our room has definitely been smoked in FOR YEARS!!  dingy, smoky & musty!!  cleaning supplies & air fresheners are just a couple suggestions!   3.  AC or lack there of:  fyi it was a high of 67* yesterday, can’t imagine when it’s actually hot out!  we have been “running” the air since we got here, at the lowest temp of 60*, if we’re lucky

My friend and I stayed here for her birthday. The staff is very nice, location is awesome, and lobby was very nice. The room was pretty much a standard hotel room about a 3 star. We bought a package that included breakfast in the restaurant which was pretty basic but filling. We were surprised that Snoopy came around to the tables, it was pretty awesome. It was nice to be able to run back and forth between the hotel and the park if needed.
Manager Response: rach340,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about all that we have to offer and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We look forward to your next visit.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: We stayed at KBFH as it was central to everything we had planned for our weeks stay. The staff were great & welcoming, the room was clean - but a little bit tired - & the corridors could be noisy sometimes but we loved it! & I especially appreciated the helpful tip left for me by one of the maids! Thanks for a really enjoyable stay KBFH 😁
Manager Response: Hi AlohaBeckyBoo,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: if you are looking to stay in a haunted hotel or just a noisy one here it is
Summary: i stayed 2 nights in this "fine"establishment . while the first night was fine, nothing exceptional, room was small but comfortable and clean.  i was in the same room just on the other side of the hotel on day 2. 3 pm. as the winds increased in speed so did the howling coming from the door to the room. i have a 7 minute recording of the noise that lasted all night. i couldn't sleep all night and  when i asked the desk clerk who do i complain to about the noise in my room ,i was told that they only have complaints once or twice a year when the winds come and that he would mention it to his manager. no sorry for the noise or anything. they still haven't released the funds held for a deposit on my debit card. all in all a very bad stay. employees are not helpful just condescending.

Summary Heading: I bought 1 ticket with a wristband online for under $100.
Summary: I purchased an admission ticket with wristband online and searched for discounts for Knotts that allows you to get some perks like discounts on food, drinks, and jump line pass straight to the front gate, and didn't have to pay for parking. I ended going on some cool rides and the 1 newest ride with my wrist band back in 2018..   The wrist bands can be purchased at some gift shops around the park, and they scan it each time you've used it, which is pretty awesome and purchased a souvenir cup, a bandana and pin from ghost town gift shop,and  unlimited drinks are every hour before you can purchased food and drinks again. It's not consecutively back to back like if you finished your drink or food immediately and wanted another drink or something else to eat you won't be able to get
Manager Response: Hello Belliago37,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: First we would like to thank Rachel who I think is the hotel manager. We booked a non-changeable room for April 2nd and could not make it that day due to an illness. When we called Rachel so arranged for us to check in a day later which was amazing because we thought we were just out the money. As for the hotel, the hotel is a 5 minute walk from the park. The rooms are sold as a basic option and then you just add on what you would like. You can book a room with fridge and microwave, add on breakfast, or even have "Snoopy" come to your room and tuck in your children. We booked a basic room for less than $100 per night. The room was clean and well maintained. our room was actually pretty quiet considering it is a resort hotel.We liked the idea that you decide which extras you

The hotel is surprisingly clean and well-kept. I wasn't expecting much and was very satisfied with most everything. First, the friendliness of the check-in staff was outstanding and made check-in pleasant and quick. We were in rooms that were newly renovated and featured Snoopy and other Peanuts décor. Two Snoopy plush toys were out for our child. Snoopy himself came in around 8:15 to greet our child and do a photo-op. There was a five minute walk to the main entrance of the park. An in-hotel restaurant was available but the food was average to low-average with prices at the high end. A hamburger was around $15.00 which would be ok if it were prepared well. The breakfast buffet was not worthy of attention, but because it included OJ and coffee and children's drinks we thought it
Manager Response: Hello jwinhou,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed meeting Snoopy, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Firstly you get what you pay for and I’ve always been happy with that , your not paying Hilton or Disney prices so I except small discrepancies ,  Always enjoy  stays here have been regular visitor for over 18years and with our 30th anniversary thought I’d love to visit the farm and hotel again   We Let hotel know well in advance thinking as a special occasion they may do something ???? No matter how small .... loyalty should count for something you would think   Esp as on our 20th hotel gave us a lovely room welcome basket and comp drink in the bar !   Checked in no welcome or welcome back asked for a newer room (in the past always received a decent standard ) was told all rooms are the same I know this is not true as have seen others and stayed in them  .  Got to room looked

We had a very good stay here with the annual passholder Boysenberry Festival package, which was a great value.  The kids loved the water park adjacent to the pool.  The pool was a very comfortable temperature, as was the jacuzzi.   I would prefer children not be allowed in the jacuzzi, where they were jumping, playing ball, splashing and wouldn't stop when requested to do so.  Although the rules state they must be supervised, they weren't.  Also, our room overlooked the pool, which was lovely, but there were very, very noisy guests there until 11 PM, when the pool closed.  Had I known the pool was open so late, I would have requested a room on the other side.  We had requested an upgrade to a Camp Snoopy room and were very disappointed it wasn't available, but we still had a

All Staff we encountered were friendly and helpful!  Our room was perfectly clean and quiet, has coffee maker and everything is replenished daily.  Great amenities, pool, tennis courts, basketball court and the shuttle to and from Disney!  Couldn’t have asked for better service or amenities for the price.   Next time we return it will be to Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel!    It is extremely close to Medieval Times Dinner Show and the Pirates Dinner Show.  We booked the Pirate show and our 9 year old enjoyed very much.  We enjoyed too, especially the acrobatics near the end of the show.    Also recommend KNOTTS Berry Theme park while visiting, only $46 ea and it is a great park with fun rides.  Theme Park is immaculately clean too!  Very impressed!  Only downside was the restaurant
Manager Response: travelingraysgirl1,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our convenient location and we hope to see you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: This hotel is located right next to Knotts Berry Farms. That is what you are paying for.   The rooms are in need of maintenance.  The staff is ok (not great, not horrible, just ok). That attached restaurant is ok food, but a bit on the pricey side. Walking distance to the attractions which is basically what you are paying for.

Summary Heading: Service wasn't the greatest & skip the restaurant at the hotel
Summary: Location is great being that its right next to the park. The hotel room was descent, although the cleaning crew missed certain areas such as the toilet handle had stains that I'm hoping weren't poop. Because the cleaning crew was not working at the time, we asked the staff downstairs if we can have sanitizing wipes so that we can clean it ourselves. Well the night crew weren't helpful they kept us waiting to see what they can do to help us, as if it was that hard. So we bought wipes ourselves to clean it. We bought a package deal that included breakfast buffet from the restaurant and wow that was a total rip off. For the amount we paid and the amount they advertise up front, the food is not worth it at all. The service inside the restaurant was worse, the host crew are not the

I complained after the first night that the bedding smelled and requested that they change the pillows. The pillows still smelled really bad the 2nd night (last night).  There are two reasons why the pillows would smell that bad: 1)  The pillows were dirty and needed to be laundered. 2)  The room hadn't been rented in awhile, so the bedding was never changed and it smelled old.  Suggest the bedding be changed before the rooms is rented out to ensure your customers are getting fresh clean linens and the pillows should be laundered at least once per month.  I really like the hotel, as the food is really good and it is normally a very clean/maintained hotel.  Next time I book, I will request that the room be fresh.
Manager Response: Stephanie B,  Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced, however, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall. We hope to earn a fifth star during your next stay.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Very nice visit, room is adorable with Snoopy decorations.  Everything else is just just average - bed, bathroom, room size.  Snoopy comes to room between 8-8:30 to tuck you in wearing adorable pajamas.  Complimentary stuffed Snoopys were waiting for the kids.
Manager Response: Hello bacm,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit from Snoopy, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: First time staying at hotel. We had the oversize double queen. Room was huge by hotel standards and very clean. Very short walk to the park. Mattresses were a little hard for my liking but i still slept well.
Manager Response: Hello WICTM32,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed your room, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: The hotel is under renovation so I assume the rooms, that are very small, will be updated soon. It was clean, comfortable and the staff was nice. Could use a few perks like a lighted makeup mirror, refrigerator etc. You must pay for parking. Pool and jacuzzi are nice. 5 minute walk to Knott's. For the money, I would expect more. They try to upsell you on a "higher floor" add a refrigerator etc. Just an average hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are currently in the process of updating our property the next few years and appreciate your input so we can continue to enhance the guest experience.  We look forward to your return in the future.

Summary Heading: Mid-level hotel with comfortable rooms, adequate amenities
Summary: We enjoyed two nights stay at Knotts Berry Farm Hotel because we planned a family trip to the park. The rooms and hotel lobby and elevators show a little wear-and-tear. We enjoyed the pool and splash pad. The hot tub could have been a little bit hotter. Easy parking and extremely easy to access Knotts Berry Farm park.
Manager Response: Hello jcduncan2001,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our pool and splash pad, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Very pleasant stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel
Summary: We stayed at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel as there was a family celebration being held there, and it was convenient to stay at the same place as the function. I booked far in advance through Expedia and received an excellent rate. The hotel was easy to find off the freeway (I-5 from Sacramento). It was close to Medevial Times and Porto's Bakery (yum!), both of which family visited as well. The front desk was kind to waive our daily parking fees. I had mentioned the 2 hour traffic jam to get there and how glad we were to finally arrive, and she kindly offered to waive the parking, which I thought was great service! Check in was quick, and we were in our room in no time. Very family friendly. Beds were comfortable, bathrooms, pillows, TV - everything was just fine. After returning
Manager Response: tkmyadvice2,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your family's event and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: Great stay in Anaheim! Simply walk out the door for the Knott’s Berry Farm Park! (Which is also a fantastic park)  Also a very short drive for the Disney parks from the hotel.  Super clean and everyone in the hotel were very helpful and friendly. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Manager Response: TylerSmith_x,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our convenient location and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary: Only stayed a short while but enjoyed the berry pie at the bakery.  The hotel was very good and very accommodating.  We had a small baby and they immediately brought a pack and play to our room.  The staff everywhere was friendly and sweet.  Snoopy greeted us in the lobby!  Lots of great gifts to buy for Charlie Brown  Lovers!
Manager Response: Hello deborahfalgowski,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a freshly baked pie from our bakery, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: This hotel is dated, but you can see they are working on upgrades. The staff was beyond friendly, helpful & courteous. The  grounds, pool, and hot tub were well cared for. The restaurant had excellent food with a bonus of Peanuts characters coming to your tables for pictures. (For staying at the hotel we were given a 20%off voucher for our first meal). The rooms were very clean, but dated. However at rates half the price of Disneyland area hotels this was a surprising value. Parking is $10.00 a day(also very good value). Around the clock security for the parking lot and hotel. You are literally steps to Knotts Berry Farm theme park, on the way you pass bakery’s, candy store and the famous chicken restaurant.  We will definitely come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi tttl565,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: This hotel was very convenient to the Knott's Berry Farm amusement park and had sufficiently clean and comfortable rooms. We really found the lack of a kitchenette difficult, as small children don't necessarily like to eat at convenient times.  The pool, hot tub, and splash area were great.
Manager Response: Hello 491maryannc,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our pool area, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: This is only a review for their banquet facilities.  We did not spend the night at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel.    We were here for a special celebration.  Parking was not an issue.  Plenty of spots available if you don't mind walking a bit.  Lobby was nice with some comfy seating.  The event we attended was at the Knott room.  It was quite large and fit everyone nicely.   Probably over 100 people.  Staff was professional.  Food was alright.  As a guest of the event, I really have no complaints with regards to it being at this hotel.  Would attend another event here in the future.  If your planning an event, then I'd check them out if I were you.
Manager Response: Hello ExpoNationals,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our event space, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Stayed here for a week, we booked a package deal with virgin. This hotel was chosen because of its closeness to Disney area etc. On check in just had to show id and give a $50 pre authorisation for any damage to the room etc and was told its given back on checkout, we were given some pin badges for our first time stay and anniversary, sadly we didn't get a room upgrade or any complimentary wine etc like most hotels do. Our room was on the 6th floor and had a vending and ice machine, room was clean and comfy, only downside was the coffee machine we never had enough coffee or milk etc. The beds were made up almost every day except 1, we didn't hear any noise from the functions that took place or hear anything from the the theme park etc. The hotel has a bar and restaurant, the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  We value your input so we can continue to build on our guest experience.    Hope you had a safe trip and look forward to your future stay.  Thank you again Don

Summary: Room smells like cigarette smoke, someone had definitely been smoking weed near the elevators, and although we had a confirmation email and a photo of the valid drivers license it was really difficult to check-in
Manager Response: Good morning Meagan  I am sorry to hear that your room and check in experience.  We appreciate your review so we can make sure we always are trying to improve our service.  We would love for you to see you return back so we can win back your business.  Hope to see you soon.  Thanks Don

Summary: We stayed here only for one night, on 2/7/19. I’m glad we got a deal because I wouldn’t pay full price to stay here. Overall, the hotel served its purpose, which was for us to have a place to sleep at after the Disneyland Sweetheart’s Night. But, it wasn’t a comfortable sleep.  The hotel is located just steps away from Knott’s Berry Farm and that’s the only pro about it. As soon as we walked into our room, it screams OUTDATED. The hotel itself really needs some refurbishment. The beds are old and hard, very uncomfortable. The carpet is dingy and dirty. The restroom is VERY small and the tub barely fits one person. It would be nice if they started incorporating soaking tubs because after a long day of walking at the parks, a nice soak is a welcomed treat. But, unfortunately even
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear about your past stay.  We are in the middle of updating all our rooms the next year or so.  We would love to have you come back and stay with us so we can make your next stay wonderful.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you in the near future. Thanks Don

Summary: Admittedly, this was a 'bucket list' item for me...staying at this hotel and getting Snoopy to tuck me in. Yes, I am adult fan of Snoopy who looked forward to this but I must say the hotel does a really nice job with this. At about 8pm Snoopy and another worker come and knock on the door. Snoopy will tuck you in and pose for a photo. All-in-all it is probably about 2 minutes but for a Snoopy lover it is fun. The front desk told me they have people of all ages who come to have Snoopy tuck them in and like I said they do a very nice job. The staff at the hotel was very friendly. For your convenience you can buy park tickets at the hotel and there is an area shuttle. The hotel and beds itself is nothing special but for me it was about the experience. It was surprisingly quiet which
Manager Response: Hello Melly022,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed your Snoopy room, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: We decided to give our kids a surprise trip to Knotts Berry Farn for their Christmas gift this year. We have never stayed in their hotel so we booked a weekend there. We arrived on Friday evening. The front desk staff was so friendly and helpful. Check in was super easy and quick. Our room included park tickets, parking and breakfast for two mornings (which was great).We parked and went up to the room, 309.   When we entered the room we immediately noticed how dated the room was. The beds are super hard and we heard and felt springs popping in the mattress. Bring you own pillow because theirs are pretty hard. I requested a refrigerator, good thing I did because they used a power strip to plug it in. Without that we would have not had enough plugs for all four of our cell phones
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review.  I am glad to hear our staff took care of you.  We are in the middle of updating the rooms the next couple of years.  We would love for you to return and see our progress in the near future.   Thank you Don

Summary: The check-in was fast.  Had to leave an ID for a luggage cart. The room was obviously old but refurbished.  The elevator was slow.  The overall configuration of room was weird with the two beds and a pull-out couch awkwardly placed.  Overall, it was an okay room, nothing special but adequate for my family of 5 since we went spent very little time in the actual room. I decided stay here because it was part of the Knott's Merry Farm Package.

Summary Heading: Very average but in line with pricing
Summary: I purchased a package on Knott's web site for two adjoining rooms, four theme park tickets, single-use fast pass, parking, breakfast buffet and a $20 arcade card - for $624.  After reading some reviews about the hotel, I expected it to be dated ... and that our room would not be ready any time prior to check-in at 4 pm ... was correct on both.  Fortunately, it was happy hour at the lobby bar and we had some cheap drinks and snacks.    I would not share a room with kids at this hotel.  The rooms are far too small.  Was very happy we had two adjoining queen rooms.  The location was convenient for going to Knott's Berry Farm, the restaurants, etc.  The breakfast buffet was okay - some fruit, eggs, bacon, french toast, cereals, pastries.    The theme park has greatly improved in the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are in the middle of renovation the next two years.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future with our new look.  Thank you  Don

Summary: We stayed here for 12 nights as a family of four.  We had to wait a while at check in for our room.  Room was clean, but quite dated.  Also felt a bit damp and musty.  Quiet at night though, apart from a couple of nights where there seemed to be some sort of teenager cheer leading convention.  There were hundreds of them.  We ate in the Amber Waves restaurant a couple of times and it was lovely.  Staff were very nice as well.  Knotts Berry theme park was fantastic.  The pool area was good to cool down in as well.  Although a bit mouldy round the edges.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of the hotel.  We are going to be updating the next couple of years so we look forward for your return to review our new product.  We are happy you had a great time! Thank you Don

Summary: We stayed at the Knotts Berry Farm Hotel yesterday and found it to be exactly what they promised. We booked a small room with one queen bed and it was perfect for my wife and I. The room was clean and the staff was friendly. From the minute we left our room till we arrived at the front gate of the park was about 8 minutes. Knotts overs a variety of rooms to choose from, some come with with a wet bar, some with free breakfast. We chose the least expensive room with no frills but it was the perfect location for going to the park. The hotel offers amenities such as a pool, basketball court, and tennis but we did not use those amenities. We chose this hotel to be close to the amusement park. We plan on staying at this hotel again in the coming months.
Manager Response: Hello Traveler2072,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you took advantage of our convenient location, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: We stayed in this Hotel every time we visited the park and we have a year pass for 7 consecutive years . We never have a problem,  the rooms are really clean , the character side is gorgeous, the people in the front desk are very courteous , friendly and professional.  We highly recommend Knotts berry farm hotel,  the park and their restaurant.
Manager Response: Hi Areli L,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: This is an old hotel, but it was clean and comfortable. The staff from front desk, to restaurant, to housekeeping was so incredibly friendly and accommodating. Restaurant manager opened the bar for us so we could have a drink while we waited for our take out. My daughter lost her stuffed animal and housekeeping had it found within 5 minutes of us calling. I would stay there again even if we weren’t going to the park.
Manager Response: Hi Shellfish375,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: Be sure to use your season pass discount if you have a season pass. I thought the park was a lengthy walk away from the hotel. I wish that there was a hotel entrance like there is at Cedar Point. I say Cedar Point because they are owned by the same company. I thought that the breakfast was good. I wasn't able to visit the pool. Great courtyard though! When I went to go check in the area in front of the hotel was super crowed so I had to park and then go check in.
Manager Response: Hello Jamie D,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our breakfast buffet, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: I want to preface this review with the fact that the hotel manager comped us the room charge. With that being said, here is what our stay at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel consisted of.   Upon entering the room, I had to use the restroom. I start with this so that there is no confusion as to the ownership of what was found in the room. I noticed hair on the bathroom floor. Yuck! I also noticed how stained the bathtub/shower was (mold, mildew.) I figured it was an older hotel and this was just part of the package.  After seeing the hair, I pulled the sheets back from the bed. Guess what I found? Yep...three more hairs! That did it for me and I called the front desk to get us moved to another room. They tried to say that would be difficult since all the rooms were booked but I

We spent one night here after a day at Knotts. The only good thing about this place was the location. Our room was small and so basic, with dated decor, it could have been in a Motel 6. No microwave or fridge. The mattress was lumpy and uncomfortable. Our meal at the onsite restaurant was overpriced. In short, we paid way too much for one night in this dumpy little room.  I would not recommend this hotel, especially with so many other nearby options.

We come to the KBF hotel a lot. We love Ellery at the front desk, sweet. Yes the rooms are not as hip as some may like but it is comfortable. In the event there is noise they will move your room no problems (only happened a couple if times.) We always eat dinner at Amber Waves and pop into ththe pool and jacuzzi. My daughter and I always create special memories here.
Manager Response: Robyn R,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! We are happy to hear that you always choose us when staying in the area and we can't wait to create more memories with you and your daughter.   -Tyler

Summary: Really old hotel, not a theme hotel, looks like any regular hotel. Breakfast  mediocre (cold eggs, bad coffee). The waitress at the restaurant are really friendly.  My son needs medication that needs to be refrigerated, the receptionist  told me they couldn’t refrigerate for us. I never had any problem in any hotel before with my kid medicine.

I first want to say that you can't get any closer to Knott's Berry Farm.  Easy walk to the park entrance.  We did not use any of the hotels amenities but did check out the fitness center and found it better than the average hotel.    Now the not so good.  I'm not sure if every room is has thin walls but room 217 (the room we stayed in) we heard the kids and tv from the room next door most of the night as we were trying to get some much needed sleep.    Other than the thin walls there was nothing else negative to say about the hotel.

I was disappointed with our stay.  We arrived early to spend the day in the park and were told we would get a text message when our room was ready. This was fine however we went back at 4 as we had no message and 3 grumpy kids and was told our room had been ready for a while just no message had been sent. We found most of the staff rude and the room needed a thorough clean to get rid of dust/dirt. Not a place we would recommend to others.

Summary Heading: Only a block away from the park
Summary: The Knott's Berry Farm Hotel may not be the biggest or fanciest but it gets the job done.  The rooms are pretty basic but clean and decent size.  The restaurant is ok but Snoopy hangs on there sometimes so that makes it kinda cool.  The bar is good, the bartenders were probably some of the best employees I encountered here.  I recommend staying here during Halloween time when they are doing the Scary Farm.  The hotel has special dinners and all the scary characters are wandering around the hotel scaring everyone.  Being as it is the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel they are super close to the park, it just takes a few minutes to walk over.  This is a great option if you want a super close place to stay after a late night in the park.
Manager Response: Aprilp2412,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about all that we have to offer and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We look forward to your next visit.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: Knotts Berry Hotel is nice. Staff treated you very professionally and kind. Arrived at the Hotel early, they didn't have the room ready so once you checked in they send you a text to your phone when you can pick up your key.  Nice touch! Our room was a king size bed with 5 pillows.  Big and comfortable.  Spent the day at the park. Two words: "Magical Christmas!" They have snow at night too!  This hotel a must if going to the park, very close and you use the Hotel parking free. A Perfect outing for a family or a couple like us. ENJOY!
Manager Response: Hi curtisl1963,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We are happy to hear that we added extra cheer to your Knott's Merry Farm experience and we look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: Only if you are going to knotts berry farm
Summary: My indifference for this hotel is evident that I took no photos of my room. The best thing about the hotel is that you can walk to Knotts in minutes. Its a average room but leave your microwave popcorn at home the room have no microwave. The lobby has no microwave . Why?  Microwaves are the cheapest thing you can buy. You can rent a refrigerator which I did not .I used my  ice chest for cold things. They have a restaurant on site but Knotts is next to hotel with more choices.

So, we booked our 1 night stay during Knott's Merry Farm so we could enjoy the evening festivities at the park and not have to drive home with tired cranky kiddos. We arrived early, the morning of our stay, but the email I recieved prior to going stated that we could do an early pop in at the front desk and they would send a text message as soon as the room was ready. As soon as we arrived, the staff was very helpful. We got the check in process out of the way and they gave me a slip to park in the hotel lot. 30 minutes before official check in time, I got the text, so we left the park to go check out the room. When I walked into the lobby, up to the desk, they had my rooms keys ready for me (with ID, of course). No more paperwork.  The room itself was pretty standard, no

This is an older hotel which is convenient to Knott's but really needs to be updated, especially the bath/shower. Clean room and friendly staff. Complimentary coffee in the bar. Lots of parking available and walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm.

We have stayed at Knotts hotel multiple times as we are season pass holders and this is the only really walkable hotel to park.  Although the location is ideal the hotel needs some serious renovation.  The rooms are average and the beds are not amazing comfortable.  Our latest room had a bad odor when the a/c fan was on.  On a previous trip we stayed in the Snoopy room and it was a bit bigger and not quite so dated.   The pool area is good and has a small splash pad for the kids and a jacuzzi.   We will still return to this hotel as it is really nice for a mid-day park break but it definitely could use some work.

Looking for shorter lines, less crowds and fun for the whole family? Then check out Knott's (Merry) Berry Farm for the holidays.   As a kid, I rode the Log Ride the day it opened. While in line, the gentleman ahead of us struck up a conversation with my parents about how he was the engineer who designed the ride. Today, I shared my childhood experience with my granddaughters. Creating family traditions.
Manager Response: Hello V S,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed Knott's Merry Farm, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are so happy to share wonderful traditions with you and your family. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: The location of this hotel could not be more perfect, right next to the wildest rides in the world. The service we received was exemplary and genuinely willing to offer help and advice. The rooms were big, beds comfy and everything was clean. There is a great restaurant serving mammoth dishes with tyrannosaurus sized desserts adjoining the hotel called Amber Waves. We bumped into so many fellow tourists here and shared our hair raising experiences and then we also bumped into Snoopy ! who is actually really cool and gives great hugs and high fives. Our Knotts Berry experience was so good that we are already planning to come back.
Manager Response: Hi Arkadiusz W,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: The room was clean but the walls are thin and you can hear the people on both sides and there complete conversation, word for word. The restaurant in the hotel was very basic. On the last day all of us got sick on the buffet breakfast. We found the service in the restaurant very lacking. Had to get up to get help several times during the dinner we ate there. My food was cold. Not impressed.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience in our restaurant.  I appreciate your comments so we can better our service in the hotel.  We would love to have you back so we can better your experience at our property.  Thank you again

Summary: Unlike most of the hotels in LA, this hotel was clean. Parking not included. Walking distance to the park. We loved the stay. Room service needs to be asked for shampoo and soap as they put only one bar of soap.
Manager Response: Hello Mishel Y,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our top-notch cleanliness, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: This hotel I thought was in an average location, quite far away from main attractions of Los Angeles as virgin holidays offered no other hotel we had to stay here  The room which shocked me didn’t have refrigerator or anything to keep your drinks or snacks cool if you were staying for a long time. We had to get extra ice buckets and fill them and put our drinks in to keep them cool. The tv was good and we could get English football on them as the family didn’t want to miss the game  Didn’t see much of any of the staff so can’t say much for them The pools being salt water really ruined the experience of using them as we just stuck to the hot tub/ spa and couldn’t use the pool to swim and salt water pools are very undesirable in this day and age  This hotel was just overall average
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your comments so we can continue to better our customer service.  We hope to have you back in the future.  Also, our pool is chlorine so I am not sure if someone stated it was Salt.  Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Every year we go to LA to visit family and we love going here instead of other parks, not so crowded when we go and the shows are awesome every time...best amusement park ever!!! Staff are very nice and friendly, love the train robbery show and the saloon show
Manager Response: Hello brownh72,  We’re thrilled to hear that we enhanced your Knott's Berry Farm experience, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good parking and close to park
Summary: The rooms are a little older than I expected few outlets, but convenient and a bar and resuraunt in the lobby. Cast members were friendly, and it appeared to be well maintained, but rooms were small and bathroom even smaller
Manager Response: Hi S C,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: We stayed here for just over a week. The hotel staff were very friendly and it was very welcoming. When we arrived we were asked if we had a floor we would prefer to stay on, we said as high up as possible but they didn't have a huge choice because it was Labor weekend. The room they gave us was very spacious and had quite comfy beds and probably the best pillows i have had in a hotel. But unfortunately we had a room with a connecting door to the room next door and we could hear everything that was going on in that room. A lot of people seem to stay here for just a couple of nights so there was a fast turn around of neighbours including a screaming baby for 2 nights, a man who stood right next to the door whilst shouting at somebody on his phone at 6am in the morning and a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We would love to have you back to stay with us.  Please mention your last stay so we can accommodate your requests needed for a future stay.  We strive to better ourselves from reviews like yours.  Thank you again!

Summary Heading: This Hotel like to kidding guests couple times in a row...
Summary: This Hotel like to kidding guests couple times in a row...  - This hotel charge a parking fee for a handicap vehicle! „discrimination“ - This hotel offer you: AMAZING UPGRADE: $10 extra for a pool view room per night. 😂 - SECOND AMAZING UPGRADE: $15 extra for a high floor room per night. 😂😂  Sorry Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel crew or Managment: SHAME ON YOU for this...  It was our first and last night here...  Good luck with this customer service in the future!
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that your stay was not what you expected.  We strive to assist our guest at the time of their stay.  We would love to have you give us another chance to win back your business.  Please let us know.  Thank you for your review.

Summary: We were in town for a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center and everything surrounding it was out of our price range. Knott's Berry Farm Hotel was the cheapest by far and only a 10-minute drive to the convention center. The hotel itself is a bit out of date despite some renovations that I'm guessing took place in the past few years. We stayed in a standard double queen room. Beds weren't to my taste, but I still slept well enough. Otherwise, the staff were very friendly, the restaurant on the main floor had great food and we got a photo with Snoopy during breakfast. Overall it was a pleasant stay. Not my top choice, but my wallet was happy.
Manager Response: Hello pudgystitch107,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Hotel is right next to the oldest theme park.  Fantistic hugh pool for swimming / jacuzzi.
Summary: You are literately in the parking lot for Knott's Berry Farms!   Just a short walk to the coasters / park.  I loved their SUBURB jacuzzi!   The park itself has a nice array of rides for the day or evening.
Manager Response: Hello Dean A,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient proximity to Knott's Berry Farm, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary Heading: Pretty good, a little dated, but overall OK
Summary: booked here for 2 families with kids, and it was pretty decent.  The staff were helpful, from book in to leaving.  The room was OK, a little dated but OK.  It was clean and tidy, and well priced.  I think families on a budget would appreciate this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are in the process of updating our property the next few years.  Please ask for a newer room on your next visit.

Summary: PROS: great, friendly staff,  personal encounters with Snoopy,  great location(walking distance to the park)  great restaurant on site  CONS: no refrigerator nor microwave no accssible outles in the rooms, Extremely uncomfortable mattresses & pillows  We checked in on Friday evening.  The staff was friendly, knowledgeable & professional. Prior to arriving at the hotel we had stopped at Porto"s across the street for lunch & could not resist buying extra food for later, it was very unfortunate to find that our rooms did not contain a refrigerator nor microwave.  Our kids were desperate to charge their electronic devices but the room only had 1 outlet in the bathroom, on the table lamp & behind the dresser, but after an entire night of being plugged in our phones did not fully
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations.  We are in the process of updating our rooms and some of the items mentioned are being address at that time.  Thank you again

Summary: Came out here to take my family to Knott's Berry Farm theme parks, and it was an amazing experience. We booked in advance and got a great deal on the room and theme park packages which included admission to both parks as well as early entrance.  We had a snoopy themed room and I loved it probably more than my kids, loved having snoopy tuck the kids in at night and loved seeing him around the hotel.   Never had any issues with anything. The only downside is that it's an older hotel and in some places it shows and can use some updating, but overall it was a great experience. This is the only place I will stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Getaway57705198300,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that Snoopy made your stay special and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: The beds are not comfortable, like sleeping on planks.  The pillows flatten as soon as I lay my head on them.  I had to sleep with them staked 2 and 3 high.  They charged us each night for parking and we were awoken early one morning by music from an event they were holding outside our window.  We stayed because we were out all night at the theme parks.  The "mandatory' wake up call was unwelcome.  I know this review won't make much difference, people stay here because of the name,  but it's really just an overpriced cheap hotel.  There are plenty of cheap hotels across the street.  At least at those you know what you're paying for.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear that our property did not meet your expectations.  We really appreciate our review so we can continue to better our property along with our service.   Thank you

Summary: The hotel is a nice environment with good service from staff; although the rooms are slightly tired and could benefit from a slight update (in bedroom furniture and decor, power outlets, etc.). In fact, lack of power outlets was quite an issue with the room.   It is very well located with good access to lots of local services and amenities (and extremely close to Knott’s Berry Farm, as you’d expect).
Manager Response: Hello R B,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that our staff made your stay special, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Wonderful Staff, Perfect for a Visit to Knott's
Summary: I only stayed here for one night so that I could walk to and from Knott's Scary Farm. While the hotel itself feels a bit old, it's very clean and has all the accommodations you could want. The staff at the counter was very nice and answered all questions we had. Really, the best selling point of this hotel is that it's within walking distance of Knott's Berry Farm, so you don't have to deal with parking at the park itself, and walking home at night (I think the Scary Farm ended at 1 am) feels very safe. Downside is that you do have to pay to park (it was $9, which isn't too bad compared to what some hotels charge), but there was plenty of it while we were there and I think that's much cheaper than the park's lot.
Manager Response: Hello 111kristens,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient proximity to Knott's Berry Farm, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: I stayed here for 1 night. The staff was great. I dealt with Ellery for check in and check out. He was SO kind and friendly. The hotel has a great employee.  As for the room, I booked through Priceline. They rated it 3.5⭐️  I think that’s a bit over. My bathroom floor had hair all over it. There were no plugs in the room. I had to put the coffee pot on the bathroom sink. Parking is cheap which, these days is a rarety at most hotels. I’ve attached a photo of their 1 plug. I kinda think it’s NOT up to code.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about the cleanliness of your room.  We would love a chance to win back your business.  Please let us know if you stay again so we can ensure you do not experience the issues you had in the past visit.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Easy access to the park and friendly workers.
Summary: Okay, I have some mixed feelings on this hotel. I will start with the good. The staff was really friendly and helpful and the server we got at the Amber Waves restaurant was great. The lobby was clean and welcoming but the room left a lot to be desired. We upgraded to a Snoopy room and my kids loved it! They thought it was fun to have Snoopy come to say goodnight and really liked the plush dolls they got. As for the room itself, it left a lot to be desired. Our room was clean but the nooks and crannies were dirty. I didn't get a close enough look to see if it was just old or if it was actual dirt. The beds were hard and just felt cheap, you could feel the springs come through. I usually stay in 4-star (or more) accommodations and would put this on par with a 2.5-3 star hotel as
Manager Response: Hi ChrisNAmber,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: Hi! I have been to Knott Berry Farm Hotel this summer with my husband and my small daughter for 6 days. The hotel is clean and quite beautiful, and walking distance to the park (about 10 minutes or less) which is very convenient. The room is big and quite clean and the bathroom is the same, kind of big and clean.The room service was rapid and people working there were nice. I have seen some reviews about noise in the hotel well, it was noisy only on the weekend I think because of the big numbers of people (mostly young people) who come on groups, and during week days we had no noise problem. Overall I enjoyed my staying there.
Manager Response: Hedia S,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that we enhanced your Knott's Berry Farm experience and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary: This is a great hotel. You can walk into Knott's Berry Farm. It is only 10 Minutes to Disneyland by Car or take the Hotel Shuttle. It is Free. They have up graded the rooms. I just wish the over sized room had a microwave for warming up leftover Boysenberry pie. Free coffee in the Restaurant. How ever the Amber Waves restaurant is not that great. Walk down to TGI Fridays.
Manager Response: Hello John95758,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel.  Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: As other reviewers have mentioned, the hotel is aging a bit.  Especially noticeable in the bathrooms.  Lobby and restaurant seem to be kept up to date better.  Nice staff.  Room seemed clean, beds were comfortable. First night was quiet, second night we had new people next door and found out the walls were pretty thin.  Luckily they quieted down at a reasonable hour.  Refrigerators are not included in standard rooms. WiFi is in not great. Slow & not always connected.  Best thing is location - next door to the park, very short walk.  Pool looked nice & heated, but we didn't get in.  We opted for the breakfast buffet as part of our package just for convenience, even though it was not reviewed highly.  First morning was so-so.  Not much variety offered, and food was adequate, not
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are going to be in updating our product the next couple of years and look forward to your return.

Summary: We heard about Knotts Berry from a friend and assumed it was just a theme park, nope, it also has a hotel - with not only standard rooms but a themed Snoopy room!   We of course booked a Snoopy room, and arrived to find easy parking (with a lovely parking attendant lady happy to direct us where to park and also let us know we could drop our luggage off and pre-check in as we got there early)   We then wandered up to Walmart and came back a few hours later when the room was ready. Not gonna lie, my son and I may have squealed to see a cuddly Snoopy on the bed to keep!  The room itself is dated but was clean and comfortable, the hotel doesn't sell it self as anything other than what it is  Just after 8pm Snoopy comes to tuck you in, but since I'm not a kid I just wanted a photo
Manager Response: We are very happy that you and your son had a great time here at our property.  We hope to see you sometime in the future.  Thank you for your review!

Summary: We’ve recently returned from our 2 week stay at knotts Berry farm hotel, we mainly stayed here as it was close to the park, slightly disappointed how park tickets are not included in the hotel and there’s not really much of a discount, think it worked out at about 4 dollars each, upon first arrival the room was really clean and the beds were really comfy, I read a few reviews on people complaining there weren’t enough plug sockets in the room, there were 2 extension leads with about 8 sockets on each and sockets on each of the lamps, so there’s plenty. The first few days in the hotel were relaxed and it was quiet, then we experienced our first wedding... if we had known the hotel was used for weddings I don’t think we would of stayed, it was absolutely rammed, to the point where
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am glad you liked our property overall.  Sorry to hear about your experience with the Wedding events we had that night.  We hope you will visit again.

Summary Heading: A moderate hotel but you can't get closer to KBF park.
Summary: I have stayed here a few times in the past as well as recently. Of all easy walking distance hotels to KBF, this one is the closest and truly the best, although it's a basic hotel. They do like to nickel and dime you, like everyone these days. Parking is about $21/day, early check-in $21, late check-out $21, high floor $15/day, pool view $10/day, the bottle of water in the room $4.50. Believe it or not, the in-room WiFi is free. I checked in slightly after the 4 pm time posted and the line went the length of the lobby, probably because this was a Sat of the Halloween Haunt and everyone was arriving in droves. The line quite quickly and they nicely decorate the hotel and even have some 'monsters' roaming to keep folks entertained. I did not in the restaurant Amber Waves this time
Manager Response: James L,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about all that we have to offer and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We look forward to your next visit.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: As with all reviews, a 5 rating is possible.   This hotel, is not new. However staff is great, you can see the love they have for the customers and location.   I was at another hotel ... this location should have been my first choice.   If you have kids, is super for your little ones. Characters can even be seen in the lobby.   Great choice, great staff, great location !
Manager Response: Hi Kevin M,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: My wife and I went to the scare fest first day. We stayed in a room in Camp Snoopy.  The room was really nice and hat a lot of Snoopy and Woodstock reliefs on the walls. There was also a free Snoopy plushy.  Our package included a buffet dinner and breakfast which were both good although one thing that we would have expected to have given this was a Berry Farm was some fresh berries which were missing except in one pie dish.  The scare fest was very scary and enjoyable, although i would advise everyone who goes to get the fast passes as they allow you to avoid any long queues. The acting was excellent and we really enjoyed ourselves.   The only negative thing about the hotel was that the bathrooms were a bit dated, and the aircon system was also rather old.    The service and
Manager Response: Hello CurlyHongKong,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you met Snoopy, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: a hotel without berries but is not a farm!
Summary: Checking in is a breeze with nice and accommodating employees. Needs more "bellboys to help with luggages. Rooms are clean as well as the bedsheets. Very nice location. Needs transportation to and from airport for tourists/guests even with additional fees for convenience.
Manager Response: Bayani E,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and we hope to see you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: I stayed here with family for 4 nights, we checked in quite late and had a lovely welcome from Keith on reception, he was very nice and instantly made us feel welcome to the hotel, The hotel rooms are very comfortable and clean, we used the theme park and had a great time there, The pool area was spotlessly clean and quiet, I also used the sauna, which was good.  I would thoroughly recommend this hotel as one of the best we have stayed in, it has such a friendly atmosphere from staff. The hotel isn’t too far from shops and other theme parks. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Linda H,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review.  We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: Went for The Scarey farm on a sunday night
Summary: The hotel was very nice. We got the room at the hotel so we could party a little and then go over to Knotts scarey farm. Its a hoot, but lines can be long even on a sunday. We had a lot of fun tho and enjoyed our selves.
Manager Response: Hello Rickczap,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that we enhanced your park experience, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: We booked fairly last minute, within a week, and had a great double queen room on the 6th floor. We went for the day and night for Knotts Scary Farm and staying at the hotel made this an absolute breeze. The back door is literally a 5 minute walk from the gate, and is kept well lit and very secure. The fitness center even keeps some great hours and has a better selection of equipment and weights than I've seen at many hotels. To top it all off the in-house restaurant had great food and the prices weren't at all outrageous. We had a rowdy neighbor the last night, but security was fairly quick at addressing it and all in all we had a great stay - would definitely book again.
Manager Response: Hello ChrisH11310,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our on-site amenities, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel.  Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: We went to Knott's Berry Farm for our Granddaughter's 8th Birthday. This Hotel was a 5 minute walk away. It was reasonably priced and very clean. The rooms were a good size. We were able to get adjoining rooms which was great since there were eight of us.There was also a visit from Snoopy !
Manager Response: Hello jdsandoval,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that we made you grandaughters 8th birthday a great one, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: My husband and I spent two nights here to celebrate a birthday.  The experience was a mixed bag.  On the plus side, the hotel is very convenient to Knott's Berry Farm park - which was awesome and Mrs. Knott's Chicken Dinner - which was also awesome!  All the staff were very friendly, courteous and well trained.  GREAT customer service!  Food quality at the Amber Waves breakfast buffet was good: excellent potatoes, bacon and Denver style scrambled eggs.  And you can get a good package deal on a room, park entry and breakfast.    On the down side the room could have used a little more attention.  We travel a lot and notice things that could make a stay more convenient.  A small towel rack by the bathroom sink would have been nice.  As would have a waste paper basket in the
Manager Response: Thank your for review of our property. Glad that your enjoyed you stay.  I apologize that your room wasn't completed upon your return.  We do have staff here till 6pm and I am sure it was going to be refreshed.  Please let our Manager know next time you stay and we will ensure this does not happen. .

Summary: Had a wonderful time . Great price . Awesome hotel.Spent day at Knotts later swimming at Hotel . Kids loved hot fudge Sunday room service . Then went swimming again in morning.We have passes and will stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Elizabeth D,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our outdoor pool, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: We checked on last night.  Been here 1 night.  1 to go...  Just walked into our room at 10p.  Two exhausted kids.  Ready to shower them and crash.  No house cleaning... no sheets on the bed.  No towels... just nothing.  Amazing.  Call the front desk.  No answer.  Walk down there... there are two ladies talking to the only employee on duty (which is understandably why she couldn't answer the phone)... the ladies are complaining that their two rooms were also not cleaned up and they have no towels, no clean up, etc...  So I tell my sad tale, some on apologizes, and eventually we can put our kids down at some point.   This is a stupid problem to have to complain about.  It's not like I'm complaining my towels aren't white enough or the pillow isn't straight... I'm literally asking

I love this hotel staff is very helpful and welcoming I was greeted by Ellery and he was so helpful . You can walk into the park and walk to the gift shops and restaurants. I have already talked to my daughter about coming back . Rooms are spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Hello tucsongirl2012,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take the time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you utilized our convenient location, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Best location for the park, great service
Summary: I stayed at KBF hotel just one night, as I wanted to do the theme parks and figured it would be the best location. I took a package in a Snoopy theme room, and it included my ticket to the park. The hotel isnt brand new but it is impeccably clean and very comfortable. What made it great is the service. Every single member of staff has been amazing.  Very genuinely nice people. SPOILER: the hotel will provide a Snoopy visit to rooms before sleep, some Snoopy stuffed toy, and Snoopy will again visit during breakfast. This was a complete surprise to me and made my visit so lovely! I loved it! I imagine kids would be amazed. Breakfast included in room rate is basic but good. Highly recommend this hotel, I would stay again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Hi HellianaDS,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: Our third stay at Knott’s Berry – love it!!!
Summary: We have stayed at knott’s berry farm hotel three times for our holiday in California.   All desk staff and bell boys are fabulous and couldn’t do enough for you.   Free bus shuttle to Disneyland, what more can you ask for?   Will definitely be back. Such a friendly and welcoming atmosphere from start to finish.   The location is lovely and plenty to do around Beuna Park and helpful staff when you need advice.   Can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Hi emma b,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review.  We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: If all you want is a basic 3 star hotel near Knotts Berry Farm then please don’t let this review put you off. We usually stay on Harbor near Disney but I am fed up with being overcharged for parking so we decided to stay here for a change and buy season passes for the park and use the free shuttle for Disney (I will get onto the free shuttle later). The hotel is basic, the rooms are basic and it doesn’t feel anything to do with Knotts apart from seeing Snoopy at random times in the lobby. I can’t really find anything positive to say about the hotel. It looks tired, the person who checked us in couldn’t have been less helpful. The cleaner keeps mucking about with the air conditioning making the room feel like the arctic when I had it set at a comfortable temperature. They run the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I apologize that your had an issue with transportation during your stay.   We will be looking into your experience to ensure that we continue to better our operations from your review.  We are going under renovations the next couple of years and hope you give us a chance to win your business back.

Summary: The hotel rooms were ok. The best thing about it was the location. I can appreciate that they have kept it in its original style but, it's time for it to be updated. I felt like we were a little underserved at the price point. I am not sure I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are working on renovating our property the next couple of years.  We would love to see you back!

Summary: Our first trip to LA. (bear with we are from the UK) Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel is a nice  place. It feels like a proper holiday hotel. We loved it here. After flying in from San Francisco, we were excited to explore Los Angeles. This was during the fabulous Halloween season. With its theme park next door and parties it’s ideal. Traffic getting back in the evenings was bad, we spent over 3 hours one evening driving back from Universal Studios. But this is just L.A. traffic. No bother though. An adventure and fun with Family.  The buffet breakfast was great. Service superb. French toast, bacon, freshly squeezed orange etc. We really did feel at home here doing our laundry. Pool area was nice too. Rooms comfortable and clean. Halloween cocktails and pretzels with mustard dip were
Manager Response: Claudsville,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your first L.A. experience and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We hope to see you again soon.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary Heading: Stayed here a total of three nights, two visits
Summary: This hotel is a fun place to stay. It is right next door to the park.   Both rooms we stayed in were clean and neat. There was conditioning shampoo and lotion as amenities. The soap bars were massage bars.   The wall unit ac works very well. I was glad it did as the days were in the 90’s.   The staff was super friendly, everyone from the housekeeping staff to the front desk were smiling and helpful.  The beds were both comfortable but the pillows are standard size, aka small. This bothered my husband but I was unconcerned by this. There was a choice of firmness in them. No out call laundry but they do have self service.   There is a sauna and a steam room in the workout center. There is a large pool, decent sized jacuzzi and a splash zone for kids. Towels are provided at both
Manager Response: Hi Jessicarbt,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: The room was "adequate", but not huge.  Amenities were good and the staff very helpful.  Restaurant food was good too, if fairly basic.  The location is great - an excellent (free) shuttle service to Disneyland and walkable to Knott's Berry Farm.  In terms of value for money in this area it was excellent.  I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Hello RAFwherever,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: When I booked the hotel it said on the website that breakfast was included. Got to hotel and was told breakfast was not included through a third party booking. I brought up my reservation and showed it to them. He called over the supervisor and they both agreed that it was included and to pick up our vouchers when we returned that night. A few hours later I get a call from a different supervisor telling me breakfast was not included and if I have a problem to call the company I booked with. We went back and forth for several minutes and they would not honor what my reservation said. When we went to the hotel that evening I mentioned it again and said the reason we booked there was because breakfast was included.  I told him that we would not be returning again and that it was
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience.  Please contact Luz in my office to book your reservation if you decide to come back.  We would love to win back your business.  Again, I appoligize and we have addressed the issue with the third party.

Summary Heading: Good place to be, especially if you're visiting the park.
Summary: Did not plan on staying here, but we were in the area and the price for the location was one of the best around on a Tuesday night.  I'm giving this a 4/5 not because it lacked anything... but to be a 5/5 I would expect above and beyond. Great room, comfy bed, super clean.  A fridge and microwave would be nice, and really in the room there's no indication that it's a theme park hotel.  Parking is extra, it'd be nice to have it included.  Make sure to visit the hotel bar though, Mike the bartender is FANTASTIC, is great to talk to, makes amazing drinks, and even had great food recommendations.  He gets a 10 on a 1 to 5 scale.  Overall a good stay and would be happy to stay here if I'm in the area again.
Manager Response: Hi Beatrice C,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. Mike will be thrilled to hear that he made your stay special. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: Booked a package room at the hotel 3 days ago and was charged a $50 deposit. Document states that the deposit is non refundable if cancelled anytime after booking.  Unfortunately a personal problem came up that will prohibit my wife and I from going on this trip so I had to cancel.  When I called I was told that they are keeping the $50 and that it was truly non refundable, even in my situation.  Although I knew the policy, I did hope for some type of accommodation, as it was our first experience with this hotel. Not the case. The only accommodation was I would have six months to use the $50 but only at the hotel. Would not apply to anything else Knott’s related. Very frustrating.  Writing this review to tell others to watch their documents closely when booking here. It’s

It doesn't get better than this if you plan on visiting Knott's or Soak City.  Literally steps away from both park gates, you can't stay any closer.  Not many hotels in this price range offer a gift shop, restaurant and pool with splash pad.  Peanuts characters were seen frequenting the onsite Amber Waves restaurant which really added to onsite resort feel of the property.  With everything going on, noise was never an issue. The room was clean and up to date on furnishings and decorations.  Overall I was very impressed with the value this hotel offered.
Manager Response: Hello JWhyJ,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our convenience to Knott's Berry Farm, and hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: Two night stop whilst visiting the fantastic theme park and okay water park. Parking charges apply but your ticket is good for the theme park car parks.
