No breakfast included, tired room with ancient noisy aircon. Noise from adjacent rooms carried easily, great big twin beds. Just old and tired by UK standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are in the middle of updating our rooms the next couple of years.  Please ask for a new room when you are back in the area.

Summary: We stayed at the Knott’s Berry Farm hotel for our summer holidays and I must say we found the hotel to very accommodating. The staff was very polite and always at hand and ready to help with anything. We met and took pictures with snoopy which made my son very happy. The hotel is situated right in the centre of many theme parks. The provide a free shuttle taking guests to Disney land and back. The also have their own very theme park and water park which we explored and found to be very entertaining. Will definitely stay here again and recommend to family and friends. We also enjoyed the very popular Mrs Knotts chicken dinner.
Manager Response: Hi cynthiaigwe,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: An older hotel once the Raddisson hotel. Rooms are a bit musty as is the hall ways. We stay here every year because they offer package deals for their Knotts Scary Farm event. Tthe bar/ restaurant always has decorations to carry on the flair as well as the pre scare buffet is delicious.

Stayed one night in a Camp Snoopy Room.   Cute Peanuts wall decorations in the hallway of the Camp Snoopy wing.  The room also has very cute wall decorations (Snoopy and Woodstock)  We took 2 plush Snoopys (wearing lime green t shirts) home with us.  Room in serious need of an update. My son insisted on wearing his slippers in the room as the carpet was scary looking.  Pros -plenty of parking spaces  -several parking spaces for those with disability placards -felt safe -friendly and helpful front desk staff -Snoopy (wearing a nightgown and a nightcap on his head) appeared just after 8pm to tuck my son in for the night  -can take photos with Chef Snoopy outside the Amber Waves Restaurant during certain times in the morning and the evening -located within walking distance to
Manager Response: Hello lglbgl,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed meeting Snoopy, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary Heading: Unspectacular but safe, clean, and close to Knotts
Summary: I'm used to staying at boutique style properties, so the aesthetic seemed very rote and uninspired to me. The guest room was dark and needs a remodel. It was clean though, and the walls are thick-- so screaming kids probably won't wake you up during the night. The staff was very pleasant and clearly well trained in hospitality. We may only stay there in a pinch if we need to be close to Knotts. The hotel parking lot is actually the closest lot to the park so the walk to the main gate takes less than 5 minutes. The pool, although we didn't venture in due to the crowds already there, was a popular spot and looked like fun. There is a kids splash area next to the pool for the little ones.

Summary Heading: Smelly Damp room and dirty pool area
Summary: Firstly I would have given the hotel just the 1 rating instead of 2 if it wasn't for the friendly reception of the staff on the car park and the friendly reception we got at reception.  Now onto the reveiw of the hotel from check-in, room, facilities at the hotel & checkout.  Check-in On arriving at the hotel I thought excellent made a great choice here as everyone seemed so friendly from the friendly welcome from the members of staff at the hotel entrance, and the warm welcome to Knott's Berry Farm from the reception staff, but then the disappointment quickly came and Virgin Holidays are probably partly to blame also, we had been up since 5am UK time and we were then told sorry your room won't be ready until at least 4pm, I highlighted that our children were completely

I enjoyed my stay here. The room while slightly outdated was clean and comfortable. No refrigerator or microwave. The staff was very friendly. Breakfast buffet was great. We were there for 5 days and the menu didn't  change, eggs, bacon, pastries, fresh fruit, cereal, french toast. The hotel is with in walking distance to several stores. The pool and surrounding area was kept clean. Really missed having a fridge though.
Manager Response: Hello carmens826,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our breakfast buffet, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: Great Hotel to Visit If You're Going to the Knott's Parks
Summary: This hotel surprised me since I'm not a fan of the other hotel in the Cedar Fair chain, but I have to say I enjoyed my stay.  Staff is great, rooms are nice and the facilities are in good shape.  It's a quick walk to all of the parks and very easy to do.  Restaurant is nice as well.
Manager Response: Hello joemess44,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: So excited when we pulled in and Arthur the man at the gate was cheerful and welcoming!! He asked if we had been before and when we said "no", he said "well welcome and expect the red carpet treatment!!!". Unfortunately, that was the best part of our stay!!   I booked this hotel so we could enjoy the park for 2 half days during our trip to LA. Upon check in I was asked for the booking credit card which I did not have.  I had to refund that card and charge one I had with me.  Not an expense I was expecting.   I said if this was a hotel policy,  why wasn't its importance indicated in the 4 emails I received on my upcoming stay.  The opportunity to upgrade (and by upgrade I mean having a fridge or microwave or snoopy stuffed animal).....I was informed it was in an attachment in the

This was advertised as a 4 star hotel by Virgin. The hotel staff were very pleasant and could nt do enough for you, however the rooms are dated. I think it's in need of a refurb. The room was ok apart from there being a lot of dust behind the bedside table, it clearly hadn't been cleaned for sometime. Also terrible smell of drains every time the tap was used in the vanity unit. Didn't spoil our stay as we only really slept in the room but don't think its worth 4 stars.

We got an excellent AAA package which included a breakfast buffet. We absolutely loved the hours. They didn't end early not a huge selection but very adequate. OJ was fresh squeezed and the service was very good. Nice spacious clean rooms. Very close to the Knott's attractions.
Manager Response: MizKChandler,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your meal at Amber Waves and we look forward to your next visit.  -Tyler

Summary: My wife planned a vacation for the family many months back that included a stay at Knott's Hotel along with visits to Soak City and Knott's Berry Farm. I utilized my Military Pass and it helped with overall cost of trip. We booked 3 rooms total. We had to make a last minute change and change worked out great. We ate at Amber Wave Restaurant and were really surprised at the quality and service. Most excellent. We really enjoyed the extra security at entrance when it came to parking.   The only down side was the first nite. The hotel was over run with LOUD cheerleaders. We had to call security a number of times to assist with the issue. With that being said it was a great visit to The Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. Great staff and service.
Manager Response: Hello Rondo,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed Amber Waves, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: The room was not the best though we requested pool view days prior we still got parking lot view at arrival. The restroom door did not work we asked for service to repair it and they did not we had to repair it our self.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your saervice issue.  We are in the process the next few years of renovation.  We hope we can see you again. Thank you

Summary: We had an excellent stay in knotts hotel! The staff at front desk marilou is awesome! She gave us an excellent customer service! We are very pleased with our stay! She is working night shift and very busy but she is  calm and very accomodating.
Manager Response: Hi lyrehs09,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: We really enjoyed ourselves at Knotts Berry Farm.  We enjoyed the food at the Ghost Time Bakery.  When we left the park, we took our order of chicken from Chicken to Go back to the hotel.  The food and entertainment was great, won't hesitate to go again.
Manager Response: Hello es123578,  We’re thrilled we enhanced your park experience, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: I'll give it two stars because the service at the front desk was excellent, and the proximity to both parks was awesome. Pulling up to the hotel I was impressed, the landscaping and exterior were very nice. I felt the same way about the lobby. Our room wan't ready; so we headed to the park. They texted me within a few hours informing me the room was set. We didn't check in to the room until almost 9:00 that night after a great day at the park. We were all exhausted and wanted to shower.   My key was waiting at reception and we headed to our room on the 5th floor. I have to tell you I was shocked. The room was very outdated, I mean probably the original everything. Although I am sure the room had been cleaned the tile in the bathroom was disgusting, and the shower/bath tub was
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience with one of the rooms here.  We are in the process of updating the new few years.  We would love for you to let us have the chance to win back your business.  Please ask for one of the rooms we are already in the process of updating if you return.  Hope to see you again! Thank you

Summary: What can I say.....well wonderful hotel. Right on the doorstep of the Knott’s Berry Farm theme park. Buy your tickets at the hotel. Much cheaper!! Rooms very tidy. Swimming pool great size and open till 23:00. Used the shuttle bus (free) to Disney. Free WiFi works really well. Food in restaurant seems good value.
Manager Response: Hello Pete,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced the many amenities that we offer, and we hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: A family of 4 of us stayed here for a week last month... the staff were lovely hotel was pleasant and provide a shuttle bus to disney. We didn't use the park or the swimming pool as we were too busy being tourists but from the outside it looked great.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. During your next stay, you should try Knott's Berry Farm amusement park. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: This Hotel is horrible. First off the rooms are outdated. The beds are not comfortable. There are NO fridges in the room. My biggest complaint is room service. It closes at 11 pm along with the in dining restaurant. So when the park closes and we come here hungry we have zero options for food. The front desk suggested I call Dominos pizza. I was shocked!! I guess you get what you pay for. Also my nephew used the pool for about 5 min said it smelled of urine. I will not be returning back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience at our property.  We are in the process of updating our rooms and property the next few years.  we will look at other options for food after 11pm from your review too.  Thank you again for review.  We always strive to make our service better!

Summary: Knotts Berry Farm Hotel was a lovely place to stay at. The staff were helpful and friendly. The only downside is that this is a very dated hotel and the place can do with an upgrade. It is also quite a distance from Los Angeles and unless you're prepared to pay up to USD 95 for a cab the public transportation to the city is slow and will take you very long to get to where you need to be. Thankfully we had a city tour of Hollywood booked so that helped alot and we also used Uber to get around but don't waste your time with busses or trains trying to get to downtown LA. Traffic is congested so best to use Uber or a cab
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our property.  We are in the process of getting our property remodeled the next few years.  The next time you visit, please see our Bell Desk for transportation due to they can get you the best rate.  Uber or Lyft, as you said, is the best way to get around.  Thank you again!

Summary: This Hotel is a little on the dated side but it was just fine for a 1 or 2 nights stay. The rooms were basic but clean and comfortable. One thing that was weird was although they provided coffee in the room, there was no place to plug it in. The on site restaurant was actually pretty good. We had the Chicken Quesadilla and the Coconut Shrimp. Both were good with the Shrimp being fantastic! Early entry and free parking are nice perks plus being so close to the park makes it very convenient. Overall a good and recommended hotel, especially if you're a season pass holder.
Manager Response: Michael,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed Amber Waves and we hope to see you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: Really good sized rooms, could be cleaner but fresh towels daily, excellent helpful staff. Great location and at the theme park. Just in need of a minor refurb but great as a base. We were driving, the parking is free and it’s close to all the highways so easy for seeing all the sights. The hotel has all you need and plenty of shops bars etc around it.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review!  We will be remodeling the next few years which we have already started stage 1.  Hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Kid Friendly, Great Location, Friendly Staff
Summary: I'll have to admit that I did not know that Knott's Berry Farm had a hotel, but was pleasantly surprised by our accommodations.  Walking distance from the main gate which was convenient for our kids naps.  Included a free breakfast buffet every morning and a Snoopy plush for the kids.  Snoopy even made an appearance each night to tuck the kids into bed.  Hotel was clean, well maintained and the price was fair.
Manager Response: Hello Jeff,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed your visits from Snoopy, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: Came here for the second time in 3 years. It sits right in the middle of everything we’re interested in. Next door to the park, across the street from soak city, down the road from the knights of the round table dinner show, and maybe a 30 minute drive down Beach Blvd. to Huntington Beach. Snoopy roams the hotel lobby visiting kids.
Manager Response: Hello Steve,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you utilized our convenient location, and hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: + knott's berry farm hotel is about five minutes walking distance to knott's berry farm and soak city, that's why we chose it.   - However, we asked three staff how to get to soak city from the hotel, they all assumed we know there's an underpass to get to soak city, which we mistakenly assumed the underpass of the Ghost ride as the underpass leading to soak city, and we ended up going on the road, taking an extra 20 minutes walking on the sidewalk in our swimming suits feeling foolish, to get to soak city. They need to have signs showing tourist how to get to KBF and KBFSC.  + The hotel offers complimentary parking, which a lot of other hotels don't (Hyatt regency orange county charge $28/day) which is a plus (KBF park parking is $19/day).   + I purchased season passes for my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I will forward your comment to the park about the signage request and look into the bedding issue.  We hope to see you in the near future!   Thank you again Don

Summary: While the Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel isn’t trying to impress with glitz and glam, it’s priced right!  Many hotels in this park attractions area of Orange County are very expensive.  Knott’s provides a basic hotel with nice pool (and play-n-splash zone for kids) at a price point that won’t break the budget.  Plus, it’s conveniently located within a five-minute walk to the park or a 15-Minute drive to Disney.  Try booking a package with the hotel, and you will save overall.
Manager Response: Kamiahkid,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself!  We are happy to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: The check inn an service was not very good wasn’t the worst but I really believe it should have been better but overall it  was ok the was mostly clean but wasn’t the cleanest maybe it was a holiday maybe that is why the hostel an the service wasn’t the best
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your comments so we can make sure we continue to build on our service.

Summary Heading: Really nice hotel for the price
Summary: I knew this was going to be great as soon as Arthur at the parking gate greeted us. He was such a wonderful first impression!! Our room was clean, beds were comfortable and the staff was amazing. They went out of their way to make sure we were happy. We felt like VIPs even though we had only rented a standard room! I had to call down to the desk for extra towels and coffee and they were so quick to bring it up! I would stay here again without hesitation!
Manager Response: Hi Cyndic,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: This is our third time staying at the Knott's hotel, and by far the best experience!  We were placed in a newly renovated room close by the pool.  We were excited about this because the pool at this hotel is huge, and has a separate water play area for smaller children.  Our room was so clean and comfortable.  We loved walking around the smaller shops in the evening, and the Amber Waves was perfect for dinner.  Great stay!!
Manager Response: Hello Petra,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our Pool area, and hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary: Our favorite place to stay when visiting Knott’s Berry Farm. We stay here several times a year. Walking distance to park and shopping, dining. We park and don’t move car until we leave. Snoopy was in PJs in lobby at night and stops in at restaurant located in hotel during breakfast. Friendly staff and allows early check in even when room not ready so you can enjoy the park. They will send text message when room ready. Great pool area that is very large compared to others with many lounge chairs, large pool, hot tub and a water spray play area for kids.
Manager Response: Hello Kathy,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoy all that we have to offer when you visit. Thank you for your continuing loyalty, we can't wait to see you back again soon.  -Tyler

Summary: We stayed here with our two teenage grandsons in a two-queen bed room for two nights last week. We were very disappointed in the condition of the room as well as it being overpriced for the room and the restaurant. Our room was not ready when we arrived but we were told they would text me as soon as it was ready. At 6PM I finally called the hotel to check only to find out that they forgot to text me! Our room door's deadbolt lock did not lock, the toliet did not flush, there is no refrigerator or microwave in the room, nor is there even a little table with a couple chairs. Only a small desk. The vanity area is very small with no towel ring and only a tiny complimentary bottle of shampoo and lotion. The walls are very thin so you hear every word that your neighbors say.  We
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I appoligize for the couple issues during your stay.  We always strive to make your experience a memorable one and would like a chance to win your business back the next time you are in town for Knott's Berry Farm.  Please contact Luz in my Executive Office and she can get you upgraded on your next stay.  Thank you again Don Prescott

Summary: Front desk was always friendly even though it seemed like a rough day in hospitality the day we checked in. Room was a bit small but did it’s job (place to sleep and shower) The walls are pretty thin and we had an adjoining door in our room and a young one next door kept messing with it on their side. The TV didn’t work but it was just unplugged? Amber Waves was ok we only ate breakfast and we called it in and picked it up ourselves instead of room service (was faster by 30 min). Location location location. The short walk to Knott’s was amazing and a short drive to all kinds of strip centers with eateries and shopping. Would I stay again? Only if I was going to Knott’s and only for the days I was going (which we did exactly that) Service was friendly, beds comfy, location is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your opinion so we can continue to build our product.  We look forward to your return visit.

Summary: My husband and daughter are traveling to Southern CA this weekend and I wanted to surprise them with a night at the hotel and tickets to the park, only to learn that I can't pay for it all with my card if I'm not actually the one checking in! How backward is that? I'm paying for it all, in full, and was told my husband will have to pay and they'll refund me after he checks in. Customer service/front desk was unwilling to assist and kept quoting 'hotel policy.' A surprise gone horribly wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I appoligize that you were unable to surprise your daughter due to the payment.  These policies are in place to protect our card holders.  Next time, we can set this up two weeks in advance.  Not sure when your reservation was made, but we do have that option due to we do require the card holder to be present if this hasn't been setup prior.  Again, I appoligize if there was any miscommunication.

Summary Heading: Our visit to the Berry Farm
Summary: My wife and I stayed here earlier this month , June 2018. We didn’t have time to see the amusement park, but we got to at least see the hotel. The history of Knott’s Berry Farm was very interesting and growing up in California on a farm, I totally related to this.  The accommodations were average to good, not extravagant but comfortable. Perfect if we just needed a bed after a long day in the park. We were all the way at the end of the hall, facing the pool. A little loud , but I would have loved to have been down there swimming with everyone!! ;( I’m disabled and it was late so I didn’t!!! Out of our month long trip, this was the end of the line. We didn’t want to come back home;(!!!  This hotel is interesting because it is one if a kind, not part of a chain.             Thank
Manager Response: Eric,  All of us here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel love to hear from guests like yourself! Thank you for staying with us. The next time that you visit you should definitely check out Knott's Berry Farm.  -Tyler

Summary: We stayed at the Knott's Berry Farm hotel this past weekend.  We booked a package with a Snoopy themed room and tickets to the park.  We pre-registered at 10am and picked up our tickets and got our parking pass.  We had a very short walk to the park and at 1:00 pm we got the text that our room was ready.We headed to our room to unload our car and take a break from the park.  The room is very basic but clean and themed well.  The beds were every uncomfortable but we were only there one night so we didn't mind.  The best part was Snoopy coming to the room to tuck in our son.  He was on cloud 9 after that and it was really cute and worth the upgrade to see your kid that happy.  We had planned to go to the water park on day 2 but it was a little too cold so we just went to breakfast
Manager Response: Hi Mrsrobinburke,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. Snoopy looks forward to seeing you again next time!  Thank you, Tyler

Summary Heading: To many people for me this time
Summary: I love this place but over memorial weekend it was way to busy and I could not get into the jacuzzi it was full of kids. I will return and update my trip. Knotts upgraded me for a night coming up on my next trip because I was put in a room next to the service dept and could not sleep. Lets try it again for the 4th of July.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to your visit on the 4th of July. Have a great trip.

Summary: My experience pretty much echoed recent reviews.   The furniture is very worn/dated but the rooms are pretty clean.   I noticed some rooms have slightly newer furniture but still not new.  The beds and linens were acceptable.  Breakfast buffet included eggs, bacon, potatoes, French toast, and some really tasty oatmeal (no sliced bread for toast or bagels though).     The parking lot was right in front with an attendant.   The location was great, a short walk from both KBF and Soak City parks.   Some nice dining options like Porto's within short drive.  Good size on site pool was also a plus.
Manager Response: Hello Bobafan,  Thank you for the kind review. The Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel team appreciates when our guests take time to provide feedback about their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you experienced our breakfast buffet, and hope to see you again soon!  -Tyler

Summary Heading: A Very Pleasanty Stay In A Great Location
Summary: During our recent trip to Southern California, we stayed at the Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel in Buena Park. We had known of the hotel from our previous visits to the park and even attended a press Halloween Horror Nights reception there a few years back but never had the chance to stay as a guest until now.  Our check in was very easy and it was nice to have our own parking area so close to the hotel as the surrounding lots can get busy with park guests and shoppers. Our room was very clean and inviting and featured a King bed along with a flat screen television with lots of channels available for us to select from.  The room had a comfy chair as well as a nice work desk and the free Wi-Fi was quite good and allowed us to take care of all of our work and online needs without any
Manager Response: Garethmb,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your visit and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! We hope to see you again soon.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: Well where do we start with this one! Firstly, it must be said although we didn't have a great experience with the hotel and the room, Ruby the manager did handle the situation excellent and agreed to honour to cancel our booking without charge.  The room was very small, nothing more than a box room with a bed squeezed in and a small bathroom off to the side. There's certainly no room for activities in here!  The room and/or hotel is in need of modernisation. There is a lot of signs of wear and tear. Wires were on show, dust to be seen wherever you looked, sockets hanging off the wall, mould in the bathroom as-well as chipped tiles.  The location of the hotel seemed absolutely excellent, as you would expect with it being the "on-site" hotel as such for Knotts Berry Farm. It
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Sorry to hear about the room type you were booked for at our property.  Next time, please call us direct and we will make sure you recieve the right room type which we offer same rates as our third parties .  Look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We enjoyed our 2-night stay here.  We found the staff to be super friendly, the location was great for our visit to Knott's Berry Farm and the price was a good value. The pool was huge, the kids really enjoyed that.  The rooms were dated and could use some updating and more power outlets.  We had to charge some of our devices in the bathroom. The walls are thin too and you can hear everything in the rooms around you.  We did not have high expectations considering the price for what we got.  We have been to another theme park in the area and the cost of our entire stay at Knott's (hotel and park passes) was less than 1 day in the park at the other place.
Manager Response: Hello Brandie,  We’re happy to hear that you found value in your decision to stay with us, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: We stayed here because of the proximity to Knotts Berry Farm and Medieval Times.  We were in adjoining double queen rooms. The location, staff and breakfast are fine.  The pool area is just average (spa therapy jets not working).  However, the rooms and housekeeping leave a lot to be desired. The lobby and front desk area look great, but the rooms are in very poor condition. The furniture is in real bad shape.  I asked the manager to show us other room options and she showed us another room on a different floor, and it was just as bad.  I expressed my displeasure. Then, as we turned down one of the queen beds on our first night, we found a piece of pizza crust under one of the pillows that was propped up against the headboard!!!!!  I talked to the same manage again the next day
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I appoligize for your experience with the cleanliness of the room.  I would love if you would contact Luz in my office to go over your experience more and so we can make your next experience better.  We are in the middle of getting our rooms updated the next couple of years.  Look for forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I booked a 2 queen room online. We arrived at the hotel around 9:00 pm and upon our arrival the front desk told me that they are sold out of 2 queen rooms. I insisted I booked a 2 queen room and asked them to figure out a solution for me. They said "that's not what our system is showing" and basically told me "too bad" and "unfortunately nothing we can do". YIKES! Completely horrendous customer service. I am EMBARRASSED for them. They manager is a complete disaster. They had no solution for me and after a 30 minute frustrating and heated conversation with the manager, I walked out of the hotel with no solution. I went back to my car so I could start looking for another hotel to stay at. If you are a planner like me, I would not recommend staying here. We ended up finding another
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I appoligize that we were sold out of 2 queen rooms.  I will also look into the interaction at the desk that evening.  We would love to have you back and book directly with us to ensure you recieve the correct room type.  We offer the same rate as the online sites.  Please let us have an opportunity to win back you business.

Summary: The staff was amazing first of all! Pictures with snoopy was cool. Very friendly and accessible to see snoopy. The hotel has plenty of things for family. Pool, tennis courts, splash pad near the pool for little ones, spa, fitness area, sauna.     The lack of 5 stars is because of the food at the restaurant. You do get a discount with your stay which is an invite to eat there which we did. Family of 6 (2 adults, 15yr, 13yr, 10yr, and 4yr) even with the discount the bill was over $120 (keep in mind sadly we order 3 kids meals, and 2 personal pizzas and a salad, drinks were only water too) items that should not equal to that amount. our bill anywhere else is usually $60ish. I recommend going else where to eat. Food was good but price was not worth it. Friday’s is walking distance,
Manager Response: Hello Towmater,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed all of the amenities that we have to offer, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: I remember this hotel being a lot nicer years ago. Our room was a bit run down and needs to be paid more attention too by the cleaning staff. Try hanging the curtains back up and let the repair men know there is a short in the bathroom switch. I think they need to have a housekeeper meeting with all the staff. Other than that the front desk staff was great. The early check in was fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Please let us make sure you are in one of our newer rooms on your next visit.  We are in the middle updating our property the next couple of years.  Look forward to your visit.

Summary: We were at knots Berry Farm Hotel from 5/29-5/31/18. The hotel is very nice on the outside. The lobby is also very nice, very clean. From desk staff was very friendly. We were able to check in to our two queen bed standard room  prior to normal check in time. Our room was on the 5th floor overlooking the roof of the floor below. Definitely a lousy view. The room was big, clean and comfortable. The beds were clean. We always check the sheets before we do anything else. Sheets were clean. No sign of bed bugs. The bathroom was clean. Shower on/off handle was loose. AC worked great. No fridge was disappointing. We were able to request and get late check out. We were allowed to check out at 5pm for an addtl $50. Well worth it considering our flight was a night time flight; and it
Manager Response: Jacinct,  Thank you for taking the time to tell everyone about your stay and leaving this great feedback. Future guests will find your review very helpful. It’s for people like you that we do what we do here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel! During your next stay be sure to experience Knott's Berry Farm amusement park, it's great for everyone in the family.  Cheers, Tyler

Summary: At first it seemed like good value for money. We were able to checkin early into a double queen room and head off to knottsberry farm for the day. After a long day we went back to our room, my wife and son slept in one bed, myself in another. The next morning we were woken up early by the guy in the next room. The walls are paper thin and we could hear every word of his phone call. This day was Disneyland and mid morning I felt very itchy on my left forearm. I thought nothing of it until an hour or so later I noticed about a dozen small lumps almost in a line up my arm, they were bedbugs bites. Needless to say my day at Disneyland was very uncomfortable. I came half way around the world for this experience and it was tarnished by bedbugs. Upon returning to the hotel, exhausted
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your experience at our property.  We would appreciate a call back to our office to find out more and for us to ensure that we have taken care of any issue that may of occured during your stay.  We investigate any alleged activity immediately with our vendor along with preventitve if an issue does enter our property.  We would love a second opportunity to show you that this property can meet your expectations.  Again, we look forward to your call. Please contact Luz in our Administrative office.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Close to disney and knotts berry farms
Summary: Staying in sandiego during our honeymoon and was doing all.the adventure parks. We wanted to stay here a night or two for convience to other parks then driving down to san diego everynight! ( dodge traffic ) great room great breakfast perk of staying is discounted rate to knotts berry farms which we didnt know when we booked it! Great place , snoopy even stopped by during brealfast to say hello! Would definetly reccomend!
Manager Response: Hi Hether,  We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest here at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. We are very happy to hear that your experience was no exception. Thank you for leaving your wonderful review. Congratulations on your recent marriage! we are so glad you chose to spend your honeymoon at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel.  Thank you, Tyler

Summary: We had an good stay at knotts berry farm. The room was quite clean, however there is a serious need for renovation and there were hairs left from previous tenants and general wear and tear. The staff were friendly and extremely helpful and the restaurant was nice to dine at. We were unaware of the parking charges which was unexpected however due to a room change we didn’t have to pay it which was good. We wouldn’t stay here again in it’s current state however with renovation we would.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are currently in renovation this year.  We would love to have you visit us again and ask for a newer room next time so we can meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Needs renovation but would stay again if visiting knotts
Summary: I’ve heard that the hotel is currently in renovation although I didn’t notice it. Our stay was ok. The beds were clean and being able to have connecting rooms with friends is wonderful! And the restaurant in the hotel was delicious! Parking wasn’t to expensive, you can’t beat the convenience  of being so close to the park! There are a few things that need help. First the carpets, grosse! Especially the hallways. The stains and smashed in gum were pretty nasty. The carpet in the room wasn’t as bad, but definitely needs replacement ! The housekeeper never replaced soaps/lotions, and didn’t seem to notice makeup and lotion smudges in the bathroom that was there before we arrived . I definitely would travel with Clorox wipes.  One last thing, the pool and hot tub were extremely over
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We pride ourselves in making sure that any issues that you may have experience are addressed immediately.  We are in renovation the next couple of years.  When you return, we would love to put you in our newer room so you enjoy your stay.

Summary: This was our third visit. Great location 10min walk from Buena park mall with lots of kids stuff to do. Walking distance to McDonald's and burger king aswell as many others. Hotel restaurant amber waves is great and really well priced...20% off for in-house guests and $4 wines at happy hour. Big pool complex with kids water fun area. We got a queen room to start but asked to move as it was tiny...got moved to a king room which was enormous.  Ask for a room you can see the Disney fireworks from. Free shuttle to Disney each day is great. Cheap knottberry tickets at reception $44 Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa,  We’re thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location and amenities, we love making our guests happy at Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel. Thank you for leaving the positive review, we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Tyler

Summary: This is a sadly outdated hotel.  I did notice some renovation going on, but as a whole this is very dated.  The rooms are arranged and furnished in the old style of cheap hotels, with nothing that makes you feel special.  There is no free breakfast buffet, and parking is extra at $8.00 per night.  The desk clerks are friendly enough, and the place is relatively clean, but not spotless.  It was not very service oriented and is not in the best area of Anaheim.

We had a great time at the hotel. Staff was very friendly and  informative.  I booked this package last Oct and got a great deal . There were 3 adults and 2 children and i was amazed at the price . Far cheaper then  Disneyland. and just as much fun. Alot to offer. I would definitely do this again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are thrilled to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that our staff was able to make Lily's 4th birthday a great one. We appreciate your feedback and can’t wait to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: The place to stay if you want enjoy enjoy a full day and night at the Farm/Amusement Park
Summary: The hotel is nice, with the lobby restaurant and Bar being the best parts. The rooms are a bit dated and could use a make over. The rooms and pool area worthy of a 3* hotel but the hotel has the potential to be closer to a four star if they did an overhaul.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all of the amenities that we offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We recently stayed in the Knotts Berry Farm Hotel and had a pleasant experience! The facility was clean, the grounds were well maintained with fresh flower beds!  Security made us comfortable!  We booked a special and had a small corner room .   The location is great, some design functions in lobby area could be improved to give it a more intimate, comfortable feeling!  Overly spacious- great for receiving bus tours etc.  no negatives, a pleasant experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Had a 3 night stay for a trip to Disneyland. Starting to get priced out of Anaheim seems like you cannot find a good hotel for under $200 near Disneyland.  This hotel was okay. I did not have a renovated room and the sink in the bathroom did not drain. If on a tight budget would stay the parking fee was 9.00 per day. The pool was cold but clean.

Summary Heading: Best way to spend time at the park
Summary: This was a family event which had a number of families staying at the hotel and enjoying the park.  The kids loved Snoopy coming in while we had dinner and also breakfast.  They enjoyed the relaxing times with Snoopy and his helpers.  The rooms are large and very comfortable.  It was nice to visit the park, come back for awhile and then visit again in the evening.  There was no rushing to try and get everything in.  The hotel is comfortable, quiet and very well kept.  An excellent choice for families who want to spend time at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that the kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel USED to be fantastic and the only hotel in Southern California we have stayed at for the past 15 years multiple times a year. But in the recent 2 or 3 visits it has taken a dive. They are constantly going through management and none of them have been great lately. They have false promises and lack in communication(I.e. construction in the room next to you starting at 7 or 8 in the morning with no warning). Dirty rooms and moldy bathrooms with the last guests used razors and tampon applicators left on the edges of the tub. No apology for anything they misquote or mess up and instead meet it with hostility and assert that it is the guests fault. I have spent tens of thousands of dollars staying at this hotel and it is sad to see it become such rubbish in these past

Summary Heading: Like The Rides: Ups and Downs
Summary: The expectations set by the front desk of Knott's Berry Farm Hotel is nothing short of spectacular. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable, and enthusiastic — ready to share everything they know about property from easy outside parking and first time visitor buttons to room service and Snoopy visits.  May daughter and I were also pleasantly surprised to learn that the hotel had met our guest request upon arrival. We had booked one king bed as it was the only option available, but had asked for two queens should one open up. They found a room with two queens and, thanks to another check in hotel option, gave my daughter a brand new plush Snoopy to decorate her pillows during our stay. She loved the surprise!   Expect some of the fanfare to fade when you first enter the hallways.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. I apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced, however, we are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay overall. We appreciate your feedback, both positive and negative and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I took my son and two grandchildren for a trip to the park and you couldn't beat this hotel. It is right next to the park! The rooms were clean and the staff was very helpful. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is our 100th visit over the years sometimes we come twice a year and this place never disappoints, will keep the tradition going because the grandkids love it 💞💖💕💞💞💕🎈🎉🎈🎉🎈🎉🎈🎉🎈I’m done writing
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and your continuing loyalty. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that we are always able to make your Knott's Berry Farm experience that much better. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel is ideally located for Knotts berry farm theme & waterpark.  Hotel was clean and tidy room was a little dated but had everything you need 2 double beds. Staff were very friendly.  Not too far from Disneyland.  Bar had a happy hour and nice restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all that we have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Myself and my Husband stayed here for a week in March. The hotel is basic, but very clean and pleasant! Staff are very friendly and helpful, anything we needed was resolved promptly!   Rooms are dated I felt, but again, clean and had everything 2 simple British Honeymooners needed!  The hotel is ideal for Disneyland, only a 15 minute easy drive and has plenty of restaurants nearby!   Would definitely stay again, thank you all :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that our staff was able to make your stay extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay...Convenient...Friendly...Season Pass value...Beds are less than comfortable...
Summary: The Knott's Berry Farm Hotel has been a reasonably priced option, especially with the season pass discount.  It also is a better value when one considers that parking for the park is included in the hotel price. Yes, free parking for the theme park and waterpark  with hotel stays!  If you have not checked out the Knott's season pass and you are vacationing in southern California, then you should.  It is probably the best value as theme parks go in southern California.   Snoopy makes an appearance for photos in the lobby of the hotel daily.  Check with the front desk to confirm times, but it is usually around 5pm or 6pm.  This is great, because you can get meet and greet time with Snoopy with much less hassle than in the park itself.    There is a restaurant onsite, called "Amber
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property.  We take pride in providing you the best service and we value your response so we can improve our property in the near future.  Hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Quick Access to Knott's Berry Farm Theme Park
Summary: We were happy with our stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. It is located next to the theme park which makes for a short walk before you are enjoying rides. The hotel lobby, bar, and restaurant are nice and give a nice family feel. The rooms, on the other hand, are very dated and are in need of an upgrade. However, the staff and service make up for the lack of room quality. Plus, the price (park tickets and room) was hard to beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to utilize our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel experience made for a fantastic family holiday.
Summary: We have just returned home after a two week stay at the hotel. We were an extended family group of 12 and no-one had anything but positive comments about the hotel. All staff were excellent, friendly and helpful, rooms were very comfortable (we weren’t expecting five star facilities), location first rate with very easy access to the park (which we all loved), Disney shuttle a real bonus, photos with Snoopy, excellent bar service, lovely pool. Overall it represented excellent value for money. We ate in the restaurant a number of times and the food was adequate and reasonably priced (as a vegetarian there was limited choice). Lots of other restaurants around too. Overall couldn’t find any fault and loved our time there. I would highly recommend to friends and hope to return
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and recommendation. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of all the accommodations we offer. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. The overall service and quality was satisfactory. However, it was very near to the Knott's Berry Farm that it could have some noisy affection when the farm was serving clients.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced, however, we are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay overall. We value your feedback hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: thank you Knotts Berry Farm Hotel
Summary: Nice area clean hotel friendly staff overall very good we were use uber to go visit places its not expensive,shopping centre about 15 min walking from the hotel lot's of restaurants around including my favourite IHOP
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The Knotts Hotel was very nice, friendly people, very clean and beautifully landscaped areas. I appreciated the coffee in the morning, and I was extra impressed with the fitness facility and the sauna, which I really wish more places had... nothing like a sauna. The one here was great. Location by the park is extra convenient, and it's easy to walk to a Walgreens for bottled water and anything else you need. Nice safe area. Glad to recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and recommendation. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of all the accommodations we offer. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Good hotel located in a good area to get around, the hotel staff are friendly with clean rooms ...20 doller hire for a fridge for 2 weeks well worth it,plus free parking as we booked through travel agent ...would defiantly go back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I’m writing this from my hotel room. This hotel is conveniently located but it’s noisy. There is loud music playing from somewhere which started around 9:45pm. I called down to the front desk and was told there are no events near my room so they would send security to check it out. It’s clearly from some event at the hotel and I can hear it through the paper thin walls/floor. Also, both sets of neighbors came back to their rooms at the same time and I can hear everything they are saying through the connecting doors. It shouldn’t keep me up since they are families and will be going to sleep soon - if they can sleep through the music...

We liked the fact that it was on the same property as the amusement park, and the breakfast that was included in our package.  We had noise problems on two of the nights we stayed -- the noise from the adjacent room came through the shared door, as if there were no insulation at all.

Summary Heading: Maybe the best resort Hotel in Orange County
Summary: Loved this Hotel. We had an oversized room with 2 queens and a sofa sleeper. This room was bigger than most so called "Suites." This hotel does not stick you with things like "Resort Fees" or Parking. Easy access into the park. Plus a Free shuttle to other Orange County places like Disneyland. The service was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that you were able to utilize our shuttle service. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I only gave 3 stars because my expectations for this hotel were lower  than I expected. In other hotels you get free parking and there  is usually a refrigerator in the room this hotel didn’t. Even the low rating hotels have these things. The overall cleanliness of room was good and the location was convenient a 5 minute walk to Knott’s Berry Farm.

Our first visit to the hotel, we weren’t disappointed from the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out. It was my Birthday on arrival I was given a button badge which made my day. I asked the member of staff on check out if I could have a key card for a souvenir, which she did, again making my day. The rooms were cleaned great everyday. All the staff were very helpful and friendly. We would certainly recommend this hotel and would stay here again in the future. The hotel is only 2 mins walk from the theme park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and recommendation. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We value your feedback and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: I booked Knott’s Berry Farm Hotel on a deal I found on TripAdvisor. We were given a great room and the staff was very helpful. While swimming in the pool, my Granddaughter got stung by a Bee. I called the Front Desk and they said they could have a Medic from Knott’s Berry Park come over to look at her. Security Officer Robert came up and offered for a Medic to come to our room or to take us over to First Aid. We chose going over there. He drove us over in his car through the back gate and even turned on his Security lights (to get through the gate) which my Granddaughter thought was pretty great. Medic Gloria treated her and then even gave us a ride in her golf cart back to the hotel. All the Hotel staff have been Awesome!!! Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed in the Camp Snoopy room for our visit. The kids loved having Snoopy tucknthem into bed each night. They also got their own push Snoopy to snuggle with. The rooms are a little dates but it was comfortable and clean. The staff were all fantastic. We will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that the kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here 4 nights and while it was clean the housekeeping left the attached door unlocked when cleaning and the people in the room next to us waited until they seen me and my son leave then tried to enter our room. Thankfully there was still someone in our room that stopped them! I brought this to staff attention but they didn't seem fazed by it. The room was decent and somewhat clean but they took some of our deposit for no reason plus we paid another $27 for 3 days of parking. The vending machine took $9 of my money and wouldn't give me my money back or the sodas.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will be looking into your experience to ensure we provide a better experience to our guest.  I would like to invite you to talk to Luz in our office so we can more information and address your expeience.

Summary Heading: Modest Rooms but Amazing Staff with Free Shuttle to Disney
Summary: Our room was nothing to write home about, nor was it anything to complain about; it totally did the job.  It is the staff and great service that they provide that earns this hotel the stars... from their welcoming check in to the super convenient free shuttle to Disneyland, Knott's Berry Hotel really is a great find.  You will be at Knott's Berry Farm Amusement Park's back door and about 10 minutes from Disneyland.  The shuttle was offered at many convenient times and the drivers were pleasant and prompt.

Summary: Clean rooms and well stocked. Very polite and friendly staff. Good place to visit with family and have fun in and around the farm. Wouldn't recommend the hotel for first timers as it can be a bit difficult to get to the center. But would definitely visit again.

Summary: This is a landmark hotel in Buena Park, and if you are visiting Knott's Berry Farm (which I recommend), you should definitely give this hotel a try.  Apart from its being literally across the street from the park, the hotel is well-maintained and has very good service.  Rooms are currently being updated, so if you go in the next few months you can expect a little inconvenience, but not much.  And if you book a package through the hotel, kids eat free in the hotel restaurant.  Overall, this is a very good option for the area.

Summary: Five - star rating based on value for price, staff and exceeded expectations.  After reading the lousy reviews here we definitely had low(er) expectations for our last minute stay at Knott's Hotel. But the location and a great deal on a package that included park tickets, breakfast and parking led us to take a chance - and we are very glad we did.   I think the one, two and three star reviews have to be of a different hotel.  Our low expectations were completely unfounded. Sure, the amenity list is definitely that of a 3.5 star hotel, but the cleanliness and service were of a quality we have not encountered in many four and five star properties. Our King room was as represented on the website and had none of the issues others have cited - it was incredibly clean, well lit, with
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and recommendation. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We value your feedback and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed there Friday, Saturday and left on Sunday. we stayed in a camp snoopy room the pillows very uncomfortable even my eight-year-old complained, bed soft and very uncomfortable. The fridge additional charge of $20. paint chipping off walls and in bathroom. they say they offer shuttle to Disney however the shuttle only comes every two hours and appointments need to be made prior and you can’t make any changes. Need significant upgrade and more shuttle buses to Disney

Summary: Lovely comfortable hotel. Kind of dated rooms, but we loved this. (Kept expecting Columbo to appear!) Spacious room, spotlessly clean and well serviced. Really pleasant staff. Great restaurant in hotel (Amber Waves) and the famous Mrs Knott’s Chicken Dinner restaurant is on site. We were here at a very quiet time of year. No doubt, it would be very different in High Season, when the theme park is open. A lovely, homely hotel. 😊  Also worth adding, the gardens and grounds are amazingly beautifully planted out. Beautiful!

Summary: The hotel was okay, it definitely could use a good cleaning and refresh.  Family came here for a trip, there is a lot of things to do around the hotel, and plenty of places to eat as well, the staff was nice, nothing too spectacular
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are always listening on how we can make our guest stay better.

Summary: NOISY, NOISY, NOISY!!!  Had to call security every night about neighbors and they did nothing. Windows, walls, and floors paper thin. Outdated. Needs renovated.  Beds horribly uncomfortable. the only good thing it's close to the park. Shuttle times for Disneyland are inconvenient. Stay somewhere else!

Summary: Great Location, walking distance to the park. Amber waves restaurant was good, fair prices good food. Stayed for one night at the hotel - the best part was how close it was to the park otherwise the hotel was clean but could use updating.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that you were able to utilize our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel itself is in need of a major update, the lobby was nice and clean and looked like it was more updated than the rooms. Our room was old, the bathroom was big, but everything was crowded onto one side making the door awkward to open. However, the room was clean and we saw the staff constantly cleaning and vacuuming the hallways. Distance to Knotts Berry Farm was perfect, short walk. The breakfast at Amber Waves was a let down, but our server, Mario, was great. They have the option of ordering from the menu or have the breakfast buffet, we picked the buffet, if you can call it that. There was cold cereal (I believe 3 or 4 choices), bacon, sausage, eggs, potatoes, french toast, and fresh fruit (which was not good and looked like it had been sitting out for days). I would

Welcome to 1980. The location next to the theme park is great. But the hotel is in desperate need of remodeling. Everything looks and feels old: the lobby, the carpets, the elevators, the rooms, the restaurant.

We stayed at this hotel for 9 nights in February. We had such a lovely time would most definitely stay here again and also recommend it to family and friends. As we where there celebrating birthdays we where given vouchers for the restaurant to get a free treat when we had a meal. The food was really good and not at all expensive. We didn’t do the theme park. The pool was a nice place to sit although the swimming pool it’s self was freezing the hot tub was very good and relaxing. The staff on reception where very helpful whenever we spoke to them.

Summary: Our room was lovely and clean.  Fitness room awesome.  Pool heated and the largest pool I have ever had the pleasure of using in Southern California. Fabulous restaurant and low parking fee with a quick walk to the gate.

Summary: Only stayed with your hotel for 2 nights, but were over the moon to be welcomed by a very friendly concierge person who congratulated us on our honeymoon and given us badges to wear to celebrate. Snoopy also came round to say hi to all of the guests and was more than accommodating to say hello to my nieces in the UK on facetime, and we had free transfers to Disneyworld too! Thank you so much for making our short stay very welcoming but we will be back again.

Summary: Stayed at Knott's Berry farm hotel for 2 weeks. Reception staff were very efficient and friendly, always acknowledged everyone as they passed reception with a smile or a greeting. Used the restaurant a few times during our stay, the staff were very good and the food delicious. We also got " Food to go" from there as well!!  The Barstaff do  a mean cocktail and a good cup of Hot English tea!! and after one of our party left her purse they brought it personally up to our room for her.  We used the free shuttle to Disneyland/California adventure and Downtown Disney which was an excellent service and always on time. You just needed to book your time slots with reception. Our room was clean, plenty of Hot water and cosy white towels which were changed daily as was our bedlinen. Beds

Summary: I stayed here as part of a school tour group and loved it. The bed was so comfortable, the room was large and the staff were very friendly. It’s very handy to the local pharmacy and a walk across the car park to Knotts Berry Farm. I really enjoyed my stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stay there for a week.To be honest at the time of the booking we didn’t have many options available. The rooms are outdated,the carpet in our room was full of stains.The beds very uncomfortable,the bedding even worst Too noisy,you can hear everything from outside,from the people upstairs etc  The pool was ok and the jacuzzi as well Friendly staff

Stayed here with my hubby on leg 2 of our US city tour. Upon arrival we were greeted by friendly check in staff, who checked us in early which was appreciated after a 4am start! Our room was on the 7th floor, close by to some renovations what were underway. However, signage explained what was going on and so it wasn't too bad walking down the hallway covered in dust. We weren't disturbed by any dust either.   Our room was spacious and clean, comfy enough bed and clean bathroom. Good views from the window, although at times disturbed by the noise of the nearby rollercoaster which was to be expected given the close location of the theme park. On our first day, we ate late lunch in Amber Waves. It was pleasant enough with attentive service. Slightly pricey but enjoyable
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable visit with us and breakfast at Amber Waves. We value your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed here few weeks ago. The hotel room was very outdated. Bed is ok, but room was not clean ,carpet looks dirty and smelly.There is a dirty socks by the bed.Probably from last guest. Bathroom is outdated  too. The location & theme park is good. Their restaurant breakfast food need some improvement of the menu and presentation.For one night is ok.

Me and my husband stayed here for part of a 9 day trip around america. Our room was lovely and spacious beds could be more comfy though. Lovely food at amber waves. Breakfast is a tad pricey though.  Good services from the staff gave us a money off coupon for dinner every night which was a bonus. Pool was lovely and so was the jacuzzi. Short walk to pharmacy which also sold food etc. Short uber ride to Huntington beach. Lovely place to stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all that we have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here in September and had a terrible room things not working that I wrote about. This time it was better everything worked. Room overlooking the pool on the 8th floor. Short 5 minute walk to Knotts Berry Farm and on the way many cute shops to go thru if you feel like seeing. Even one that makes fudge and a bakery.  There is no microwave or fridge in the rooms, however we asked and got a fridge for $20 for the 6 nights we stayed, went to Walgreens and bought water and sodas cheaper there.  Well worth the cost as sodas and water around here $4 for a 20 oz bottle at the park and shops. This hotel also has a free shuttle to Disneyland if you choose to go.  Beds clean and comfy, room cleaned daily, room service, and all in all great stay this time.

Summary: The hotel desperately needs a massive renovation. Everything seems to have stopped 20 years ago. Which is such a shame because the location is pretty good and staff was very friendly. Many families staying at the hotel, so don’t choose it if you are looking for a quiet getaway

We stayed here out of convenience.  Hotel needs major updates, showers and bathrooms were a little grungy.  I let my kids not shower all wknd bc of it.  Restaurant was decent for breakfast... hard to mess that up.... the added bonus was Snoopy stopping by for pictures.  Pool was a little less than my high standards, but the kids enjoyed it!  The location can't be beat though!

Knott's Berry Farm Hotel is affordable accomodation in Anaheim a short walk from Knott's Berry Farm attraction.  Offering free transfers to and from Disneyland daily - book at reception.  Friendly staff, comfortable rooms, relaxing atmosphere and great restaurant with visits from Snoopy at certain times throughout the day.  A great alternative to get away from the hustle and bustle.

Summary: We stopped here for a quick stopover. We did not go to Knotts Berry Farm but if you are it is literally right next Store. The hotel was clean. Check in was a breeze and everyone we encountered was very nice. The fitness center was decent size and had cardio machines and free weights up to 70 pounds. Everything I needed for a vacation. The outside pool area had a play area for kids that looked nice. They have an onsite restaurant. There is a Starbucks .7 miles away. Long walk or very short drive. I will definitely stay here again if the need arises.  The only slight hitch is the parking fee is $19 that I wasn't aware of. They discounted it to $9 for me. Not a big deal. Just a bit surprised.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and got to experience all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and hope that you are able to visit Knott's Berry Farm during your next stay.

Summary: We took our 6 & 4 year old grandkids to Knott’s for a long weekend. We chose the Snoopy room with turndown service. We purchased season passes because a of the room discounts and for about an extra $100 for 4 passes a second trip here would more than pay for itself. Also staying on the hotel got free parking and a 15% discount on our room. There are also food discounts in the park with the season pass. Our room was 209. It was recently painted and in ok condition considering what we paid and being in Anaheim. Bathroom fixtures were old  (some rust) and not working real well but got the job done. Beds not too comfy but we were there for the grandkids. The Snoopy turn down service and visits in the restaurant made it all worth it. The kids absolutely love it and loved going to the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable visit with us and were able to meet Snoopy. We value your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: Every year, my family likes to plan a trip to Knott's; most of the time for my birthday. This year, my fiance and I bought season passes so we could go any time we wanted without having to pay $50 each for tickets every time. We always stay at the Knott's hotel because it is clean, good pricing and it is right next to the park so we can save money on parking! We just walk to the park in the morning. It is probably a half a mile walk, maybe less. I love Amber Waves too! If you love to eat a nice breakfast before you head out, their buffet is a great choice. And Snoopy walks around and greets everyone for the day and it makes it that much more special! Definitely recommend staying here!

Summary: Friendly, helpful staff.  Comfortable bed & room accommodations.  Great amenities--pool, workout room, basketball & tennis courts.  Very convenient; short walk to Knott's.  Snoopy visits in morning & evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to appreciate all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: On our recent visit to the US we were able & lucky enough to call Knotts our home while in LA. This was the 2nd time we have stayed & it did not disappoint at all. Some may say that the hotel is aged, but aren't we all?? The staff are very good & 100% focused on helping you enjoy the experience 24hrs a day - there are so many special shout outs to the staff which from a tourist point is really awesome. We saw Snoopy & his crew a few times which had the younger kids just jumping with joy as again just before Xmas it is a special magic time.. Being December the pool was a little cool, but free & able to be used. The room was large with our own bathroom - the furniture was comfortable & the bed was great after many busy days exploring & walking around the city.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We checked in the night before my sons bday for a short getaway. We went to the park on the second day to celebrate. Check in was nice and pleasant. We got the oversized queen room because the camp snoopy room were sold out but the room was nice and we visited the pool and the jacuzzi that evening. We also caught snoopy in the lobby for pictures. We ate at the breakfast buffet in the morning and then headed out. We were able to leave our car parked in the hotel lot and walk to the entrance. We usually go to the “the farm” once a year but this was our first time at the hotel it was nice and not too crowded!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that we enhanced your Knott's Berry Farm experience. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Close and convient to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: Walking distance to the park. Rooms very spacuious. The adjoining room situation is fantastic. ROOMS 501,503 AND 505 ALL join together. We had 4 rooms and this really added to the comfort of our stay. Middle room was like home base
