Summary: We stayed at the knots hotel while visiting Venice Beach, Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. The staff was very friendly, the rooms clean and comfortable. I would not recommend the restaurant at the hotel, the food was not great. However there are so many places to eat close by, that that would not change my mind about going back to this hotel. The only other problem we encountered was coming from canada our grandson could not use the basketball court with out paying a $20 fee for using a basketball.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: We had a wonderful time. Everyone was super courteous, the close proximity to the park was priceless after a long, exhausting day of play.  The restaurant, Amber Waves, serves a great breakfast,which can be included in one of the packages.  They also offer discounts for dinner or lunch while staying at the hotel.  The best part of our vacation was Snoopy's visit at night.  He came to tuck my boys in, they absolutely loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that the kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had a two room suite.  Bed was comfortable.  TV worked fine.   Had to pay $10 for a fridge though. 😟. Hot tub felt good.  Toilet/shower area was separate from the sink area which made prepping easier.  So convenient to be close to Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Location Location Location and Great Value
Summary: First time staying at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel and it did not disappoint!! It is adjacent to the park and a pleasant five minute walk past shops to the front gate entrance! The room was very clean, the bed comfortable, and the camp snoopy theme was adorable. I was hesitant to spend the extra money for the Camp Snoopy room but it was the highlight of the trip for my 5 year old. Snoopy dressed in his pajamas and his 2 escorts came to the room at 8:15 to tuck her in. He was really great and his visit/gift was the highlight of the trip!! There is also a free shuttle/bus to Disneyland! The staff were some of the nicest and most helpful I have ever encountered in all of my travels. They genuinely seemed to want to make sure our stay was perfect and extra special for my 5 year
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and got to experience all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: I was surprised by the quality of this hotel.  I knew going in that it was an older building so didn't expect much.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The hotel is quite nice with a remodeled lobby and rooms.  We reserved a Snoopy room and my son loved it!  Snoopy even stopped by to tuck him in for bed.  If you have a Snoopy fan, it is well worth the upgrade.  We also ate at the restaurant for breakfast and it was good!  The staff at check in was very helpful since this was our first visit.  Again, I'm totally impressed by this hotel and it's staff.  We'll be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra enjoyable. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

We arrived early to pre register in hopes to an early check in, however weren't able to which was fine because they said they would text us when our room was ready. They text us at perfect timing because our children were ready for a nap. So when I arrived to a long line for check in, Ms.Ruby attempted to assist us but didn't do a very good job. I told her I already pre.registered & was there to pick up our keys (via text) which she responded, your room wasn't ready even though I showed her the text I had received over an hour ago so that was just beginning. Not only did we have to wait in the lobby with our restless children she asked for the same

Very good hotel, clean and spacious rooms with very friendly and helpful staff it was an excellent base for my holiday with access to the freeways and Disneyland. Food was very good and reasonably priced. Would stay again.

Summary: We had three connecting g rooms, this hotel is an older hotel, but is clean and the staff was friendly and responsive, such as when we asked for more towels. It is close to Knotts Berry Farm, short walk, parking is a premium and seems not enough spaces for the number of rooms. The rooms are small. No refrigerator or microwave.

Great price for a large room that is quiet, clean and within walking distance to the front gates of Knott's Berry Farm. Our room had a little ware 'n tear and could use some updating, but nothing to complain about. Check-in was quick as well as check-out due to the number of staff on hand. The one negative- The Breakfast Buffet was disappointing. Some items were cold and not replenished quickly. Selection also left something be desired. I would probably order my breakfast next time as our dinner the previous night was good and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that you found value in all that we have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: THIS is a Best hotel in my childhood I was 12 years old I have fun at Knott's Berry farm hotel back in 2010 I love it so my memories back to you on that one Earlier I want to go to Knott's Berry farm hotel again next year

Summary: Went here for one day on the tail end of another trip.  Figured we would head up to Knott's and have a great day. Also was told that the water would be turned off to the hotel at 11pm until 7am.  That wasn't cool.  In the email that I received a day prior to coming, it would have been nice to know this info.  We actually would have stayed somewhere else.  But the email was quick to boast the "amenities" of Knott's.  Nothing to make that inconvenience better either (like a reduced rate, comp at Amber Waves, or anything), but they did say sorry.  The other issue on this stay (and actually the previous) is the lack of training
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your return visit.  We would like the opportunity to make sure we make things right on your next visit. We will make sure you get a renovated room! Thank you again Happy New Years!

Summary: Shuttle to Disneyland is convenient- remember to trip your driver! Hotel restaurant buffet was decent. Staff were accommodating for requests! When the park is open late, you can hear people screaming when in your room, as the extreme roller coaster was outside our window.  Short walk to Knott’s Berry Farm. Pool area was nice. Laundry facilities were handy (4 washers and dryers).  Beware - parking is not included with hotel cost.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and are glad you enjoyed your time here.  The next time you visit, please ask for a room on the south/west side of the hotel to be further away from the park.  We look forward to seeing you again! Happy New Years!

Summary: We happen to have arrived on the early side, the first room they gave us had a shower and no tub, which we needed.  Call them immediately, they had their bell person came and help us move rooms.  *thumbs up*  The rooms itself are older, the carpet, a/c system, and tub/shower are on the older side, definitely can stand to use an upgrade.  If you drove your own car, they will give you a parking pass so that they don't get you and the park-goers mix up.  They did give us a discount for lunch and dinner at the hotel's restaurants, but they're known of the Chicken Dinner right outside the park, so we never went.  Plus, there are lots of food selection near the hotel.  It was cool to see Snoopy hanging out at the lobby in the evening.  It is a short walk to the park's front entrance,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are in the process of updating and look forward to your future stay with us.  I am glad that you enjoyed our pool area and please visit our Chicken Dinner Restaurant when you are here next. Happy New Years!

Summary Heading: Recommend Knott's Berry Farm Hotel and Park
Summary: We stayed here for a night so we could go to the park and it was great. The hotel itself is a typical bigger family style hotel, there is a fantastic huge pool as well. We arrived early and they had our room ready and we were able to check in so it was good to be able to access the pool. We went to the park the next day and they stored our luggage and we were able to leave our car in their car park so this was just so convenient. Staff throughout were great and also try the Knott's Chicken Restaurant - but don't order too much, the

Summary: I personally love staying at the Knott's Hotel because I have an annual pass at Knott's Berry Farm. I love the Snoopy room, even if you don't have kids. The only things the Hotel needs is a paint job on the outside and keep the rooms deep cleaned. Other than that it's perfect to me. The Amber Waves has good food and I do eat there when I stay at the Hotel. I love Knott's and the Peanuts Gang. So this is the only place for me. Thanks Knott's Hotel!

Rooms are on the smaller side.  No refrigerator in the rooms, no microwave either.    Overall not a bad hotel but not a good one either.  Proximity to the park is the main reason this hotel is still in business.    Hotel is a 2.5 star hotel.    Not sure I would stay here again.

We had an enjoyable time. We went on a Thursday so the crowd was probably not as bad as a weekend. The rooms were small and old but had adorable Peanuts decorations. Our package deal was 1 day at the park, the evening event and overnight stay. It was a good value. Park was decorated nice, a variety of rides for all to enjoy.  The Halloween event was fun, characters were very interactive. This was the last year for the Elvira show so they will really have to up their game next year and find a show just as good.

Mr. Gubser truly knows how to run a business; he's a pro and he's the epitome of Customer Service. The Knott's Corporation needs more people like James Gubser to insure happiness throughout; he knows exactly how to handle people with kindness and professionalism. There needs to be more James Gubsers' in the world; it would be a happier world. 2.) Summary: We booked a standard room first but later upgraded to Snoopy room prior to arrival.  When we checked in, the room was an accessible room and had horrible odor coming from bathroom drain, we asked to do room move.  They didn't have any availability of Snoopy room so we were moved to  a standard room.  Next room we checked in had no odor but was not cleaned properly for a long time.  The carpet edge was white from not being vacuumed properly.  Bathroom floor was dirty and crust on the edges.  It was already close to mid-night, so we settled for that night.  Next morning we woke up with ants in the room coming from the window to the desk area.  Front Desk staff took off upgraded charges and parking fee but the stay was not enjoyable at all.  2nd night, Fire Alarm started to go off

Summary Heading: Only the location makes it worthwhile
Summary: Walking distance to Knotts, short drive to Huntington Beach, and Disney.  Rooms are in desperate need of updates to get out of the 70's.  Lack basic amenities like a fridge or microwave.  Bed was uncomfortable and the bathroom was as basic as it gets.  The worst part was weekend parking.  The hotel does not save places for guests and sells parking to people going to the theme park.  We had to park way away and walk through a dark parking lot to get to the hotel.  Only comment from the front desk was to just keep circling if we wanted a closer spot.  Would not recommend the hotel unless you will be at knotts and want something close.

Stayed recently at knots berry farm hotel because its close to Disney and we had booked knots scary farm one evening etc. The staff make this place. The main complaint I would have is the hotel room was looking very dated and in need of an update. Rooms noisey due to having single glazing windows and noisey aircon. Other than that we were really happy staying
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that our staff was able to make your stay extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Just returned from a stay at this hotel.  Good location. 25 mins drive from the beach and lots of shops around.  The hotel has plenty of business especially at weekends. This is great for the Hotel, but the guests have to suffer loud music and noise until late in the night due to parties being held there.  The buffet breakfast is below average. Even though you pay $16 a head plus Tax, the servers still insist on serving you drinks so you have to tip them as well.  They even have to bring out toast to you as it’s not in the buffet section. Not much choice and poorly cooked eggs  The pool was not cleaned properly and we were unable to swim due to the dead wasps and floating debris in the pool.  The room was outdated. No fridge, no microwave. You could get a fridge put in for an

This was my first time staying at knotts berry farm hotel. The staff were nice. The rooms were clean. It was a fun stay,but i do have dislikes. You need to pay for a fridge,there are no micro waves in the room,i also had to pay $8 for parking ontop of my $162 for one night stay. My view was on the 1st floor facing the entrence of the hotel.so privacy with the curtens open was bad. I probably won't stay again for the little bit that offered in the price. I think the best part of the hotel is its about a 5 min walk to the entrence of knotts berry farm.

Good price and location to Knotts Berry Farm. Rooms are outdated. Room did not have hot water in bathroom. Rooms also have paper thin walls. You can hear everything in the rooms next door. Friendly, accommodating staff.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Decor in Communal Areas - Bedrooms not so great
Summary: Bar, restaurant and lobby are very nice. However, the room décor is disappointing and leaves a lot to be desired. There were a lack of plug sockets in the room, which is surprising as these days hotels need to cater for multiple devices. We had to move one of the beds to access a plug socket and unplug a lamp to access another! No fridge in room. There was nowhere to put a hand towel in the sink area, apart from on the surface next to the sink. Air conditioning unit was noisy and the walls are very thin, especially when you have a connecting door.  The pool and Jacuzzi were nice and good sizes. The Amber Waves Bar and Restaurant was very good. Reasonable prices and good food. Michael, who was serving behind the bar, was very knowledgeable of the local area and was very friendly,
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and have taken all your suggestions into consideration during our renovation the next year or so.  Thank you and hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Every time I come down to Knott's Scary Farm, I book a package through the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. It's a no-brainer. I went this past weekend, and as always, the experience was amazing. The check-in process was painless (we came early). The staff was very friendly, and the room was clean and comfortable. After a long night being scared senseless in the park, it was nice to make just a short walk back to my room and collapse. This hotel is great for the price, and I recommend it to anyone who is planning on spending time at Knott's or any other attraction in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and recommendation. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your Knott's Scary Farm experience extra special. We value your feedback and hope to see you back again soon.

Knott's was beyond fantastic the second night we arrived, informing us they were not charging WestJet for the first night of our stay, which meant that we would be refunded for our first night. Excellent service - thank you!

We were able to walk back and forth to the park, shops or restaurants.  Staying at this hotel made it perfect to enjoy the Halloween events easily.  We are already planning our next trip to Knotts Berry next year!

Summary: We booked a package to KBF that featured tickets to the Knott's Scary Farm, tickets to a regular day at KBF, a pre-scare dinner, and 2 days of the breakfast buffet at the Amber Wave's restaurant. The carpet was worn and smelled like sweat.  The door didn't close properly so we had to shut it very hard.   There was  mini- fridge and wet bar sink outside of the bathroom, but the coffee maker wasn't cleaned from the previous guests.  The beds were comfortable and we did sleep well after 2 long days at the park.  The pre-scare dinner was really fun and well thought out.  It was a buffet with zombies

They do offer breakfast buffet in some packages and our family loved the choices they offered.

The hotel is literally around the corner from Knott's Berry Farm park, a very easy stroll through the marketplace.  The pool area is large, includes a kid's splash area, and stays open until 11pm. You can feel and hear every single spring in the mattress, pillows were lumpy, and the curtains had holes.  The park is so close you can hear the screamers on the roller coasters, so pack ear plugs!  Between the busy carpet

I understand the hotel is going through a remodeling phase. I’m positive ear plugs would’ve blocked out the noise easily. So just keep that in mind if you’re staying there soon. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and I would definitely stay there again. Final note: the staff was very helpful and friendly

The rooms are of a good size located over 9 floors. Our room had a view of the park with the mountains in the distance. The room has a coffee machine but we used this to heat water to make tea (of course)  were British... It was absolutely fantastic value.  Check in - fantastic, easy, friendly and welcoming. I wish I could remember the lady's name, because she was excellent. The process was easy and organised , despite having to print off numerous vouchers / tickets in relation to our package - the receptionist placed them in separate envelopes for our ease. Our rooms were on the GF, overlooking the pool and near the gym and laundry room. Worried about potential noise, we asked for  move and were given it quickly and without any fuss.

Summary: Stayed here for a night while we visited Knotts. Overall we had a decent experience, but nothing too spectacular. At that time, I did a pre-check in which was quick and easy. We proceeded to a day at the park, and later I got a text notifying me that our room was ready and that I could pick up the keys.  After our day was done we headed back to the hotel.  I swung by the front desk and picked up our keys. We booked a double queen bed room for my wife and kids, and we were up on the 5th floor. The size of the room was adequate.  The beds could have been a little firmer to my liking. No mini fridge which I was hoping to use. The bathroom

Stayed here a few nights ago for the opening night of Knotts Scary Farm and I have to say, it was a pleasant surprise! We arrived at around 4pm and check-in was super easy. They gave us Scary Farm themed room keys that they told us to keep as souvenirs and the lobby had a couple of creepy clowns roaming around and scaring the guests, which I LOVED. They had some spooky decor in the lobby and the restaurant bar, too. Those are exactly the kinds of touches that will make me want to come back again.   The Room:  While not perfect, it was clean, comfortable and spacious. We did have a couple of slight issues like a broken drawer on the dresser, the elevator shaft being right on the other side of the wall and the adjoining door letting in a bunch of noise from the neighbor who was
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that we were able to enhance your Knott's Scary Farm experience. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I stayed here for not even a night. A friend and I arrived Monday night after landing in LA from Pittsburgh. Around 11:30 we get a knock on our door from hotel security saying we had been smoking weed in the room, and they were getting complains from customers. With no proof, and no time to defend ourselves, we were kicked out of the hotel with absolutely no where to go. We were told that if we paid a $300 fine for "smoking" we would be allowed to stay the night, so we were respectful and paid even though there was no proof we actually smoked in the room. 5 minutes pass and we are kicked out. We were given not even ten minutes to pack-up and find a new place to stay, and had security banging on the door as we were trying to change and get around. We are two girls, both 21, from

Summary Heading: Great if travelling as a family
Summary: I cannot fault this place. the only problem was that I was travelling as a couple ( left kids in London with grandma).  I would return as a family.  The check in was disappointing ...no attentive service and not very welcoming  but the bar staff and housekeeping are fantastic   would stay again with family 100%
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced however we are happy to hear that you had an overall enjoyable stay. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We purchased a Groupon for our stay.  Great price for Double Queen room.   We were hours early for check in.  Left our bags with the baggage check and went to the park.  Received a text a short while earlier that our room was ready.   Check in was a breeze.  Staff was exceedingly helpful and friendly. Great part was that it is a very short walk from the hotel to the Park entrance (3min). The restaurant was excellent.  The Server and Manager were especially careful of my food allergy.  We had dinner and breakfast there.   Highly recommend both the hotel and restaurant!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and recommendation. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We value your feedback and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel is ideal for those travelling with children. They offer a courtesy bus to Disneyland which returns at certain times and it is obviously close to the knotts berry amusement park. TGI Fridays is over the road and the hotel has a happy hour in the hotel bar. All rooms had a safe and were comfortable and decent sizes. I would stay here again were i going to disney however it is not ideal for exploring central LA. Lovely hotel and staff, would return
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here years ago & it was nice to see they've kept the place in pretty good shape.  Lobby area & our room was very clean.  Every staff member we ran across acted genuinely happy & were actively friendly to us.... was nice & appreciated as a customer.   We did get some outside noise bleeding into our room that was coming from the park itself (screams from the roller coaster).... exceptionally light sleepers be advised.  Additionally, the hallway did have a weird-ish smell to it (maybe a bit musty) but nothing seriously offensive.  The room itself had no odor at all.    Wish the rooms had a micro/fridge unit in them but even w/out that amenity I still like & will consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that our staff was able to make your stay extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed at the hotel in august then again in September nice clean hotel with friendly staff.Nice pool for the kids and a hot tub also has a nice gym and basketball and tennis  in a good place right next door to the knotts berry park and only a 5 min walk to knotts soak city also close to loads of shops and food outlets would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and got to experience all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: Will never forget the look on my 3.5 year old grandson's face when Snoopy came to our room to tuck him into bed.  Priceless!  Clean, comfy room in the Camp Snoopy section on the 2nd floor. Good breakfast buffet. Easy access to the park and friendly staff. Already looking forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that your grandson enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

I should say that it's an average family friendly hotel with a good restaurant (Amber Waves) on the ground floor offering breakfast, lunch and dinner. My original plan was to stay for only one night at Knott's Berry Hotel . However, with so much stress on consecutive days of travels, I

I am glad you had a good time and please consider us again when you are back in town.

Summary Heading: Great Location and Staff BADLY in need of repair/updating

We have three connecting rooms for our stay.  The good: - Everyone from Parking Attendants (Edith in particular) to front desk, to housekeeping, and telephone reservations staff were very friendly and helpful. - Location next to Knotts Berry Farm and just off the freeway is ideal for visits to Knotts and the rest of the area. - Outdoor area are well maintained  The bad: - The rooms are blast from the past and not in a good way. -  Granted we did not get ADA accessible rooms (not available) but the whole hotel seems just barely ADA compliant.  We could barely turn my dad's wheelchair around in the elevator or pass through

Summary: I stayed here with my family for 9 nights in August. The hotel as a whole was ok, but honestly, we were not over impressed. I recommend the hotel for a family who enjoy the theme parks and who have a budget. I will definitely will be returning for another visit soon.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean with great facilities for families
Summary: We stopped at the hotel for 9 days in total.  The hotel is ideal location when staying in LA.  We stayed on the 7th floor facing Disney, away from the pool.  In terms of noise, it is a little noisy when the theme park is open late but not that bad.  We did not notice it.   Both the waterpark and theme park are excellent and well worth a visit.  Whilst stopping at the hotel, parking in each of these locations is free.  The beds were clean and comfortable in our opinion.    The room was cleaned every day and you get a bottle of water each week (not sure of the point in this last one).  the on site restaurant is ok and you get 20% off as a guest.  We paid $5 a day for parking.  There is a heated Jacuzzi and a non heated pool.  The pool does get a little crowded and sometimes we did

Summary: We stayed for 8 nights at the back end of August and have nothing but positive things to say about the hotel.  Great atmosphere and facilities for families. As a family who had travelled from the UK we valued the friendly and attentive staff, the on site restaurant, pool and gift shop, and the location to local restaurants and shops.  Getting into LA and around the area via tours, Uber or Lyft is easy, cheap and convenient so don't be fooled into paying higher rates in the city.  Buena Park is a lovely area, totally safe and family friendly with plenty of great places to eat at night.  The hotel rooms are a decent size, clean and the beds are comfortable.

Summary: Stayed here on our first port of call of our Californian road trip adventure and it was great, really impressed and even though we never visited the park but wished we did, the location is fantastic and within walking distance.

I couldn't quiet pin point it but it smelled like dirty air conditioning with a terrible air freshener that didn't help. The front desk was courteous and quick which is always nice when you have kids and you have to haul your own luggage.  We booked a standard room with a great deal with a one day park ticket.  The room was old, dirty, and smelly. When we walked into our room the loudness of the ac was bothersome. This window ac made the room feel muggy and smelly. The

overall a great place to stay, clean hotel, my first experience there and it was great, loved the weight room, spa, sauna room and the pool, It is adult friendly as well great for the kids. Had entertainment at knots berry farm rides and great entertainment

Summary: Stayed there one night to visit Knott's Berry Farm. We purchased Classic Package that includes parking, admission tickets to the park and breakfast. From the hotel to the park was a quick walk. The tickets provided from the hotel included early entry privileges, so we were able to get to many rides before others. After playing all day at the park, we had dinner at Amber Waves Restaurant at the hotel. It was great to have Snoopy visit our table. My husband and daughter had fun at the swimming pool sfterwards. The breakfast buffet included in the package was mediocre. You can find a lot better
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all of the amenities that we offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

The shuttle to Disneyland was also very helpful since we went there for 2 days.  I also enjoyed being close to the many shops and the Chicken Dinner Restaurant.

I received a call from the reception double checking if we're extending our stay for another day, where I confirmed via phone that "YES", we would extend. The normal SOP on hotels as per experience is that they usually honor the words of the existing guest, as a matter of

Summary: We've been staying at this hotel for over ten years, and always appreciate the friendliness of the staff, the adjacent parking (at a reasonable rate), and the very short walk through the Marketplace to the amusement park. The add-on in-room refrigerator is a great deal at $10 per night (we drink a lot of milk, and have previously had difficulty keeping it cold in the ice bucket). The beds are comfortable, and the staff accommodated out on-line request for foam pillows (I am allergic to down).

Summary: Would definitely recommend this hotel.  Myself, my husband and 2 kids stayed there for 8 nights whilst in LA this summer.  We used it as our base and explored LA, as well as visiting Knotts Berry Farm and Soak City. Literally minutes walk from both and well placed for Freeway to go to the coast or downtown.    We had a refurbished room on the 5th floor.  Room was of a good quality and reasonable size; it was a little cramped for 4 of us for 8 days but any hotel room would have been!  Storage was ok.  The only thing lacking was electricity sockets which did create complications when charging everyone's phone and ipad!  Our room was very quiet.  Pool was very nice.  Would recommend Amber Waves for dinner as well as Mrs  Knotts Chicken Diner.  The Knotts Berry Bakery in the

Summary: We stayed here for two nights as we were visiting the theme park and water park. The hotel looks good from the outside, the lobby is big and fancy, their restuarant is reasonable value for money with tasty 'all American' food. Check in was quick and simple, and as we arrived the early evening and had not eaten, we headed straight to their restaurant. An hour later, we went to our room. It was a good size for a family of four, had a quiet but effective air con unit, and the beds were comfy. Unfortunately the bathroom, more specifically, the sink, was filthy. There was black sludge in the sink around and in the plug hole. It made me concerned that if something so obvious hadn't been cleaned, what else hadn't been cleaned. I went down to reception to let them know and ask them to

I would love the opportunity to win back your business.  Please contact Luz in my Administration office at the hotel.  Again, I hope to see you soon. Thank you!

Summary: I request 1st floor due, to my son autism sensory issue, they were very accommodation kind and understand. Super convenient to the park, allowing us to go back when was on sensory overload. The housekeeper came clean when we were out, since we came back midday.The 30 minute, allowed for hotel guest to enter the park early, allowed out son to get use to environment before the big crowd came in.  It also allowed him to visit snoopy before the big lines, and snoopy was just awesome with him. I Thank you for  awesome experience.

Summary: We stayed in the camp Snoopy room which was great, until we had neighbors.  They could easily be heard through the joiner door to the next room. The furnishings and facilities are showing there age, and there are dirty areas, stairwells, ect, however the pool area is new and clean.   Staff was amazing from parking to check out, professional and friendly.  You can't beat the close vicinity to Knotts Berry farm, medieval times, and many restaurants.   I'd stay here again but see if I could get a room that is quieter, perhaps without a joiner door.

Someone mentioned it to a housekeeper

Easy access to Knott's Berry Farm and Soak City water park. There are a lot of shops and restaurants out in front of the park itself, so you don't have to always have to enter the park. We had no issues and highly recommend this hotel, especially if you like the convenience of easy

I would come here again if we were going to the park.

Summary: The hotel itself is in a good location with plenty of parking. Handy for lots of tourist trips.   Basketball and tennis courts serviceable and the pool was pretty good.   Had selected the hotel based on the Snoopy themed rooms however there were none to be had and the room we ended up in was somewhat dated. The bathroom was very small and the aircon was very much what I imagine standing behind a departing aircraft would be like.   Staff were very nice and access to the park from the hotel is only a short walk away (about 5 mins)   Overall it served its purpose and we were out most of the time anyway but being in the room wasn't a particularly pleasant experience that you would look forward to after a busy day at the parks
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciated your comments and are in the process of updating our property the next couple of years.  We look forward to your future return!

Summary: We had an amazing time. The Knotts Berry Farm hotel was cute. The rooms were fine, they did the job. We will definitely book there again. The kids had fun in the pool, but too much chlorine...The walk to Knotts is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to enjoy our pool. We value your feedback and can’t wait to see you back again soon.

Summary: We love this hotel, it's a family hotel! If you want to be on your phone, laptop, tablet ... find some place else to stay. The pool, splash part is set up for kids. The Amber Wave has great food and Snoopy is always around for the kids and kids at heart.  I've seen negative posts - usually due to excepting a 5 star hotel, catering to adults. If that's what you're looking for, find a different place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to appreciate all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: worst place we have ever stayed
Summary: Bed smelled like pee. Bathroom was dirty with black hairs stuck to the walls and on the floor. We were told a short 5 minute walk to the park; not true to older people with sore legs.  And the water park was twice as far. There was no shade in either park. To get shade in the water park you needed to rent a cabana for about $200.00.  We bought the premium package but didn't get premium service.  Breakfast was not good. Dinner wasn't worth it. Couldn't wait to leave. Spent about $1,000; it was not worth it.  We've gone to Disney, Sea World and LEGOLAND, they were good.  We do not recommend staying here. Not a great hotel, not a great place. Worst chicken we ever had.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear about your stay and experience in the park.  We would love a chance to change your impression of your stay.  I would love, the next time you are in town, that you contact Luz in my Administration office at the hotel so we can earn back your business and impression of our property.  We are in the process of renovating the next couple of years and will have a newer product in the future.  Thank you again for your review.

Summary: The location is perfect if you are going to Knotts Berry Farm. The Huge lobby looks very welcoming. The rooms are spacious but a little worn. It would not hurt to keep up a little better to make a better initial impression with your guest. I wouldn't knock it for being dirty or bad service just needs a little tlc....that's it. Restaurant is good and convenient to grab a bite before walking to the theme park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize that your experience was below expectations. We appreciate your feedback as we are always looking to improve the guest experience.

Summary Heading: Pleasant Surprise in an Unexpected Place -- FRESH AND TASTY FOOD
Summary: Hotel does an excellent job of catering to Children - In the Snoopy rooms they are delightfully decorated with a Snoopy -- Peanuts theme. Snoopy puppies are on the bed for the children -- the door was opened to the room and my 2 grandchildren (1 year and 4 years) saw the Snoopy dolls and ran for them. There is a story time number on the phone for bedtime stories. Then who should knock on the door, but Snoopy dressed in his night shirt and night cap. Snoopy tucked the children in bed and gave them a big hug. My grandson when he was told we were going home, begged to stay. The regular rooms are regular hotel rooms nicely decorated and convenient to the park and other attractions in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that the kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel is adjacent to the park, so the ease of simply walking to the park daily is the reason we booked there.  It was a really good choice.  The kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy (the character shows up twice a day in the hotel) and overall, we had a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that you were able to utilize our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 1 night as we went to their amusement park. I was impressed with the open lobby and beautiful staircase but that was about it.  Pros 3-4 minute walk from amusement park 30 minutes from Huntington Beach Breakfast was typical spread but good and open until 11am  Cons Rooms definitely need upgrade. Bathroom: paint chip, mold, rusty looking shower fixtures. Found multiple hairs in the shower, pillows, and flat sheet Room phone did not work We arrived at 9am and noticed room service did not change out ANY of the coverlets.   In all, we will NOT be staying here again. I had remove the Coverlet get x4 flat sheets and pillow cases. Front desk was not apologetic. Room service was very pleasant but that's just not enough. Hotel needs a upgrade!
Manager Response: I so sorry to here about your stay at our property.  We are in the process of upgrades in our rooms the next two years.  I would like you to contact Luz in my administration office to ensure that your stay will be great next time and that you get one of the newer rooms.  We would love to win back your impression of our property.  We strive to provide the best service! Have a great day.

Summary: This hotel is nothing super luxurious; it's a family oriented hotel that is clean and comfortable. The staff is very helpful, kind, friendly - they make you feel welcome, and are ready to accommodate your needs.   It's close to the park and shopping. My family and I enjoyed our stay immensely!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Quick get away for Angels fan
Summary: My wife and I are KBF season pass holders for the first time and stayed at the park hotel for the first time. It was very clean, complimented the park well, and was definitely an exceptional value. Nothing is lavish, but everything is clean and the bed was quite comfortable (which is usually one of my complaints). The restaraunts, gift shop and other amenities were on the pricey side, but because of the hotels location, we didn't have to use any of them.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that we were able to enhance your Knott's Berry Farm experience. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We enjoyed getting our three kids and their families (six grandkids) all together for a mini vacation.  With each family living in different cities, it's hard for us to all get together at one time, so this trip was special.  We very much enjoyed the Knott's Hotel and it's proximity to the Park.  Had a great time at the park but our dinner at the Chicken Dinner house was a little disappointing.  Food and service seem to have taken a step back since the last time we were there several years ago.  Otherwise, a great time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is past its best,very dated and not all rooms are like those in the pictures. The rooms are clean enough but the furniture and decor is really not good enough by today's standards.Worth checking if there are any events on when you plan go,the hotel seemed to have been taken over by some kind of huge indian family get together for the whole week we were there with no consideration for other guests .The staff all seem very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We do have a variety group events at certain times of the year.  When you book next time, just ask your reservation agent to see if there are any large events going on at the property.  Also, ask for a renovated room with the new restroom.  We are in the process of updating the next two years.  Thank you again!

Summary: Since my last review after our 2015 visit, have stayed again in January 2016 and January 2017. As usual this a great hotel to stay at. Have just booked again for January 2018. My son and I come across yearly in January to go dirt bike riding, and attend a couple of races. Close to restaurants, and easy access to freeways. This time we must actually visit Knotts Berry Farm, of all the times we have stayed here we have never actually been to the theme park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We look forward to seeing you in January 2018.  Please visit our park on your next trip.

Summary: Very nice place to stay if your going to knotts. Clean friendly hotel. Walking distance  to the park and in room safe. Breakfast buffet was good, but I was surprised there was no chicken . Ice tea was good. Bartender made a good Mai tai
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Staying at the knotts berry farm hotel was excellent. Great customer service. Very family friendly. The pool area is awesome for the kids. The rooms are clean. Ambers Wave restaurant has good food. I recommend the stay at knotts berry farm hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and recommendation. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We value your feedback and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: I thought the hotel was really nice in parts, it made a change from the Vegas part of the trip not to walk into the cig smoke. The room itself was fine n the beds were comfy my only downside is how noisy the air con unit was  We wanted it on over night but it barely made a difference. The restaurant I thought was a bit expensive but the food was lovely and the staff really nice.  We got woken by a fire alarm on Saturday eve which was handled well. My only downside was there was event after event going on n no warning. I think it was Friday night there was a big wedding and the noise you could hear really late. It would have been nice to have tried the pool but it was super busy the whole visit. I have to say thank you to all the bell staff they were great esp with the shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and utilized all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and hope that we can earn a fifth star during your next visit.

Summary: While vacationing in the area to visit Disneyland, we decided to spend one night here and spend a day at Knotts Berry Farm.  Selected the package that included the rooms and tickets to the park.  Did the "pre-check in", picked up our park tickets, and was even able to store some of our luggage at the front desk.  They sent a text when our rooms were ready.  We were expecting a possible check in around 4:00, but our text came a couple of hours earlier.  Stayed in the Camp Snoopy wing and it was well worth it!  The hallway is decorated with Peanuts characters and the room was simply delightful.  The rooms are totally decorated in Snoopy, from the headboards to the ceilings.  Carpet has doggie footprints to complete the look.  The bathrooms are small and very plain, but how much
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that the kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The staff was very nice and accommodating. The rooms are not fancy, but they are very clean. The pool was clean, but the towels are so small, you might want to bring your own. Walking distance is great to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and that our staff was able to make your stay extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for a party. The event room in the hotel was great and the staff was friendly. The room was clean and spacious. Knott's Berry Farm is a short walk away which makes it easy to take a break during the day. The pool looks like fun for little kids. Overall a great hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Not impressed at all. Was hoping to see Snoopy in the lobby, no such thing happened. Teenagers are running wild thru the hotel. Front desk staff is adequate. Room was old, loud air conditioning, which was probably better for drowning out noise. Pool is okay but towels are beyond cheap and small. Housekeeping kept shorting us towels. Nothing particularly but also nothing at all good. Actually probably 2 1/2 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  We would love to see you back so we could give you a better impression of our hotel.  We strive to improve everyday!  We will be updating the next two years and would like to see you back.

Summary: Just checked in and no microwave in the room. No big deal, I'll just find out where one is that I can use. There is not one available, really? I'm ok with not having one in the room, but not having one available to use, unsatisfactory. Old and outdated, I'll stay somewhere else next time.
Manager Response: I appreciate your response and we are in the process of remodeling our property.  Unfortunately, we will not have microwaves but will have a new product in the near future.  I would love it if you could give us another try in the near future.  Thank you

Summary: This review is long overdue. We had a pretty good experience at the Knotts Hotel a few years back and left a good review, then a not so good experience which prompted a very bad review. If you've read my second review you will see a response from the Knotts Director of Operations, Stephen, who did a very good job of reaching out to make things right. We have since returned to give Knotts another chance, and we were not disappointed. It is a very nice hotel, clean, fairly quiet, and very conveniently located next to the park. I would recommend this hotel if you are planning a trip to Knotts Berry Farm. We had the one bad experience - which could happen at ANY hotel, but left very upset at the way things were handled. I believe that they have addressed the issues with their staff,
Manager Response: Thank you for your follow up review.  I am so happy we were able to make your return stay a memorable experience. We look forward to seeing you again. Have a great summer! Don

Summary: This a great hotel to stay at. The kids loved the fun pool. They also have a great play area and jaquzzi. Room service was quick and had lots of options. We will definitely stay there again... also price was good. It's very convenient when visiting both Knott's and Soak City.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and all that we have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: On yesterday my family and I had a great day at Knott's Berry Farm. We were undecided on where to take the kids...it was either Disneyland, Legoland, Magic Mountain, or UniversalStudio. Yet we wanted more of a calm and less wait time theme park, so we decided to choose Knott's even though my 9 year old came before he was younger. And I also like how we were able to bring in drinks and snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time here and were able to utilize all that we have to offer. We value your feedback and hope that we are able to earn a fifth star during your next stay.

Summary: The hotel was clean, accommodations were nice, the price was reasonable, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and the location is ideal for visiting the park.  The hotel pool even had a splash pad area.  The package we purchased included rooms, breakfasts, park tickets, and parking.  It was such a great deal.  The Snoopy Tuck In Service in the Snoopy themed rooms was so cute.  The Snoopy stuffed animal on the beds for the kids when they arrive in the room was such a wonderful touch.  The entire experience was amazing!  I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and recommendation. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of all the accommodations we offer. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Ellery from front desk is amazing. Great overall customer service
Summary: We have season passes and have visited twice this year. Both times I was checked in by ellery. It was the best customer service from a front desk. The pool and restaurant are also great. Overall great service and hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra enjoyable. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Visited last year and enjoyed our stay, so returned this year. Delicious breakfast in Amber Waves! Courteous staff, clean room. Close to both Knott's Berry Farm and Soak City. Definitely will come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to utilize our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel itself is nice even thoigh it is a bit dated.  The pool area is great with a large semi-heated pool,  hot tub, and a fun splash pad.  There are basketball and tennis courts with balls available with deposit in the gift shop.  Check in was smooth but the check in time is a bit late at 4pm.  That goes along with a noon check out time.  Hotel reservations include parking with a semi-short walk to the park and a longer walk to Soak City and Independence Hall.  If you have the included breakfast... it's great!!  Sausage, BACON, eggs, hashbrowns, French Toast/waffles, pastries, cereal, fruit, juices etc.  Now for my issue.  The place can be noisy.    I don't know what can be done about it on a whole hotel scale, but something on the adjoining room doors would help.  Noises
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. I apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced however we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay over all. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great experience at Knotts Berry Farm hotel
Summary: We got a fabulous deal on the Knotts Berry Farm website for hotel room and tickets to Knott's Berry Farm and water park. I debated if it was worth upgrading to the Snoopy room considering my kids are 9 and 11. But my kids absolutely loved the Snoopy touch and were so excited that Snoopy tucked them into bed every night. It was worth the extra money. The rooms could use some updating but they are kept clean and are in decent condition. The room we stayed in faces a wall so there was absolutely no view. But the hotel is very creative in putting some cute Snoopy cutouts on the wall so we barely noticed there was no view. The staff was great, restaurant was great and park was fun. I'm recommending to all my friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that the kids enjoyed meeting Snoopy. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Knotts berry farm is one of the last real family destinations in america that are good christian family people can enjoy. Thanks you guys for being real americans and sticking to an old school approach. Also mrs knotts restraunt in the best in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and everyone was able to have a great time. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed for our 50th reunion. The first room we received was on the third floor directly in the middle of the pool. Very loud room with a door to the next room. Very well secured but it was a "very loud" room. We were moved without a problem, to the second floor, in front of the tennis courts.  We probably should have stayed in the first room. The second room, didn't have a door but the toilet leaked a lot. It had just been cleaned so we didn't know about the leaking toilet until we were unpacked. We put down towels that were soaked every time we used the bathroom.  The decor is from the 70's but the bed was very comfortable. Air conditioning worked well. We had to move the coffee pot to the desk in order to plug it in. The coffee pot leaked when we poured coffee.  We attended
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  I appoligize for the noise you had during stay.  Please contact Luz in my office and she will make sure your next visit is great. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know.

Summary: We took our 2 grandsons to Knott's for a day and stayed at their hotel that night which was a great value for family fun. It included free lunch or dinner for the boys and free breakfast for all of us at Amber Waves Restaurant on premises. This was good as well.
Manager Response: Thank for your comments about our hotel.  We strive to provide great service.

Summary Heading: Friendly front desk staff and clean rooms
Summary: Stay was good. Rooms where spacious and clean hotel staff and park staff were friendly. Amber waves restaurant food was good and wait staff was nice for dinner. If you get the buffet for breakfast food was good but hostess was rude and we had to wait 30 min to get seated for food that was already out and ready. Would not get the buffet breakfast.
Manager Response: I appreciate your review to help us better ourselves for our guest.  I am glad your stay was good and appoligize for the interaction with our hostess.  I will be addressing and hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: One of the best experiences in a Hotel that I have ever had!! Their customer service is TOP NOTCH!!
Summary: First off, as many people may know from reading my reviews, I consider myself a superior judge of Hotels and Motels. I have stayed at thousands of locations across the United States and this is in my top 10. Ironically, this is by no means an updated hotel. At first glance, it is like any other resort hotel if not a little less updated. So, what makes this one stand out? The staff here go above and beyond expectations to make sure your stay is perfect. I was not planning a trip to California, but out of a great need to get out of Phoenix because of the heat, my daughter and I packed up for a last-minute getaway. When I arrived at the Hotel, there is a valet booth where you are greeted and directed to check in. No hassle at all, they allow you to pull right up to the front. There
Manager Response: I am glad you had a great stay during your visit to California.   We are in the process of renovating the next couple of years.  We take great pride into providing the best guest service to our guest and making sure your stay is great.  Thank you for your review!!

Summary: I was planning a trip with two 12 year old girls to Knotts and Disney California Adventure, so I wanted to be central to both. I was able to get a very reasonable price for June and we stayed 4 nights. I was pleasantly surprised. The staff at the front was very helpful and friendly. Check in was quick and easy. The room was a standard 2 queen room. The room was very clean, and smelled fresh and clean.The beds were comfy. My only complaint would be that its probably time to upgrade the bathrooms. The tub was clean, but it was definitely an older prefab that had seen some years and the paint on the walls was chipping a little, but it was clean and had good water pressure. The maids that cleaned daily were great. The room always was perfect upon our returns.  The hotel is very well
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your recommendation. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel in the Heart of the Action
Summary: I had the privilege of being a chaperone for my daughter's high school jazz band that came down to southern California for music festival.  We stayed at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel.  I was impressed by the location, friendly service, nice pool and the great restaurant attached.  I believe it was called "An American Restaurant."  The staff was friendly and efficient and the food was great.  How nice to not have to go offsite for a meal before or after a busy day of activities.  Even the maintenance staff was friendly and helpful  Consider this if you want to be close to all the action available in this part of California!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all that we have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: "Ok" hotel.  It's all about convenience to the park.
Summary: Don't expect a hotel themed after any part of Knotts Berry Farm park or history.   This is a basic hotel.     Proximity to the park is literally  the only selling feature of this hotel versus the vast quantity of nearby hotels.   The hotel is a quick 5 minute walk to the front entrance of the park and the famous Mrs. Knotts Chicken restaurant.    The hotel lobby decor is nice and has been refreshed in recent years.     The rooms are comfortable, but very basic.     The beds are good but room decor is lacking and feel dated.     The breakfast buffet is no frills- scrambled eggs, cereal, French toast, bacon, sausage, oatmeal, fruit, yogurt.   Around $15 per person.     It's a little more than the complimentary breakfast most hotels offer; but probably not $15 worth!     The server
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and were able to utilize our convenient location. We appreciate your feedback both positive and negative and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I was in quite of a shock when we checked in and got to our room given the daily rate this hotel charges...  The room is all 70s looking at best... I think it would be more a motel than a hotel.  I would say that the room is rather clean.  The hotel being close to other activities is also a plus  Me, knowing what I know now and given other options in Anaheim... I would choose differently
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize that your experience was below expectations. We appreciate your feedback as we are always looking to improve the guest experience.

Summary: Save your money and book something else down the street that includes breakfast ! The entire experience sounds great because of the location and pictures but the only thing attractive is the building. The room was so uncomfortable worse bed I've ever slept on in my life! Pillows were minimal and needed to be replaced and the room had a thin blanket that felt like motel material! The view was nice but that's about it ! I would have rather slept in my car
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize that you had a less than satisfactory experience however I appreciate you bringing these issues to my attention. Your comments will be reviewed by our management team as we look to improve.

Summary: Stayed here last week for 2 nights and had a very enjoyable stay. The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Its next door to Knotts Berry Farm theme park which was great for the kids.  Room service was very good and reasonable. I found the room to be clean and relatively modern. The only complaint I would have is that the pool is supposed to be closed at 10pm however, there were a lot of people in the hot pool until well past that.  They were drinking and being very loud but after staying at the Travelodge for the previous 4 nights, this was a minor complaint
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced however we are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience overall. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We loved the Hotel. It was very clean, up to date. Just wish the pool was heated at night. The staff was friendly, even met some very nice travellers. Can't wait to stay again. Pro: Early entrance to Knotts. Con: Wish there was more food options.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and were able to take advantage of the early entry to Knott’s Berry Farm. We hope that we can earn a fifth star on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Very offerdable and convient stay, close to Disney land
Summary: Very comfortable hotel, Affordable price, Very close to Disney land and easily accessible Holly wood studios. The resort also host an amusement park which is very adventurous and entertaining. The vicinity hosts good restaurant and eateries. There is an pharmacy and an dollar tree store close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The location is perfect for visiting the park. We arrived early and our room was ready and it came with tickets to knotts . The price was fair . The room was clean and beds comfortable. The only complaint was the air conditioning never really cooled the room well enough. We enjoyed the pool and dining in the lobby restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. I apologize for the inconveniences you experienced however we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Mark saw that we got what we needed
Summary: We arrived at 11 pm very sleepy from flying from Florida all day, and upon check-in Mark woke us up with his stellar service, and made sure all we needed was there, as well as how to get to the park and the pool.  The room was very comfortable..I loved the bathroom and vanities however, I had to take the coffee maker to the vanity to plug it in.  No biggie.  We had quite a good view of some roller coasters.  The next day we went to Knotts Berry theme park and the walking distance was the best.  Also, as guests we got discounts at the gift shop and the restaurant.  Following day we used the pool.   Though I didn't quite get housekeeping knocking while we were at the room, I didn't understand what they meant (my mistake, I said we were ok) they left me a note stating I refused
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to experience all that we have to offer. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Knotts hotel always feels like coming back home. The staff remains the same and are very accommodating . It is always a little disappointing not be able to check in early because families want to stay a little longer and I am one of them. Knotts now offer electronic upgrades to stay until 3pm. I took full advantage of the upgrade. Breakfast at Amber Waves is $16.99 if you don't include it in your hotel package.   I have been coming to Knotts hotel every year since 2010. Family and people friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and your continuing loyalty. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that we are always able to make you feel right at home. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very enjoyable stay. The front desk staff was courteous and friendly. Room was very clean as well as the bed and bathroom. Excellent location for amenities. Only seven minutes to the actual park entrance. I would recommend this family friendly hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review and recommendation. We are very happy that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We hope to earn a fifth star on your next visit.

Summary: Ok so this was our first time at the hotel using it with our season pass discounts.  It was my birthday and quite frankly stayed here so the kids could enjoy the park for a couple of days and so that i didn't have to cook or clean my home during my birthday weekend.  :D  Pros:  It was a wonderful weekend.  Maybe it was just because it was my birthday weekend, but everything was lovely.  The employees were all pleasant considering it was a holiday weekend with constant flow.  I got answers to all my questions regarding anything local, and check in was painless and and checkout was very easy.  The fact they have a splash pad in addition to a pool and spa was very awesome as my 3 and 7 year old loved it and one afternoon was very laid back by the pool enjoying my husband and kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit your detailed review. I apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced however we are happy to hear that you had an overall enjoyable experience. Your comments will be reviewed by our management team as we are always looking to improve the guest experience. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Just got back from one day stay at hotel and theme park.    Theme park was lots of fun, very clean, well maintained and family oriented.  We had a blast on the rides, food in the park was fine.  Funnel cakes are wicked good park fare.  I was wondering about security at the park, since we didn't see any.  But when there was a minor incident at one fo the rides the security suddenly appeared from thin air and took care of the issue.  People were escorted out of the park and no ones day was ruined, due to someone else's bad choices.  The park was full of bus-loads of kids,  since it was a week day.  But still plenty of room to wander around,  make sure you purchase the fast lane option. The option will save you a lot of time if you are only there for one day.     Now let me address

I would expect a bit lower prices in hotel restaurants but I would pick to stay at Berry Knott's Farm hotel. Hope to come back and visit their amusement park the next time!

Summary Heading: No extra amenities that I have become used to. No microwave. No refrigerator or kitchen. No plugs for charging.
Summary: No microwave on the property. No mini refrigerator, only one outlet to plug in phones or anything else. The staff is nice. The pool is big and looks to always have sun in it. There is a dry and wet sauna, Along with a gym.

Summary Heading: Amenities are good, restaurant and bar excellent, but.......
Summary: Stayed at Knotts Berry Farm hotel for a quick two night stay.  The room came with all the expected amenities, but the room was pretty small and the bathroom was way too small for two adults and two teenagers.  Getting ready was chaotic.  So beware, the room size can be a challenge.  Some of the ticket packages include the breakfast buffet.  Be warned that this is not a huge spread with tons of selections.  It is basic eggs, breakfast meat, fruit, and disappointing bakery items.  I don't recommend including it in your ticket package.

Summary: Took a quick trip to Knott's Berry Farm with the family.  Rates were pretty cheap for the weekend.  Big room, beds were comfortable, and the bathroom was clean.  Great customer service form the parking attendant and the front desk.  Pool and fitness center we nice. The water in the pool was freezing though.  Family had a great time and its walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm.

Summary Heading: So Sad!! It has turned into a DIVE!
Summary: We arrived late last night (Too late to go anywhere else)  Got off the elevator on the 6th floor and were hit by a nasty smell. We eventually found it. There was a room service tray in the hall - judging from the extreme crustiness of it, I'm guessing it had been there for most of the day and night.  Bad start was worsened by the fact that our room wasn't clean. Bathroom grout is WWII era and gross. (I'll post photos tomorrow,) Bed is cheap and hard. And old.  I completely agree with the other recent post that says it "Needs updating." Scuffs on doors and walls, holes in draperies, etc. (And you have to spring for more $$$ if you want a mini-fridge in your room)  We had stayed here a lot in the past, but this is our last time here, unless the property undergoes massive rehab -

Summary: Enjoyed the family trip to knotts but they can really modernize the hotel. Felt old and kinda dirty. There are plenty of nice hotels around Anaheim /OC so shop around before booking. There isn't really anything attractive about this hotel besides it's next to Knotts. They could do better. I noticed ever since knotts went corporate it lost that special feel to it.

Summary: Stayed here with my wife and 2 children for 3 weeks during our holiday from Australia. After a long flight We arrived just before lunch and luckily our room was ready for us. Our check in experience went smoothly and we we're greeted in a professional matter. Once we got to our room our first thought was that the hotel probably needs a bit of love. Old curtains and blinds an outdated air condition system were the noticeable standouts but other than that it was what we had expected. Front desk we're always accomodating with any of our requests and would always respond within minutes. Our standard room didn't have a fridge so we decided to pay the $20 for our stay which came in handy for our drinks. The complimentary Disney shuttle service came in very handy , there are 3 or 4

Summary Heading: Great place for a family vacation.
Summary: Checked in Thursday left Saturday very fast check in great service. They had me up on the 5th floor but when I asked for a lower level they moved me to the 2nd floor. Room was great had a view of there court yard were there was a mama duck and her 11 babies to watch. Pool area was huge you didn't feel cramped in the pool or the sitting area. The fitness center is nice as well. Will be coming back to this hotel price is not bad considering were it is located at. Had one issue in the gym and went to the check in and let them know and they had security take care of the problem really fast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was able to remedy the issues that you experienced. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We took our son here for his 6th birthday.  He loves Knotts Berry Farm, so we decided to stay at the hotel and spend the day at the park.  They have a camp snoopy floor that is not well advertised on the website, but snoopy comes in at night and tucks the kids in.  He was so excited about this!  They also have a nice heated pool, large hot tub and small water park for the kids along with being within walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm.  The staff were friendly and attentive and the rooms were clean.  Overall we had a great experience that my son will remember for a long time.

Summary: If you want to stay near the park this is the hotel for you great prices and great views the rooms were clean and nicely put together i felt safe here the pool looked nice s clean thebarea was clean snoopy would even come to the hotel to say hi in the mornings the resurant in the hotel hadngreay food

Summary: Very convenient of course for going to Knott's berry farm. We have passes, so we also got a discount on our stay.  The rooms were very nice. Spacious as well. The hotel staff was nice. Nothing extra or out of the ordinary.  The pool was very nice. They have a little play area for the kids and it was a lot of fun.  Nice little garden also. Cute for parties, or small weddings.  Overall we had a great time and would consider going back.

Summary: Room is comfortable. Complimentary bottled water is given. Wi-Fi access is good. There is swimming pool and laundry here but of course u need to pay and do ur own laundry. There is a theme park in the vicinity but a pity I was there late and had to check out early morning so can't enjoy the theme park.

Summary: This is a very good full service hotel, pretty easy to find when driving in the LA area, well signposted with a large car park which you pay $7 a day for. No resort fee just a very good rate found on line. The hotel room was clean with everything you need for a few days. The staff were great, helpful and very efficient, as the TV was not working, well within 30 minutes someone came and sorted it out. we did an organised LA bus tour which was amazing and they picket us up at this hotel. breakfast buffet was very nice and good value. Hoping to visit LA again so would come again to this hotel.

Summary: But stay away from the steak in America restaurant ☺ Staff was friendly and the park is pretty much next door! Very convenient.  Rooms are clean. Nice atmosphere.  We're looking forward to another visit soon!

Summary: The hotel was great with few exceptions. Very clean, friendly staff and good food in the Amber Waves Restaurant.  The good: Very clean for as busy as it is, the staff is very friendly and works very hard to ensure your needs are met. We had a few issues , and they dealt with them in a polite and professional manner. Great parking with security around 24/7. Easy park access and plenty of restaurants within walking distance. The grounds are beautiful and very well kept. There is also a shuttle to Disneyland which is a great convenience!  The not so good: Our first night, we were in room 817. Directly behind the elevators. Not a good room to have if sleep is important.  Also, an additional $100 for that room and any on higher floors. Didn't know about that. They moved us to the 4th

Summary: We stayed at Knotts hotel for the first time a couple of weeks ago and it was a wonderful stay! We were in one of the camp Snoopy rooms and were very pleased. The room was decorated in Peanuts, which our kids loved.  As far as the room, the beds were super comfy, there was a mini fridge, and everything was nice and clean, and in good repair. There is a big pool and a  splash pad on the property, as well as tennis and I think basketball courts, though we didn't use those. We ate at the restaurant in the hotel and it was really good, though a tad pricey. The thing we loved the most was that Snoopy was in the lobby and restaurant a lot, so the kids got lots of interaction with him. Overall, it was a wonderful experience and we would definitely stay there again!!
