Summary Heading: Everything was great except the in-hotel restaurant Amber Waves
Summary: Went to Knotts berry farm for my 50 b-day wnd stayed at the hotel the previous night. 7 hour car ride got to hotel at about 8pm went to Amber Waves to get food. There was more staff than customers and could not get any service other than taking order, delivering order (hubbys burger was wrongly cooked) and getting the check. Needless to say...no tip.

Summary Heading: Knott's Scary Farm surprises for all
Summary: Our entire extended family visited Knott's Scary farm this year.  This is not our first time at the Knott's Resort.  The grandkids loved the pool and the haunt!  All of our food choices, Amber Waves restaurant, Mrs. Knotts Chicken dinner was awesome.  We cant wait to go back next year Chris H

our family purchased the haunted dreams package.the pre scare dinner was awesome and they served great food,the breakfast buffet was wonderful as well.the staff was so nice and helpful,our family will remember this vacation for ever and we will be back next year.the only complaint was that the bar prices were a little out of control,my wife and I ordered two beers and it was $17.00 bucks.other than this it was a perfect stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. Your point regarding Amber Waves has been brought up to the restaurant management for review. However, we are happy to learn that the package deal was enjoyable and accommodating of your needs during your visit. We hope to host you and your family should your travels bring you our way.  Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: My friend and I surprised our 6-year-old girls with an over-night trip at Knott's Hotel.  I purchased the Classic Package off the Knott's website, which was a great savings to us.  It included: over night stay, parking, breakfast buffet and 4 park admission tickets.  Purchasing all these things separately we would have paid at least $100 more, so I highly recommend the package deals on their website.  We were met by Snoopy in the lobby and later at Amber Waves restaurant at the hotel.  The kids LOVED that.  The pool/jacuzzi  area is great, complete with a sprinkler area for kids.   We had dinner at Amber Waves and kids ate free for lunch and dinner with purchase of each adult meal, which was also a nice savings.  The food was delicious (angus beef burger and excellent turkey/veg

Clean hotel and room. Friendly staff. Wonderful park and super prices for both hotel and park entrance. Easy to get from hotel to park. Overall a very nice stay. I will definitely be back. I very much enjoyed having Snoopy in the hotel and restaurant for pictures.

Summary Heading: Fun with My luvbugs as an older mama
Summary: I arrived with my three luvbugs ages 4, 2 and 2 as an older mama and having visited a lot of places I found this hotel to be clean and worth the money to stay. The only negatives I can say is they charge extra for a refrig. and that the rooms are not ready until after 4 pm. The staff is very nice and go out of their way to make sure that you enjoy your stay. We stayed in the Camp snoopy room. Every evening Snoopy came to say goodnight to the kids and took his time to let you take photos. At breakfast snoopy visited and took time at each table to visit, Knotts Berry farm is very much about having a fun family experience unlike the over priced Disneyland that the cast members are very rude at! I won't waste my time nor money to go back to Disneyland but will return for a vacation

I had high hopes for this place, but it's worse than some of the Best Westerns I've stayed at! It is a very run-down property. The lobby was sparkling and grand, and Snoopy was there to take pics!, but the rooms themselves were disappointing.  The bed sheets were thin, scratchy and low quality. My legs felt itchy throughout the night and afterwards. Horrible!!! The towels were thin and hurt my face!  There was hardly any sink space to place your toiletries, which was inconvenient and annoying.  The place smelled....well, old, and the air conditioner didn't do much to mask that.  There are lots of families, so noise level was not great. Especially if you have a door between your rooms...well, you hear their entire conversation and kids yelling. And if there is anyone outside in

Summary Heading: 10 days at Knott's Berry Farm Resort
Summary: The only bad things I can say about this place are we didn't have a refrigerator in our room and a little difficulty with the shuttle service during a sickness. Check with the hotel before booking - some rooms do have refrigerators (noticed this when a door was open while being cleaned).  Shuttle service requires reservations coming and going. They don't like changes. Amber Waves Restaurant has good pizza. Mrs. Knott's Restaurant has great fried chicken, but you get A LOT of food (biscuits, soup or cherry rhubarb salad [delish], lettuce salad, corn, mashed taters and gravy, 4 pieces of chicken, and dessert for about $18) and with no fridge in the room, taking leftovers with you is out of the question. I would recommend either splitting the meal between 2 people or the Chicken to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a hotel review about your stay at our hotel. I am happy to learn that our staff and the Mrs. Knott's Chicken Dinner restaurant were an enjoyable experience for you. Regarding refrigerators, our oversize rooms do have them, whereas the standard size rooms do not. However, the standard size rooms can have a refrigerators placed in the room for a one time $20 charge, so if you are going to stay with us in the future please ask the front desk staff. We look forward to hosting you and your family should your travels bring you back to our area.  Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Large, clean room. Front desk was super polite and even helped print my Scary Farm tickets, on top of upgrading my room for a small up charge. The whole stay was fantastic and all for a Knott so scary price ;-)

Summary Heading: Review of Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel
Summary: We had a great time at the hotel. We were there for the Scary Farm experience, and got a package deal. It was very nice, not fancy and the room was clean, but needed some touch up painting and a little TLC, but was very comfortable and clean. We ate dinner and breakfast at the hotel, and it was very good. This was all included in our package. I think the check in time is a little late at 4:00 when you have to be out at 12:00, but other than that, we enjoyed it very much. The staff was great.

Checked in and hotel staff was amazing.  Very helpful and friendly.  Got to room and room was very nice. We we're there for the Halloween haunt.  Went to the pre scare dinner and that was amazing.  Hotel, staff and restaurants were excellent.

Summary Heading: The reason to stay here is the proximity to Knotts.
Summary: This is a nice place to stay.  Nothing fabulous, but it is the best place to stay for proximity to Knotts Berry Farm.  The all you can eat breakfast is just ok.  The rooms need a tiny bit of TLC.  But all in all, this is a great place to stay.

Summary Heading: Great Value and Bags of Fun
Summary: We stayed here with our two boys for a two night package which included breakfast, one day entry to park, and car parking.  Great value!  The room was a standard two Queen room, clean and comfy.  Breakfast was average, but did the job.   The park was a few minutes walk - very handy. Happy hour was great at the bar, and we ate dinner at the restaurant - fantastic food!  We all loved Snoopy who appeared at breakfast and was around and about the hotel during the day and night!  Much better value than Disney - and rides at park more suited to our older boys (14, 11).  We will be back - next trip to USA!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am happy to learn that all of our accommodations at the hotel were an enjoyable experience for you and your family. We hope to have you back with us on your next trip to the US.   Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We have stayed at Knotts Berry Farm on more than 5 occasions, when we visit USA.  It is very dated, but in a great location.  Unfortunately they will not let you have a room until 4.00pm, not helpful when I just got off a 14 hour flight, at 7.00am.  I was forced to all asleep in the lobby, before a room suddenly became available.  Overall, Knotts, we will be staying somewhere else in the future.

The rooms are large and comfy. The staff are all very friendly. An overall great place to stay, especially if you're going to Knotts Scary Farm and plan to stay late. The hotel is very close to the park.

We selected Knotts Berry Farm due to the walking distance to the park, the Snoopy themed rooms and easy access from the freeway. The hotel room was clean, lobby nice and the surrounding property well maintained. The price for the Snoopy themed rooms was more then what I wanted to pay but my daughter loved it.  The property has been there awhile. If you are tall, the bathroom ceiling will be a problem and the look of the vanity area is 20+ years old. However it was clean.  The breakfast buffet, I would not recommend. Order off the menu. Waffle house would be an upgrade from the buffet.

My husband and I have stayed here every October for the past 13 years and take advantage of their halloween package (to attend Knott's Scary Farm without having to drive home at 2am!).  We've always had a great experience with booking online, checking in, staff interaction and accommodations.  The staff are very friendly and helpful, and the rooms we've had are always clean and very comfortable.  We stayed here last week and noticed that they have redone their front desk and reception areas since last year (they look very new and nice!).  We usually have dinner and breakfast in the hotel as well and they're always great.  I really like the fact that it is VERY close to the park (but far enough so that there isn't noise), and we are able to walk to and from Knotts comfortably.

I was going to Knotts Berry Farm so selected this hotel as it is walking distance to the park and to the stores.  One night I walked and had the very good chicken dinner in the Knotts Berry Farm shopping area.  The hotel had very good rates October 2014 which included a breakfast buffet in the morning.  While the hotel is older, my room was still quite nice with king size bed, desk area, comfortable chair, and convenient location to Knott's.  There is an in room safe which is also nice.  The services at the resort are quite nice.  The swimming pool area has a large swimming pool, and also kid's play area.  Lots of seating to enjoy the area.  The pool is open till 11 at night.  I had breakfast at Amber Waves, the on site restaurant  Buffet was good - adequate to get one started

Summary Heading: We will come again to KNotts Berry Farm Hotel
Summary: We came with 2 other families.... our rooms were very close to each other... the front desk was able to accomodate that.... we enjoyed our room and stay here.... The restauraunt downstairs was also delish... we recomment highly!!!!  the only pary we did not care for .. is there was only 1 bell hop ... so we got the cart and loaded our luggate ourselves and returned the cart.........

Summary Heading: Great value especially with Season Passholder discount
Summary: We were able to get a very competitive rate to stay here, perhaps due to being an unusual time of year and during the middle of the week.  Would definitely stay here again, especially at the very attractive pricing plus a season passholder discount on top.  Potential stayers should be aware that this hotel is an older property that has been renovated, and is of the age typical in the Anaheim / Buena Park theme park areas.  We found what others have said here to be true:  very few electrical plugs, no refrigerator in room, and walls are thin.  Bring a power strip if plugging multiple devices is important, perhaps an ice chest if something needs to be kept cool.  Only thing we felt was not up to the Knotts standard was the Amber Waves restaurant.  Food was good (but not

We go every year to Knotts Scary farm and stay at the hotel on their Haunted dreams package. Its a nice weekend getaway but lately this is getting pricy for the second night. there should be a discount if you stay more than one night. Hotel is clean and well decorated in the bar. Fun place to get away from work

Once agin it was October and was time to enjoy our family scaryfarm trip !! The Haunt package is awesome!! I look forward to it next year. The hotel staff is great. Great trip, great hotel, great time!!!

The room was big and clean, my grandkids enjoyed the pool and the front desk personnel was very helpful.  It was walking distance to Knotts Berry and a nearby mall for buying groceries.  Do highly recommend the hotel when visiting Knotts Berry.'

Summary Heading: Be Cautious of Haunted Dreams Reservations!!!
Summary: I called today to make reservations for tomorrow night's Halloween Haunt. I was booking the Haunted Dreams package. However, due to my bank not depositing my paycheck in a timely manner, my debit card was declined at the time of booking (Knott's requires up front payment on hotel reservations). I told the Knott's reservation agent I would take care of the matter and call back to complete the reservation, however before I could get the matter resolved with my bank Knott's Berry Farm made a $50 debit from my account WITHOUT my permission. The bank notified me and I immediately called Knott's to find out what the problem was, considering the fact that no mention of a $50 fee was ever brought up by the reservation agent. When I called, I spike to the same agent who assisted me

This stay was not the cheapest, the are tons of other hotels in the area for less than half the price but we opted to stay in the hotel for the experience. Not only did my kids see Snoopy multiple times in the lobby, but one of the perks of staying in a Camp Snoopy room is being tucked in by Snoopy for the night. It's something they will never forget. We had an awesome time and the trip was well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your kids got to experience our unique Camp Snoopy room, as well as got to see Snoopy during your stay at Knott's Berry Farm. We hope to host you and your family in the future.  Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: From check in to check out, our experience was fantastic. The beds were comfy, the air conditioning was wonderful as it was a really hot weekend. The service from the staff was wonderful. The TV worked great and best of all we were right next to the pool but couldn't hear all the kids playing in the pool.

I truelly enjoy staying he, the service is great and the rooms are great! I would recommend getting the Knotts classic package, won't have to worry about where to grab breakfast each morning and on one of your days you can just walk on over to the theme park!

Summary Heading: Good not great time for the price of the adventure.
Summary: This package deal used to be a greatdeal. Now it's becoming a lil too expensive for what your are getting at Knott's Scary Farm.  The hotel is great, the service great, the rest of the services are ok, and Knott's Scary Farm is lacking the SCARY!  Far less mazes, far less performers, and far less shows and excitement!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We appreciate you explaining your frustration regarding the attractions that you encountered at the park, as Knott's takes great pride into making each year's Scary Farm a unique experience. The park has brought in some new attractions such as the "Special Ops Infected" as well as "The Tooth Fairy" and other mazes. With that being said, this has been brought up to the parks management to help with training purposes for our 'monsters'. We appreciate your continued loyalty with us and hope to have you back with us in the future.  Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: My boyfriend and I go every year for halloween haunt and stay at the hotel two nights. All the employees were great and made my boyfriends birthday and our stay great. We had a buffet dinner and buffet breakfast that's always so good. We ordered food and drinks by the pool which also was good.

Summary Heading: Another great visit at the Hotel
Summary: Stayed at the hotel for Knotts Scary Farm.  We had stayed there before and the service is still A-1. Checked in at 9 am and received our tickets from the front desk. Saw Snoopy in the lobby and the hotel is decorated in a Halloween decor. Off to the park we went and were texted that our room was ready by 12:30pm.  It literally takes 5 minutes to walk from the park to the hotel.  With us doing the park during the day and then returning in the  evening for scary farm- you cannot beat the hotel  location. This hotel has great customer service to make your visit a pleasant experience. Will definitely stay again.

Stayed with my wife and  2.5 year old boy.  Why go to Disney when Knott's Berry Farm is sooo much better value for your dollar.  ...even if Snoopy is a little boring.  A good time was had by all.  Between Sept 18 - Oct 31 they have Knott's Scary Farm, with a Halloween theme.

Summary Heading: Great for a one or two night stay
Summary: I recently stayed with my friends at this hotel for Knott's Halloween Haunt. The location is super convenient, right next to the park, especially for the end of the night when you are dead tired.  I found the staff to be pretty friendly and willing to help with any issue that should arise.  I've seen some reviews state that there was no wifi.  This is not correct, I was able to get on the guest wifi, complementary, and it was a pretty good speed.  I was able to check emails with ease and even watch a couple youtube videos without buffering etc. There are really only two issues I have with this hotel.  One of them is that the bed is not super comfortable, but it isn't horrible. 2nd is that the shower is super duper difficult to figure out.  You have to really want to take a

After reading reviews here and on that other (red colored) review site I was worried about the mixed reviews. The building looked old but fine. Parking lot was in good order and beautiful flowers and landscaping lined the hotel. I walked in and swore I was in a Westin or other 4+ star hotel. Check in was fast (ask for an upgrade at a reduced price if available!) and the elevators were super fast and clean. Got to the room and was so relieved-clean, nice, smelled good. Not sure who needs a wet-bar for a Knott's trip but the nice room had it, a small office and nice bathroom. Really if I channeled my inner Jon Taffer I could complain that the shower temperature control was reversed (hot went to cold and vice versa) and the dresser drawer side of the room wasn't flush which made
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that our accommodation were very enjoyable for you and your family. I understand that the breakfast buffet was not up to par, and this has been shared with the restaurant's management in order to avoid such a unique experience from reoccurring. We appreciate your loyalty and hope to host you and your family in the future.  Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: When it comes to hotels, I don't consider myself a particularly picky person. Some people complain about old TVs, the need for updated decor, or a lack of a mini fridge. Me? I just want a comfortable bed, a decent shower, and if I am lucky A/C or heat that works. Imagine my chagrin when I discover that the hotel that my husband and I booked for our honeymoon had only decent A/C.  While our hotel room at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel (room 742) could be considered on the small side, that did not bother me in the least because I didn't expect to spend a ton of time in the room. Upon sitting on the bed, though, I knew that our stay was going to be horrible. Since hotel rooms are typically meant for sleeping, you would think that the mattress would be at least somewhat comfortable. I

one of the worst place I stayed and advise everyone to avoid this place. It is clean and look impressive until you walked into your room. Small rooms , no wi fi service, not even water for drink. Pay extra for parking. Pay $4 for small bottle of water. Bar close at 11 pm. What a dump.
Manager Response: I am very disappointed to learn that your experience with us was so poor earlier this month. As you can see from several positive reviews, your experience was extremely uncommon and not something you should expect from our property. To clarify, we do have complimentary WI-FI throughout the entire property. While you are correct about the bottle of water in the room having a cost associated, we do offer complimentary water and coffee in our restaurant. Like many other establishments in our area, Amber Waves Restaurant (in the Hotel’s lobby) does have fluctuating hours based on the day of the week and time of year. It is upsetting that these factors so adversely affected your stay and resulted in your suggesting that we are a ‘dump’ however I am still interested in learning more about your experience if you care to share it. Please feel free to contact me via phone or email if there is more information that lead to this accusation other than your device’s inability to find the complimentary WI-FI, secured parking lot fees, and apparent dehydration. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager Stephen.Ruggiero@Knotts.com or 714-243-2006

Summary: Stayed here as a part of my group tour. The rooms were very spacious though the bathroom was a bit cramped. This is right next to the theme park so if you want to enjoy a vacation just at this hotel there is ample around to keep you busy. The hotel has one restaurant though there are more options a little walk away. I didn't have food at the hotel restaurant so can't comment on that. The swimming pool was quite small and nothing to boast about. There is a big Walgreen's store right opposite to the hotel.  Snoopy roaming around the hotel was a cute concept. snoopy was popular not just with the kids but adults as well.

My fiance and I stay here every year when we go to Halloween Haunt at Knott's; nothing terribly fancy, but it's clean, comfortable and you cannot beat the location.  We did the Bare Bones package this year, which includes the room, parking at the hotel, 2 tickets to Haunt and the commemorative room keys, but in the past have done other packages that also included the pre-scare buffet at the hotel and breakfast the next morning.    We did miss the usual Halloween decor this year and I guess that would be my only real complaint.  Pro Tip:  If you check in later in day (6pm or later), you might get to see Snoopy in the lobby :)  It's very convenient to be able just to walk next door to the park, so that's totally worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel. I am happy to learn that your stay was comfortable and the Barebones package accommodated your needs. We appreciate your loyalty and hope to see you again next year!  Thank you,  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: The staff was especially friendly and the room was nice and clean with a very comfortable bed. I enjoyed the discount provided by my park season pass and got the package with breakfast buffet at Amber Waves. The breakfast was basic (eggs, denver eggs, hash browns, bacon, sausage, croissants and juice/coffee) but delicious. I liked not having to leave to get breakfast in the morning, it was nice to go downstairs and have breakfast before going back up to pack and leave. Will definitely stay here the next time I'm travelling specifically for Knott's Berry Farm.

Knott's Berry Farm Hotel is a great place to stay if you plan to visit Knott's Berry Farm Amusement Park. It's very convenient to be able to walk over from the hotel to the park. We did the package that included the hotel stay, free breakfast buffet, one free dinner, free parking, and a one day pass to the park. They print out vouchers to give out as you do these things. This makes it nice and convenient. I would recommend doing the package. The food at the restaraunt is good but not excellent and probably a little over priced. That is the only somewhat negative thing I would have to say about the experience. We went during the week in the fall and practically had the park to ourselves. Whille others were waiting in line forever at Disneyland, we were getting all the rides we

Summary Heading: Pretty enjoyable with a few hiccups
Summary: We booked this hotel on hotwire and stayed here for our trip to Disneyland.  We requested rooms right next to my inlaws, and they honored our request, which was nice.  We got great rates, and thought the room was A-okay.  We did have to pay $5 a night for parking and my in-laws had to pay $7 a night - I think the rate you have to pay for parking depends on how large your room is or how many beds you have or something.  I think we were placed in one of their very smallest rooms (no bathtub, just a shower!) but it was still large enough to fit our pack n play and small bassinet for our two kids.  The room was fairly nice, but I was careful to unplug both of the phones so my toddler wouldn't accidentally dial anyone, which would incur a hefty fee.  We didn't go out of our way to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and leaving such a detailed review. I wanted to briefly touch on a few things you mentioned so that you and any potential guests are aware for the future. The parking rates should only fluctuate relative to the way the reservation was booked and since you both used Hotwire I am not sure why they were different. The room size, however, I can explain as what the industry refers to as ‘run of the house’ room availability. When using a bidding site like Hotwire or Priceline we are often able to offer our guests a heavily discounted rate under the knowledge that they will be given any available room type that can accommodate the number of registered guests. The employee interaction about the bell cart is very odd but no employee should be rude, whether it to be a guest or a fellow employee so I certainly apologize for behavior. Over all, I greatly appreciate your review as it gives us several growth opportunities and I hope that you do visit us again if your travels take you back to our area. Thank you and have a great day! Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager Stephen.Ruggiero@Knotts.com or 714-243-2006

Summary Heading: So close to becoming a perfect stay
Summary: At first glance the room was clean and tidy. The layout was like all basic rooms. The first thing my fiancee and I did was lay on the bed. It was amazing! Plush and comfortable. It was so comfortable we really didn't want to get up to start our day. The bath room was spacious. My only complaint was the brain plug in the bath did not want to stay down. We could not take a bath because of it. If it wasn't for that our stay would of been perfect. Will stay at this hotel again for sure.

Booked the hotel based on pictures of Snoopy rooms.  I was sold when I saw that Snoopy tucks the kids in, and they get a snoopy plush to take home and the package deal was too good to pass up.  Check in was quick and easy, the staff was very friendly.  The hall way to our room was charming with the characters on the wall.  My nieces (4 and 8) were so excited to see all the stuff in their room.  The Amber Waves restaurant was great, delicious food and the kids ate free. We met snoopy when he went to the lobby, making sure he wasn't too scary for the girls.  But they loved him.  He came by to tuck them in, and they were so happy.  Went to the park the next morning, which is right next to the hotel.  Overall, made some great memories and would love to do it again.  Will definitely

I brought my 3 kids to stay at the hotel and enjoy Knotts for the day/night. The hotel is very clean and staff friendly. We stayed in the oversized room with 2 queen beds. I highly recommend the oversized room with kids or even just a toddler. Perfect for playing without crowding everyone. We did not try the restaurant but, it looked nice. Great hotel to stay at and within walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm and shops.

My dauvhter just recently turned 16 and, for her birthday, we surprised her with a trip to Disneyland. This would be her first trip to California, as well. I was excited to stay here because of all of the fond memories I had staying here with my family on my first trip to Disneyland.  This would be the PERFECT way to have mother/daughter time.  Little did I know the horrors that lie before us. What a first impression!!       Upon check-in,  I had problems using my card for the $50.00 hold required before check-in. That part was my fault for not contacting my bank about my travels.      When I called two days before our arrival to verify if there were any other funds necessary to ensure proper and expedited check-in, I was told "no. Everything is fine on our end. You just
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to review your experience at our property. While I understand that this experience was not to your standards and does sound like a poor overall visit, I assure you that your concerns are heard and will be addressed with the respective areas. It would greatly assist me in correcting these issues if I could gather some more specific information about your visit. If you wish to speak about it further please contact me via phone or email at any time that is convenient for you. Thank you again for staying with us and I hope we have an opportunity to earn back your trust in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager Stephen.Ruggiero@Knotts.com or 714-243-2006

Summary: It was nice to have a hotel so close to Knotts Berry Farm...Girl Trip for sister's B day ..clean rooms everything we needed...and a great restaurant on site. Overall a very Pleasant trip...will stay here again We got the park pass and hotel stay pkge  incl parking. a good value

Pro's: The staff was very helpful and curteous. The hotel is a very short walk away from Knott's. Parking was included in the rate. Fast check-in and check-out times. The food at the restaurant, Amber Waves, was quite good and you get very large portions. Snoopy stopped by at dinner time and was happy to pose for pictures. The pool was very nice and it had a little splash playground for the kids. The Snoopy Suite we stayed in had very cute Snoopy decorations throughout along with a pool view. Snoopy came to our room to tuck the kids in. Seemed like a weird idea at first but the kids loved it.   Con's: The Snoopy Suite didn't have a fridge so you may have to bring a cooler (kind of a bummer). The rooms seemed way outdated compared to the rest of the hotel (not a big deal though).

We paid for the Camp Snoopy Room, and it was very well worth it!  Snoopy is very accessible, so your little ones won't be hunting around for him.  The hotel is pretty old, so you're not going to get a 5-star hotel style rooms.  It's expected to have some issues.  We had a plumbing issue with our sink backing up in the middle of the night, but was resolved the next morning. Luckily the sink went back down, and didn't happen again.  All in all, a very pleasant stay.  Highly recommend.

We arrived at around 3pm on a Sunday afternoon during the Labour Day week-end. We were able to check in straight away but told no rooms would be allocated until 4pm. As there is plenty of parking spaces near by we left our luggage in the car until our room became available, parking is charged for at 4$ a day. First impressions about this hotel was how clean and tidy everything was. Once in our room we were surprised how big it was. Two queen size beds, although we would have preferred a king size as requested, but this was not an issue. Room was clean and comfortable, flat screen TV and a good WIFI connection. Hotel facilities are good, restaurant on site. For those that want to use the park you do not need to use your car as it is within walking distance. We enjoyed our short

We were there in off season so price was reasonable.  Very convenient to Park and though you pay for hotel parking, you would have to pay for park parking anyway.  They allowed us to check in early and texted us when our room was ready (nice touch).  Not great food at hotel but okay food outside park very close by.   Nothing special but no complaints either.  Room are big. Property a little worn but clean.  If you are visiting Knott Berry Farm Park, its worth staying here.

Summary Heading: Great price and lots of fun!
Summary: Text message when your room is ready, walking distance to the park, and great deals on tickets with room combo. We needed a room big enough for 4 adults and 2 children, paid extra for a second cot, no problem. We ordered pizzas from Amber Waves, charged to our room, and it was YUMMY and priced reasonably. Room was cleaner and better than others in the area.   Knotts is such a fun family place - we have a history of enjoying it as my parents even honeymooned there in the 70's and we all love Calico Ghost Town, owned by Knotts. Fun Southern California history here. Will definitely return!

I planned a weekend at knotts and soak city. Lived in the area for 40 years and this is my first stay at the hotel. Everyone was so friendly and we enjoyed our stay. Came with breakfast at the Amber Waves restaurant . Buffet was ok but it was in the hotel area and within walking distance. Both parks were close by, We found the hotel staff to be very informative and went out of their way to help.

Summary Heading: We Love The Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel!! Can't Wait To Come Again!
Summary: Our family had a wonderful Labor Day weekend 2014 at the Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel.  The pricing on the three day two night stay was unbeatable even on a holiday weekend.  Then being able to get discounted tickets to both Knotts Berry Farm and Soak City added to the deal.  We loved all aspects of the hotel and the breakfast buffet at the Amber Waves restaurant and had a blast at both parks.  We can't wait to come back again!  Both our daughters keep asking when they can come back!  Thank you again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that you had an enjoyable time at our hotel as well as both parks. Our hotel tries to provide the best value and experience for all of our guests, and this sure seems like it was the case for you. We hope to host you at our hotel in the near future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: It's just steps away from Knottsberry Farms we had a blast we ate the chicken dinner and rode the rides looked in the shops we had four fun filled days I highly recommend at least four days and a great value to.

The stay here was great, no hassles with parking, everything was within walking distance and they alerted us when our room was ready. It was a quick trip for a family get away and it was great, the staff was friendly and helpful. Great affordable Hotel and tickets for Families on a Budget, my kids loved the pool area as well!!

I've recently stayed here with my family and the Hotel itself is very attractive and conveniently located a hop, skip, and jump from the Knott's Berry Farm theme park. I made reservations to stay in the camp snoopy suite, which was really affordable and cool! The kids all received a free Snoopy plush doll, a free breakfast buffet, and a visit from Mr. Snoopy himself up close and personal! The hotel amenities were very amazing they offered a free parking, gym, pool, Jacuzzi, water play area for kids, etc. my only complaint is that I wish the Hotel offered a room view of Knott's Berry Farm:(

The hotel is a little older, and nothing fancy, but clean and close to the park. They also offer lower ticket prices to the park. We really like being able to go back to the room to cool off and relax, then go back to the park after resting. Check in was easy and fast, and they let me know when the room was ready if we arrived early. Parking was included, which is another perk.

We stayed at Knott's Berry Farm for a total of six nights.  It is great value, clean and very quiet, considering it is a family hotel.  The hotel staff were friendly and helpful and the parking was great value at $4 per night (you won't get cheaper!).  Ideally, it is a hotel suited to people wanted to do the fun park thing.  We used the hotel as a base as it was very cheap at $28 per night.  However, travelling to attractions such as Venince Beach and Universal took a long time (sometims 2 hours) because of the traffic.

We stayed two days at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel . While we were there we took advantage of Knott's Berry Farm and Soak City. We did a package deal and it was a great value!!! What we paid for an entire weekend with tickets for both parks and hotel was less than what is would cost for our family of four for one day at Disneyland!!!! We really enjoyed our stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. I am happy to learn that our package deal was both valuable and enjoyable for you and your family. We hope to host you again if your travels bring you our way in the future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Fun!  Great location wonderful pool and safe clean place next to parks
Summary: We stay here every year when visiting family.  Family reunions at Knott's Chicken Dinner restaurant are a favorite.  We stay at the Hotel as it is close and fun.  The pool area is great for relaxing and enjoying as well.  The hotel is clean and comfortable and safe.  Walgreens is across the street and of course the park is next door.  They have a shuttle to Disneyland, so you don't have to pay for parking there either.....  Definitely worth staying here!

I came with my husband to do a 'grown-ups only" getaway. The 2 day admission to the theme park and the 2 night stay was a great value. Our complimentary breakfast buffet was above average with eggs and bacon and pastries. We enjoyed having a few cocktails in the lounge at the end of our day. The pool was kept clean and the only complaint is that people were letting little kids use the hot tub like a play area. Hotel is old but the rooms are kept clean. Parking was great and we had plenty of room. My only issue is that when we checked in , we were given a room key for  a room that was assigned to someone else. We walked in and there were kids watching tv. We gave them a scare and the front desk dismissed this to an inexperienced staffers mistake. Overall this was a good value and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at our property. I am extremely pleased that you enjoyed your 'grown up getaway' although I was not happy to learn that you were initially issued keys to the wrong room. Of course, this is not something we should have dismissed as it is a very serious mistake. I have reviewed the reports form your stay and understand how the issue occurred so proper training has been and will continue to be implemented to ensure this does not happen again in the future.  With that being said, I greatly appreciate your understanding of the situation and look forward to your next visit to our property! Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: We had a wonderful first-time stay at Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel, I like the preregister that we did in the morning in order to get our park tickets, the only thing is that it was so quick that the person didn't get me any information about the hotel, check out hours, pool hours and WIFI information. The room is very big that we have plenty space even  when we add a roll-away bed. Cleaning of the room was OK, I like that the hotel is about 5 minutes walk to both parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am happy to learn our pre-registration process was quick and convenient for you. However, I apologize about our agents not providing you with information about the hotels accommodation. This is not something that normally occurs and I have been sure to share your experience with our management team, to prevent this from happening again in the future. We thank you again for staying with us and hope to see you and your family back with us.   Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We recently stayed here for 8 days whilst visiting southern california the hotel is pretty good location is excellent .The hotel offers great discounts to knottsberry farm and soak city and free shuttle to the VERY pricey disney.The pool is good rooms 3star top end clean and comfy maybe a bit of a refurb needed .To pick up a few could do betters the breakfast was $12 a day not a lot of choice and cold much better at ihop 10 mins walk, the bar and restaurant was ok but staff where below par for american standard, We paid£55 a night with breakfast thats about right.

Amazing staff. Rooms and Hotel were a little outdated, but they are renovating. They need to take more advantage of the Knotts name and make it an "experience" for their guests. Very short 3 minute walk to Knotts so very worth the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that our staff was "amazing" to you, and the location of our hotel was convenient. The hotel will be definitely be having the rooms remodeled in the future! We hope to see you back with us if your travels bring you this way.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Very welcoming, and good value. Excellent breakfast. Super pool with water featurrs for the kids. Only big con is that rooms have paper thin walls and you can hear everything for 2 rooms in every direction!

We had a wonderful first-time stay at Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel. We were checking in at the same time as many others, yet it was a quick process. A lady named Jeanet checked us in and she was great. I had left my coupon for a special rate at home and she made sure I got that same rate. She was kind and pleasant. In fact, all of the employees we came in contact with were friendly.   We had 6 people in our group--4 of which were teenagers and we fit well into the oversized queen room, even with two rollaway beds. With a family our size, it is close to impossible to find any hotel room in Southern California for under $200, yet the cost of our room was well under that.   The walk to and from Knott's was super convenient. We bought the after 4:00 pm tickets for only $35 and

Rooms r always clean, staff r nice. Free parking for season pass holders is a plus. Parking is very cose with plenty of handicap spaces. I do not recommend the Mrs Knotts ck dinner, we orderd it to take back to our rm and it was old and cold. The manager on dutie was rude and didnt want to help us. On the plus there is plenty of other places near by to eat.

My husband & I had planned a little get away to celebrate 12 years of marriage. Knott's is where he proposed. I booked the getaway package & he called to see if he could get flowers delivered to our room before the arrival. The staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. I am happy to learn that you and your husband came back to visit us for your 12 year anniversary, and that our hotel was able to provide you with your requested flower accommodation, along with good customer service. We hope to see you back with us for more celebrations and happy memories!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I surprised my daughter with a day at Knott's then surprised her again with a stay at the hotel. It was wonderful! The hotel was great, the service was excellent and Snoopy was perfect! We had the best time and plan to return!!!!!

Our trip started out a little ruff we were stuck in some bad traffic but once we arrived everything had turned around due to the over accommodating staff. They let us check in early and while the room was being prepared gave us access to all the other amenities pool, fitness center,  etc. We purchased a camp snoopy package , well worth it! My 3 year old didn't want to leave. Breakfast buffet was great. Perfect for a family on budget and truly magical for my daughter.

The service here was great. The room was clean and comfortable. Never had to wait for the elevator. I wasn't expecting this for the price, it made the stay and trip here even better.Bottled drinks were expensive but that is expected, wish I could have enjoyed the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am happy to learn that your room was clean and comfortable, and the price you paid was a good one for you. We hope to see you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Stayed here for four nights, before our road trip.  The room was standard fair, a little tired looking but comfortable.  We had a few problems but the front of house staff were great and always offered help.  On arrival our booking seemed not to have been accepted between the Agent and the Hotel.  Knotts did check us in, for first three nights.  Next day having phoned the Agent, it's seems Knotts and the Agent had already spoken and problem resolved. We used the free shuttle to Disneyland, register at the desk before and pickup from the lobby.  We're also told that if you booked tickets to other attractions  (Universal) through the Hotel then would not have had to pay for the hotel shuttle that operates to them.

Had a wonderful time. Hotel staff & parking attendant very friendly & helpful. Check in was a breeze! My room was very nice, big and very clean! No problems with anything. Great time at park ( a short walk from the hotel)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I'm happy to learn that your experience with us was a positive one. We hope to see you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights on a L.A. bus tour from San Francisco. Was a great places to stay and so close to both knotts berry farm parks and Disneyland. The hotel staff were so friendly and when we called about a query they sent one of there maintenance staff straight away to attend to our needs. The breakfast in the hotel is perfect with a great selection of food. I would say though the dinner staff were not as friendly as all of the other hotel staff. Overall a great stay and would definitely stay here again.

Room was clean and tidy,  enjoyed that it was 2 minutes walk to the Theme Park and Restaurant!   Good prices.  Hop on the morning tour to Mexico, it was great.  back by 9.30pm and also close to Disneyland.  Would return next time as we enjoyed the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your room was clean, and you enjoyed our restaurant Amber Waves.  We hope to have you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Great time for me and my son
Summary: from the minute we arrived to the minute we left, staff was very helpful room service was quick, hotel was clean and snoopy visiting was priceless! My son was in awww of snoopy and ecstatic to have the opportunity to order room service LOL. it was great because after our stay filled with pool fun, relaxing and great food we finished our stay off next door at Knotts Berry Farm!

Loved having Snoopy to take pics with. The whole family enjoyed this. The Continental breakfast was really good. Way better than any other I've had Great experience will do this every year. There is so much for everyone to do at this hotel the kids loved the basketball court the gym and felt overall very safe letting the kids enjoy all these areas Pool was perfect

Hotel room was clean and hotel staff were very friendly. The location to Knotts was Great even close to Angels Stadium and Disney,  only a short 30 min drive. Even Huntington Beach is only 30 min away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your room was clean and comfortable, and the location of our hotel was convenient for you. We hope to have you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Perfect location for Knott's Berry Farm/Soak City adventures
Summary: This hotel was very convenient to Knott's Berry Farm (and Knott's Soak City Water Park) - our sole destination this trip.   (No need for a rental car since Super Shuttle runs efficiently from/to SNA.)  It's just a short walk to the amusement park.  We easily split our day - mornings and evenings at the park, and enjoying the hotel pool/spa for a much needed break midday.  Our pool view room was on the 5th floor - very quiet, but we like to leave the fan running for white noise, anyway.  The room was spotless - small coffee pot, but no microwave or fridge (unfortunately, no place to store Mrs. Knott's famous fried chicken leftovers).  The sink was located outside the bathroom which works well for multiple travelers.  Yes; the hotel could use some upgrades, but that is never one

Thank you for everything! We celebrated our daughther's 8th birthday and it turned out to be just excellent. The hotel was on the ball, excellent customer service, clean room, snoopy visited us, the pool and jaccuzzi perfect and clean. The restaurant was also perfect, see you in a couple of months:)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your vacation and daughters birthday worked out excellent for you. It is great that you were able to enjoy and experience our Camp Snoopy room, and the Snoopy tuck-in. We look forward to having you and your family back with us.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I really enjoyed the hotel and took a picture with my favorite character Snoopy :). I love this hotel everyone was nice and I just liked the atmosphere!  I recommend this hotel to stay on!!  Great times will be back

Nice hotel, nice staff, very reasonable if you want to see or do stuff in Anaheim area like Knotts Berry Farm or Disney. Not the greatest hotel but nothing to complain about. If you want to be up other end if LA, ie Warner Bris etc, get a hotel in that area. LA is just a big car park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your stay was a good one. We hope to have you back with us, should your travels bring you to our area in the future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I have stayed here before and will continue to stay here whenever I go to Knott's Berry Farm. The packages they offer are a great value. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and comfortable. It is just a short walk to Knott's Berry Farm and all the attractions. This hotel is in a good location. You feel safe here. I don't have anything bad to say about this hotel.

This is our 3rd year going to Knott's and Soak City and staying at the hotel. We have the greatest experience every year!!!! Our kids love it!!!! We love being able to get up and go get all you can eat breakfast at the hotel restaurant Amber Waves, then heading over to the parks. If we forget something, its just a quick walk back to the hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel. I am happy to learn that you enjoy your stay at our hotel year after year! We hope to have you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We had a great time and the next time we stay in a hotel in southern ca it will be at knotts. For the price it was everything we wanted and the kids loved it which makes it an easy choice for us. We liked the location with closeness to knotts and soak city plus the pool was perfect for us all. We had a great trip thanks to everything knotts had to offer

the hotel was clean a little out dated, but service is excellent and my daughter loved seeing snoopy in the lobby area. didn’t care to much for the buffet, but it was included with the stay. Liked the short walk to the park. The park was excellent, my daughter loved it, planning on going back in September and staying at the hotel again.

Everything about our experience was amazing. The hotel staff was great, they did everything they said they would do including follow up phone calls to make sure we received our two cribs for my twins could take a nap. Knotts Berry Farm theme park was a great experience as well...clean, not bad lines, and reasonable prices. The Amber Waves Restaurant was so good. Everything we ordered was delicious and the bar tender made some of the best drinks ever!!! Snoopy also came around the hotel and restaurant several times keeping the kids excited!!! The pool and water park at the hotel was also a nice break from the theme park for my five year old while his baby twin brothers napped!! Wonderful experience from beginning to end!!!

Summary Heading: Happy Camper with Snoopy at Knott's Resort
Summary: Great overall package deal.  When you stay at the Knott's Resort you receive discounted tickets and early admission into the park. The breakfast buffet was great.  Paying for parking at the hotel is fine because your car is near the hotel and you can just walk over to the park.  The Camp Snoopy area was perfect for my 2 year old who rode his first roller coaster.  My wife was put on bed rest days after I purchased the tickets and could not go to Knott's Berry Farm so the hotel staff gave my son a stuffed snoopy and made us a VIP reservation with 20% off at the Chicken Dinner Restaurant.  It was a superb meal and the service was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your hotel experience with us. I am happy to learn that your reservation which included tickets for Knott's and breakfast was enjoyable for everyone. It sounds that your situation was accommodated due to your wife not being able to make it. We hope to have everyone be able to visit the park and our hotel should your travels come this way in the future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Front desk staff wasn't the most helpful, never made eye contact or made me feel important. Buffet was a great deal to add on to the room. Other reviewer stated "the walls are thin" and I have to agree with this. While trying to sleep in just until 10am I could here the little boy next door (naturally) getting excited to visit the park, but I also could hear the housekeeping staff talking in the hallway to each other and hear the sounds of the vacuum as they were cleaning the room three doors away. Great deal to get you closer to the park, very clean room and clean restaurant, just not suited for those wanting to get more rest rather than jump up and run to the park.

It was a very pleasant stay. The beds were comfortable. It was great that the pool was open until 11:00 pm and only a 5 minute walk to the park. They were very accomodating in helping my husband to and from the park with the shuttle since this was not one of their normal shuttle destinations.

Staff members are pleasent and very helpful, we also had time for the pool and our 5 year old had the time of her life in the kiddie area, pool area was very clean and stocked with pool towels. Room was clean and beds are very comfortable.  We had dinner and the breakfast buffet and i must say that was one of the best sirlion steaks i've had, breakfast had so much to choose from, we are already planning our next stay!

It was great staying at h Knotts Berry Farm Hotel. It is a short walk to the theme park as well as the chicken carryout/restaurant. The rooms were nice and the buffet was plentiful. The price of the stay is cheaper when combining the hotel with the theme park tickets.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that you enjoyed your vacation. We hope to have you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Booked this hotel stay in addition to the holiday I was already on. It was convenient but the walls are thin, parking is not free, breakfast buffet is not worth it.  Shuttle drivers are great and friendly. Hotel staff tend to talk amongst each other even when clients are waiting.  For me, it's great for a couple nights stay but not for a long holiday.

Yes the pool towels are small but they work !You couldn't ask for a more family friendly hotel. Each and every staff member went out of their way to be helpful.  We didn't do the meal plan but we had several dinners in Amber Waves, the on site restaurant. Meals were well priced and suited to the needs of a family. The hotel is convenient to almost everything you could want. Highly recommend !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that our staff was helpful and accommodating to all your needs, and the restaurant served you well. We hope to have you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Average hotel but staff don't care
Summary: Decided to stay at hotel and spend the day at the park before heading home. We were able to park vehicle and enter park until our room was ready, which we were notified by text message. Room was average but ran into the problem of a lot of noise as there were a lot of teenage cheerleading teams that were their for some practice. There was a lot of door slamming and running around all night and in the morning. We inquired on changing rooms but were told they had booked over 200 rooms and there were none left. In the morning we found we had trouble with the shower and again found no help - was told "Thanks for letting us know". Obviously they were taking more care of the cheerleading teams as they are there every year. If you stay here, just remember to inquire on when they

Had a great time at Knott's Berry Farm playing before our cruise. Great pool area for younger kids. Purchased room with tickets and breakfast included, great value. Breakfast was standard buffet breakfast. Would go back again.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within walking distance of Knotts Berry Farms
Summary: My son's and I stayed here for 2 nights before heading over to Disneyland. The room and hotel were very clean. The pool was Nice, but the towels could have been softer. The staff was friendly. The breakfast buffet was good with a descent amount of choices. I didn't care for the dinner though. We saw snoopy 1 morning outside the restaurant. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your room was clean and comfortable to stay in, and that you enjoyed breakfast. It is unfortunate that your dinner was not as satisfying, and this has been brought up to our restaurant management. We hope to see you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Loved being able to stay so close to the park, did not have to worry about parking at all. There are a lot of great shops and restaurants within walking distance. Really wish there was a TGI Fridays in Oregon! Only complaint would be no mini fridges in the room, ended up throwing our leftovers away which is just sad.

Was a GREAT room, we booked a single and got  a  double queen room, very spacious and clean. Room service and concierge was very helpful and courteous and assisted in  dinner reservations .The  salt water pool was awesome .
Manager Response: Thank  you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that we were able to accommodate you with a room that fit your family more comfortably, and that our staff was helpful to you. We hope to see you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Never stayed here before but my daughter loves Snoopy so we booked it as a treat for her.  We paid rather a lot to get a Snoopy themed room and a visit from Snoopy to tuck her in at night.  My daughter loved it and the rooms are decorated nicely and are very clean.  Lovely idea and a must for any Snoopy fan.  Two niggles though.  The line for check in took time and when we finally got seen our room at 5.15pm was not ready and we had to wait in reception until it was.  Also both mornings we had to wait for breakfast even though you could see there were tables free.  The buffet breakfast however when we got seated was very good.  We would stay here again.

Took my Grandson to Knott's Resort. Have been there several times. This time we were going to Medieval Times. after going to the Medieval Times, we return to Amber Waves, at Knott's Resort. Wendy was the Bar sever. There was only two other customers in the bar area at the time, We ordered a small pizza. Other couple walks orders their food and drinks, from Wendy. They were rewarded with their food and drinks being delivered first. Still no pizza. Waited 15 more minutes. still no pizza. Asked Wendy for bill. requested that she cancel pizza. Wendy needs more training.

The room we had was wonderful, it was so clean, roomy and even had a refrig for keeping our snacks cold. Bring your own water since they charge $4.00 a bottle. This was one of the nicest hotels I have stayed, wonderful staff who were very welcoming. I would recommend that you get the package deal they offer which includes breakfast. The breakfast is a buffet, bacon, eggs, french toast and juice/ coffee. The only problem with the breakfast was that the food could of been warmer. The waiter we had was very gracious. We had five of us in the room and the rollaway bed was comfortable and included in the price. I would recommend this if you plan on visiting the park. It's about a block in a half from the park.   The pool was wonderful too!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that that room and breakfast was enjoyable  and comfortable for you and your family. We hope to see you back with us if your travels bring you to our area again.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Our experience was absolutely wonderful at Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel.  The check in staff were friendly and helpful as we had never been there and had questions.  They answered all our questions and offered to send us a text when the room was ready as we got there several hours prior to check in.  We had a great time at the park and it was nice to come to the room (very large!) and have it be clean and really up-to-date.  The beds were comfortable and the sheets and towels were good quality.  When we got ready to leave the next morning, we went to the hotel breakfast buffet, the food was excellent.  My grandson also got to see Snoopy, which really ended a wonderful vacation on a happy note.  Again, the staff was friendly and very accommodating at the restaurant. We will

Two family stay here . The kids enjoyed the hotel very much. The pool areas was great . This is our second 4th of July  family vacation.  Snoopy visited the kids in their room and said goodnight . The price included a great breakfast and 4 passes to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. I am happy to learn that your stay in the Camp Snoopy room was enjoyable for your kids, and that the package your purchased served you and your family well. We hope to see you back with us soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We stayed here in July 2014 as a first stop on our American tour.  They will charge you to park your car at $5 per day. Hotel clean and staff very helpful. Rooms were nice even though 4 of us in room it was still ok. Down in the bar beer $4 a pint which is ok and we eat at TGI on our first night which I have to say wasn't all that.  Universal studios a must to visit as was the grand tour of LA be warned traffic into LA a nightmare whatever the time of day.  Didn't do the theme park but it looked ok.

Have just returned from a 9 night trip to Knotts Berry Farm,. We took our daughters, son in law and 15 month old granddaughter, the hotel was homely and the staff were fantastic, nothing was too much trouble. Our granddaughter adored Snoopy and had cuddles every night in the Lobby. The rooms were good and clean, quite basic but I never woke up with a backache once as the beds were really comfy. Would definitely go back!

Summary Heading: Knott's Berry Farm another awesome year
Summary: We go to Knott's Berry Farm ever year and stay at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. They did not disappoint again this year. The package deal was great, especially now that all of our children are adults. The staff was friendly and met our every need. You can't beat the closeness to Knott's and other amenities. Next year we will stay two nights and do Soak City as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your stay with us was a good one, and that your family still able to enjoy the park even though everyone is grown up. We hope to have you all back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Having done the Disney experience to death a few years back, we plumped for Knotts Berry Farm as something different, and this hotel was a must. We booked well in advance to acquire a family suite which included a kitchen area and fridge. The price also included breakfast and 4 passes to the park, which as guests we would enter 30 minutes earlier than the general public.  Check in was fast and efficient, Destinee was really friendly and welcoming. She gave me a ticket to display in my car and advised it could be left there until we had finished in the park the next day.  As we expected, the hotel was full of excited youngsters. They seemed to be entertained constantly by hotel employees dressed as Peanuts characters. Lobby area, bar and restaurant all seemed very spacious,

I traveled with a child and it would have been nice to have a refrigerator and microwave in the room for cold drinks and snacks.  It was very inconvenient having to leave the room to get a drink and snack.

Summary Heading: Get a season pass for $96 and get the season's pass rate
Summary: A decent enough, clean enough, close enough hotel.  Get a season pass online for $96 and get the season's pass rate at the hotel with free breakfast every day.  If you book the Season's Pass rate with one Dinner, you also get free parking at the hotel.  You will also save 10% at Knott's Berry Farm on all food and souvenirs with the Season's pass.  Don't forget to show your pass when you buy stuff to get the discount! FREE shuttle to Disneyland!  Book your rental car with Alamo in Downtown Disney; drive it back to Knott's for day-trips to other attractions

This was my 7 year old grandson's birthday present. My 15 year old granddaughter also went. This was an amazing adventure. When Snoopy showed up at dinner my grandson was so excited. Then when he heard the knock on the door and opened and saw Snoopy in Pajamas well I was suddenly the best grandma in the world for this birthday present. My search for pajamas like Snoopy's has been unsuccessful. I think Grandma has to do some sewing. The grounds of the hotel were very clean. The rooms were excellent along with the staff. A very enjoyable stay for my family.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that your grandson enjoyed the Snoopy visit, and the Camp Snoopy room was clean and comfortable for the both of you. We hope to see you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: What a great value!  Nice rooms were very clean. They serve a great free hot breakfast.  They have a friendly and helpful staff. When you stay here, you get into the park 30 min early!  They also have a small souvenir shop that discounts 10% to hotel patrons.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. We hope to see you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We had a nice short stay.  The room was nice and clean. There were double queen beds, a desk and a flat screen TV. The room was nicely furnished. The bathroom was very clean and neat but could use a little updating. The pool was nice.  Great for families. Amber Waves restaurant was very good. All in all we had great service and a great stay!  Excellent location/ walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm! We will stay here again.

We stayed in an adorable Camp Snoopy room for two nights and then transferred to a regular room on the last night. The room was decorated in a Snoopy theme making for fun pictures and added to the excitement of visiting Knotts, and the visit from Snoopy was very cute, something special for the kids (and us parents who love Snoopy). The rooms are not fancy, but they were clean and perfect for our family of 4, I was pleasantly surprised when we moved from the Camp Snoopy room (our choice) to a "regular" room, the room was just as nice as the Camp Snoopy room, without the decoration. The staff at the hotel was very nice and very accommodating. For families that want to be close to the park (4 minute walk) it's a great hotel. My only complaint is the Camp Snoopy room we stayed in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel. I am happy to learn that you were able to enjoy our Camp Snoopy theme room, and that your kids enjoyed Snoopy visiting the room for the tuck-in. We hope to have you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Hotel is clean but is in need of a renovation. The beds are not comfortable so if you have a bad back you will have a less than restful sleep. The rooms need some TLC from the maintenance crew as they are not staying on top of the repairs. Room 229 needs some screws in the bottom door hinge as it is about to fall off. Will let the front desk know again on check out.   We like the hotel not for the price as It is not cheap but for the location. It is walking distance to the park. Good location to other restaurants, shopping and other attraction like the water slides.  Don't expect a luxury hotel but a place to stay that is clean and close to the park and also great for the kids if you get the snoopy rooms. Kids will love Snoopy visiting them before bed time.  If you hit the bed

So the room had the basic layout of double queens and desk and tv. But there were touches that made it above average.  Mostly the pool area,  in which there's a spray area to the side.  That was so nice,  my son loved it! He also loved the snoopy tuck in,  which does come at an extra cost.  The camp snoopy rooms do have snoopy decorations,  but not all that much.  The showerhead was easily adjustable with different pressures which was nice.  Room service was very prompt as well.  Breakfast buffet was nice but not fantastic,  as you would expect.  My son spit his eggs out but I didn't find anything wrong with them.  And the walk to the park from the hotel isn't any longer than the walk from the park's parking lot. The only things I didn't like about it was they only give shampoo,

Wonderful service!!! all the staff was so wonderful and very helpful. Can not wait to go again and stay for a few days. Our stay was very nice and could not have asked for a better experience for my bday. We even had a great time and service in the Amber Waves restaurant inside the hotel. The hotel even has a little gift ship inside where you can find all kinds of things just in case you forget something at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I'm very happy to learn that you had a wonderful experience with our staff, and your room was clean and comfortable. We hope to see you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Very helpful, caring, friendly staff! Nice clean room! Extremely convenient location. We received a great deal on tickets to Knott's Berry Farm as well as a discount in the gift shop. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I'm glad you had a wonderful stay. We hope to have you back with us soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We spent 2 nights at this hotel.  We arrived around 4pm but our room was not ready and we had to cool our heels in the lobby for 35 minutes while things were made ready. The room was quite nice and clean as a whistle.  Big with a real coffee pot but no fridge. One problem was that our room had a door to an adjoining room.  We could hear every word spoken clearly, and I know they could hear us. VERY noisy. The staff was great, always friendly and helpful.  The hotel is very near the park so we could go early (hotel guests are allowed into the park 30 minutes before official opening) and go back to the hotel for a shower and a nap and return to the park for the evening.  We had a super good time.

Summary Heading: perfect location while visiting Knotts Berry Farm themepark.
Summary: Our family stayed during our visit to the Knott's themepark.  The location is convenient and allows you to take a short break from the park to enjoy the pool area.  Staff was friendly and sent us a message to let us know our room was available for early check in.

I spent 2 nights here in July 2014.  ROOM- Very good size, lots of space. Bed was very comfortable, and everything was spotless. We had a view of the ghostrider rollercoaster outside our window and you could hear the ride and the occasional screams. Also Ladies, there is a full length mirror and good lighting for makeup.  BATHROOM- shower/bathtub and toilet were in a separate 'room' from the sink, which I like. Water pressure was very good.  FOOD- Amber Wave's restaurant is located in the lobby. We had dinner here one night and the restaurant was deserted. The food was good and good prices. Apart from Amber Wave's the other closer places to eat at are TGI Fridays, opposite the park. There is also an IHOP about 10 to 15min walk away.  STAFF- Were friendly and helpful  Overall we
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I am happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us, as we do our best to provide each and every guest with a clean and comfortable room.  It it unfortunate that your experience at the park was unique, and it has been shared with the park management team as they value guest feedback as much as we do. We hope to host you and your family again in the future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I made our reservation online easily & quickly. and we checked in easily and quickly. Everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful. Room was clean. And we loved being able to walk over after a long day at the park and go to our room.
Manager Response: Very happy to hear that your booking process and your stay at our hotel was a positive and smooth one. We take our guest services highly in regard. We hope to see you back soon!   Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Great package deal with Parc visit, hotel needs updated
Summary: We booked 2 nights here with our 2 teenage children to take advantage of the deal which includes Parc visit. Staff is very friendly, efficient and helpful. The state of the room leaves room for improvement. Decor and furnishings need updated. Looks and feels a bit shabby. Beds are good. Trouble with wifi in room. Front desk gave us a number to call for help. After a few hours the problems were resolved.  Breakfast is expensive but there are plenty of places around to grab something to eat. Pool is okay, deep end is only 5 ft.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your stay at our hotel. I'm happy to learn that our customer service was positive for you. I want to let you know that this review has been shared with the hotel management in an effort to reach our guest satisfaction goals. If your travels bring you our way again, please feel free to contact me directly so that I can design a reservation that fits your families needs.   Michael Raskin - Guest Services

Summary Heading: Great concept but poor follow through
Summary: The hotel is just minutes from Knott's Berry Farm itself and the concept of Snoopy themed rooms is terrific.  However, the rooms themselves are small and noisy, the beds are not comfortable, the HVAC system is old, the breakfast buffet included with the room price is poor quality, the pool is too deep for young children, and the hotel staff do not seem real interested in customer service.  The one plus is the entertaining water feature adjacent to the pool. We were greatly disappointed because we have always loved the park itself and were expecting much better from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay. While I was disappointed to learn that you had a negative experience with us I feel very confident that these issues were extremely unique. We have a preventative maintenance team designated for servicing our AC units during the summer months. As you can imagine, those units are running constantly so I would assume the issues are due to that room being occupied on its scheduled date of service. The buffet usually gets stellar reviews so I am shocked about the quality that you had during your visit. I have brought it up to our Executive Chef and she will share it with her team. The biggest area for concern is the perception that our team is not committed to service which cannot be further from the truth. We pride ourselves on our passion for the guest experience and I am frankly embarrassed that you experienced anything less that than. Please feel free to contact me via phone or email at any time that is convenient for you. Thank you again for staying with us and I hope we have an opportunity to earn back your trust in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager Stephen.Ruggiero@Knotts.com or 714-243-2006

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at Knott's. The staff was efficient, friendly, had good manners, and were very helpful. Great for young children. The Amber Waves restaurant was pretty good, it could use work on the quickness when concerning breakfast hour but that's all. Make sure you visit their amusement park, it's very fun and beautiful there! Go a bit early to avoid long lines though! Overall, I very much enjoyed my stay. You won't be disappointed!
