Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I am happy to learn that you had a positive stay and customer service at our hotel, for both you and your kids. We hope to see you back soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Great hotel, nice amenities, great service
Summary: We booked this hotel as Knotts season pass holders. Got a great deal with free parking. Having stayed at some hotels near Disneyland, I have to say that I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the hotel. The staff really go out of their way to accommodate you and create a great experience, whether you are a family, a couple, or a group.  The room was very nice, clean, and well appointed. There is a 5 cup coffee maker, a hair dryer, iron and ironing board, and a small safe. There is also a fairly large flat screen TV. The only thing missing was a fridge and a microwave which you can have for an extra fee per day. WiFi is also free and connects without a problem.  The pool area is beautiful. It's a large pool and warmed to a nice comfortable temperature, unlike some pools
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write this detailed review in regards to your stay at our hotel. We do our very best to provide the best possible customer service, and receiving such a positive review is much appreciated to each and every one of our agents. We look forward to hosting you and your family again soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I came with my family to visit Knott's Berry Farm and I was surprised. I was aloud to pre check in and was given early access to the park. I was told that they would send me a text when my room was ready, how convenient is that. First visit of many more.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay at our hotel. I am glad to learn that you were able to check-in early as well as take advantage of our Summer early admission ticket to Knott's Berry Farm. Hope to see you and your family soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Knott's Berry Resort Hotel, is a fun place to stay and relax. We stayed 5 days with 6 kids and 7 adults.  The staff is wonderful, rooms are very clean and comfortable. Our family had a wonderful time! Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am happy to learn that your 5 night stay with us for you and your family was a comfortable one. We do our very best to provide the best customer service to each and every guest, and rooms that everyone can enjoy. We hope to see you soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Brenda, Great hotel, clean and friendly
Summary: Stayed 3 nights with 2 kids who enjoyed the nice pool and hot tub.  Was a short walk to the amusement and water park.  Room was very cleaned and beds were comfortable.  Staff was very friendly and didn't have any problems with our stay.  Will stay here again next time we come to California.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel. I am happy to learn that you and your family enjoyed the hotel pool and spa, as well as the room being clean and comfortable. We hope to host your family the next time your travels bring you our way.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Great vacation with Grandma and the kids!
Summary: Had a fantastic, well priced, family vacation with my mom and the kids!  Went for an overnight excursion to Knott's with a day at the park and a morning by the pool.  Bought the tickets for a great price through the hotel reservation.  My mom is elderly but really wanted to make this trip with the kids.  The hotel was able to transport my mom via a wheel chair to the front gate where we picked up another one for her to tool around the park in.  She is ambulatory but limited.  So that was really helpful.  They paged us when our room was ready but we were having so much fun in the park that we didn't get back to the room until 11pm or later.  The rate was great, the service was superb, the park was fun and clean and full of friendly employees and visitors.  I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I was so pleased to learn that our staff was helpful to you and your mom. We genuinely enjoy what we do everyday! We hope to see you again soon! Michael Raskin, Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I grew up living in Southern California, so Knott's and Disneyland were minutes away. Now that I am living in Las Vegas, married with two kiddos, we head out of the hot desert frequently. We discovered the Knott's Classic Vacation Package and have taken advantage of it four times in two years. Discounted park entry, a room at the Knott's Resort, included parking, and breakfast  buffet at Amber Waves for all four of us! Come on, now!  The rooms are nice and clean and perfect for that mid-day break away from the park. There is a great family friendly pool with a water playground. If you are looking for a great family outing and you are from out of town, this deal is great and very convenient. The staff is very helpful and friendly and the hotel itself is comfortable and accessible.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about Knott's Berry Farm Hotel! We take great pride in providing the best possible service to each and every guest. I am pleased to hear that you visit our park and stay at our hotel frequently. See you soon!  Michael Raskin-Guest services Team Leader

Summary: I am a single mom with 2 girls, age 8 and 11, The Knott's Hotel is a great and affordable place to have a "Staycation". The restaurant is good and the service throughout the hotel is excellent. Very family oriented. WE LOVE IT!!!!
Manager Response: I am very pleased to hear that you and both of your daughters enjoy staying at our hotel! We do our best to provide a pleasant and comfortable vacation to all of our guests. We hope to have you back soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: My kids and I have stayed in the hotel twice and we had a great time! The first time, we stayed one night in a Snoopy room and loved it, the next day we moved down the hall, all beautiful rooms! Room service was excellent! My second stay was great too, we went to the park and once I received my text, I was able to pick up my keys. Even a friend of mine came to visit us for the day, and my guest got free parking! The front desk are all so welcoming and just great! I love when your acknowledged right away, great customer service! I ordered room service one night and the size of our desserts were huge, there was a mix up but I was charged for the children size! We had another great weekend! The room had plenty of towels, and sheets were very clean and smelled great! Very
Manager Response: Really great to hear that both of your stays with us have been pleasant and memorable! I'm glad that all the rooms including the Camp Snoopy room have been comfortable for you to stay and sleep in. Customer service is very important to us and we take great pride in providing each and every guest with undivided attention. We will be seeing you again soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We stayed at the Knotts Berry Hotel for 1 night, purchased the classic package. Included for everyone in our party was hotel stay, 30 min early admission to Knotts Berry Farm, breakfast buffet, and parking. There was 6 of us in an oversized queen room, 1 rollaway bed included upon request. The room was big enough to accommodate everyone. Hotel was nice, staff was friendly, room was clean. Pool and splash area was nice for the kids. 5 min walk to the entrance of Knotts Berry Farm. Will stay again on our next Knotts Berry Farm run.
Manager Response: Im glad to hear you enjoyed the Classic Vacation package for your family, as well as the water playground for the kids! Our hotel does the best to provide our guests with easy and convenient packages to make your vacation as hassle free as possible. See you soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: I never wanted to leave a vacation so quickly in my life.
Summary: For my sons 6th birthday my husband and I decided to take him to knotts and see snoopy. We arrived at the hotel unable to check in so received our passes into the park, and our dinner and breakfast vouchers. After a long day at the park we decided to go to the Amber waves restaurant to use our dinner vouchers. The staff kindly greeted us, and once we said that we had the vouchers their tone and attitude changed toward us. Once we sat  the server was quick and wouldn't let us finish ordering before she ran in the back. Once our food arrived she didn't really smile or check  on us. I'm a server myself and understand when a server is busy or when things happen and I tip more than an average server does mainly 50%....in this case I was planing in tipping more because it was a free

We spent 4th July weekend at Knotts and it was a great package deal which included 2 nights stay, theme/water park tickets for both days, parking and buffet breakfast both days.  I agree with the other comments that the hotel is a little dated but that did not worry us at all - we weren't there to sit in the hotel. Our family of 4 were in the standard 2 queen room which was clean, tidy and comfortable for our two nights there.  The Check in staff member was really lovely and helpful and checkout was a breeze as we just drop the keys off at the desk. We loved being in walking distance to the theme park.  We arrived at the theme park for the 30 minute early access that's available to guests staying in the hotel and lasted until around 5pm.  Then we went back to the hotel for a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Our hotel takes great pride in providing quality customer service to each and every guest that stays with us so we make sure we share reviews like yours with our whole team! As a traveler, I personally appreciate having more time spent with family rather then dealing with frustrations so I certainly apologize for the experience in our restaurant.  We have brought this up to management in an effort to identify and correct these issues so future guests do not have a similar experience. I greatly appreciate you staying with us and for sharing your experience with both our team as well as our potential guests.  We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to our area!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Knotts is an excellent place  to stay. It is an even more greater value if you pick up one of their value packages. Their buffets cannot be beat. Also, the free shuttle to Disneyland us great too! While there inquire with bellhop about tour packages to universal studios. Unfortunately I did not know about it until too late.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review, as such a positive experience will be shared with all of our staff. We are glad you had a great stay with us. Hope to see you soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: I would just like to start off by saying "I love Knotts Berry Farm Theme park", so naturally we wanted stay at the hotel. We stayed for 3 days, 2 nights, and the price was very good considering it included theme park tickets to both parks for 2 days, 30 minute early entry and free breakfast buffet for all the days you are checked in at the Amber Waves Restaurant located in the hotel. I read reviews that the hotel was older and was in need of renovations, and this I have to agree with. We stayed in the standard 2 queen bedroom, the bathroom was extremely small and the shower was very old and not pleasant to look at, plus there is no fan in the bathroom so rust has made it's home in there. Our room was facing the Theme park and let me just say, the park does not close exactly at

We chose this hotel for the convenience of having the park right next door.  We also had a good deal with the hotel and park package for 2 adults and 2 kids.  The parking was plenty and easy.  The pool, hut tub and kiddie water play were great.  Snoopy was awesome.  We had the breakfast in our room.  I think the price and portion of the breakfast were good.  Not a lot of hotels actually have room service anymore other than expensive hotels, so we were happy to find out that we can order room service there.  The hotel looks older, but overall we had a good time and we were happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel. I'm happy to learn that you enjoyed the hotels accommodations, such as seeing snoopy and the pool and hot tub.  We share such reviews with our staff to show that our hard work and dedication is paying off. We hope to host you and your family on your next visit to Knott's Berry Farm.   Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Hotel is right next door to the park, plenty of parking, rooms were clean, the pool water feature a big hit with the ggirls, and everyone that helped us were very friendly. Snoopy in the lobby was a great bonus at the end of the day!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay. I am happy to learn that you had a comfortable room, and everyone enjoyed the pool. We hope to host you and your family next time you visit Knott's Berry Farm.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: Ended up here via Priceline. Reviews were generally good and average rating was 3.5 stars. However, having a so-so experience with the clientele when we stayed at another nearby hotel a couple yrs ago made us a tad nervous about what to expect from. Knott's.  FYI: It is NOT known as a "Resort" any longer-just KBF Hotel.   The Good Stuff: The staff, although very young were very, very nice and extremely helpful and friendly! That was an awesome surprise, and equaled or exceeded the pleasant nature of the employes at Disney properties. Seriously great front desk staff. Kudos!!!  The rooms are relatively and acceptably clean, as was many (but not all common areas. No dust on headboards, pictures, TV, etc.  Parking is convenient and free.  Nice LG flat screen TV.  The have uniformed

We planned a 2 day trip to Knotts Berry Farms and figured we would stay here since it was right next door to the park. The rooms online looked really updated and nice but once we actually got into the room I was a little disappointed.   It's been a while since they've remodeled the actual room. The furniture is nice but old carpet, old antiquated bathrooms and fixtures. The beds were the most uncomfortable ive slept in in a while.   The positive and I mean POSITIVE,  the staff was really nice and accommodating. Every interaction that we had was a great experience, which seems to be hard to get now days from the service industry.    The other POSITIVE is as I mentioned earlier, the hotel is a 2 minute walk to the park and some pretty bomb restaurants and snack places (awesome old

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to say in Buena Park/Anaheim
Summary: We have been staying at the Knott's Resort for about 15 years.  I love Amber Waves restaurant and the lounge.  We stay every year for the Halloween Haunt, and I love how the hotel is decorated!  This trip (June 2014) we went to the Titanic Experience down the street, so we stayed at Knott's because it was right there and we love it so much.  Staff is very friendly, hotel is clean and atmosphere is great.  Location is awesome right next to the Knott's Berry Farm park and shops and restaurants.  LOVE IT!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay at our hotel. I am happy to learn you have been coming to visit our famous Knott's Scary Farm for the past 15 years, as we truly appreciate seeing our guests return to our property. We take great pride in providing each and every guest with the best guest services. We hope to see you back with us for the upcoming 2014 Halloween Haunt.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: First time but definately not the last
Summary: Our stay at the Knotts Berry Farm Resort Hotel was wonderful. The location and its personnel were awesome. Rooms were very comfortable and quiet. We had a view of the pool and easy access to the park. Being able to walk to and from the hotel to the park is a great relief. No problem with secure parking. Went during the 4th of July weekend when it was very hot and humid outside but we were very comfortable inside the hotel. Definitely will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that the room was enjoyable for you and your family, as well as having the park access as convenient as possible for you. If you travels bring you our way in the future, we hope to host you and your family.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: What more could you ask for?
Summary: Honestly, you think about it and the value is like no other. Location is perfect, Knotts is in the air. The beach is not too far away, convenience stores close by and good food all around. Awesome experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. As a traveler, I am happy to learn that both the location and value of your stay was convenient and comfortable. We hope to host you and your family again in the future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We spent the day at knotts berry farm and had a great day. After a long day we stayed at the motel there . The price was very good and the quality of the stay was great for the fee paid. We hadn't Ben to Knotts Berry for about 15 years and it had changed a bunch . I would recommend the whole day at Knotts and the stay at the Hotel as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that you and your family had an enjoyable time both at the park and the hotel. We hope to host you back in the future.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Knotts Hotel is a perfect place to stay for walking distance to many attractions.
Summary: Loved the hotel.   Price was decent for what we got.  Will definitely stay again.  This hotel to me is like the much cheaper but just as good as the Disney Hotel.  At least they offer fairly decent value for your travel dollar unlike Disney.  My only complaint is that in this day and age they should have microwave ovens and mini fridges.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am happy to learn that the value of your vacation was a good one for you. I do apologize about the inconvenience regarding not having microwaves available, but we do have fridges for guest that can be delivered to the room upon request for an additional surcharge. We do our best to provide each and every guest with a convenient and comfortable room, and do appreciate such feedback about our property. We hope to have you back with us, if your travels bring you our way again.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary Heading: Management needs more training in public relations
Summary: nice location to knotts berry farm theme park. Hotel was okay except for losing power for 2+ hours first night. Backup generators  did not work so we sat in the dark waiting. Spoke with manager about  compensation the next morning she really didn't care said it was the cities fault not theirs even though their generators did not work. She also said they had to check with the city to see if they could compensate us. REALLY!!! News to me that the city controls the hotels backup generators.. They should have been in working condition.  The kids did not enjoy being in dark for so long.!!  Manager also said they would followup on this and contact us after they got an answer from the city, Okay that sounded okay at the time but we NEVER heard anything from them and it's been a month.

Summary Heading: Good price, clean, nice location, definitely recommend!
Summary: Family friendly hotel, kids loved the Snoopy room. Kind of a one time experience though, then pay less for the standard rooms. Easy in and out location for not only Knott's (very short walk to the park) but also for other destinations as well. Price is not bad, especially the package deals on Knotts.com. Rooms are clean, beds and bedding is quite comfortable. If staying multiple nights housecleaning tidies the room leaving clean towels and makes the beds. Only negatives that come to mind are no fridge in room and no Disney channel for the kids. Other than that, great hotel! We stay here every time we are in the area.

First it's a hotel not resort. 2.5 stars at best. A standard queenwas all that was left, it's a very tiny room for $150+. Whole place definitely needs upgrading but that's not the problem. The clientele are very low rent (sorry but true) a million unsupervised kids at the pool, crowding the hot tub, playing soccer, running a muck. They are loud, dangerous, and annoying. My 2 year didn't have a chance to swim. I wish I opted for a 4 star hotel nearby it would be worth the money for sure! I live 30 minutes away and thought it would be a nice staycation after the Pirate dinner. Wrong. They need to clean up, fix some things, and get a lifeguard or supervision at the pool. Free wifi is a joke. My iPad and phone couldn't even detect a router. If you want a cheap, trashy option close
Manager Response: Hello again! I see that you were able to copy your review onto multiple channels so I figured I would share my response in both places as well. Thank you again for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your visit with us last month. I can agree that the Single Queen Room option is on the smaller side, as advertised, but normally at much discounted rates these rooms are designed to give families a more economic option when planning a visit to our hotel. With that being said, staying anywhere in our area over a Holiday weekend will definitely result in a higher cost so I can see where the value seemed lacking. I am sorry to learn about the poor Wi-Fi connection and negative experience in our pool area. Unfortunately, both these issues may have been related to the vast number of guests using those amenities at one time over such a busy weekend.  For future reference, we do offer an upgraded Wi-Fi option at a small cost for those guests who require a faster speed. I feel terrible that you had such a negative experience and hope that you are able to visit us again for a better stay. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: Shared a room for 2 nights with my 3 daughters.  Found everything to be clean and well kept.  Loved how close it was to the park!  We were able to come back to hotel room to clean up and dress for evening hours without any hassle.   Would definitely stay here again!

KBF's Resort Hotel delivered a pleasant vacation experience for our family. The chief feature of this property is that allows its guests to walk to KBF without setting foot on the street. It's a five-minute walk—tops—from the hotel exit to the park entrance. We loved that convenience. The parking lot is secure and the hotel is clean and nice. Our package included park tickets and dining in the hotel's restaurant. The breakfast each day, a buffet, was palatable and sustaining. The staff members were friendly and attentive. My only complaint is that our room was very, very small. With two small children, it was tough on the third day.   For the price, there is no better way to enjoy Knott's and its surrounding attractions than a stay at the KBF Resort Hotel.

Summary Heading: Got Car? Not far from the Convention Center
Summary: Stayed here during the low season to attend a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center so the rooms here were inexpensive compared to hotels 5 miles up the road. This place was really nice. It's a family hotel, but wasn't noisy.  Most parents with young kids will likely book the themed rooms which are glassed off from the regular room hallway for noise reduction. The hotel has great amenities: large lobby, restaurant, outdoor pool and jacuzzi. It' on the property of Knott's Berry Farm so there is a nightly parking charge of $7.00 (may be more during the normal season)

Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel has clean comfortable rooms for a great price considering it is a short walk to the entrance of the amusement park. Mario and Jeannie in the restaurant are great and make you feel at home.

We stayed three nights at this hotel. You can walk from this hotel to the amusement park. It has a big pool, gym, restaurant, sauna etc. The sauna area is inside the gym and it has a funky smell, so I didn't use it.It is a laundry area to use until 10 p.m. The room needs some window cleaning and paint.I  also suggest somebody to clean the air filters. It was stuffy in  the room. The room doesn't have a mini fridge or microwave, but it has a coffee maker. The breakfast is not included it. I also paid $4 parking per day. The internet was free in the room. It was really nice to see Snoopy in the reception taking pictures with the kids in the morning and at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay last month. It was nice to see that our location presented a convenient option for your family although I was not happy to see that you had experienced some foul odors in both our public areas and guest room. We do change the filters on a regular basis but in the summer time we have increased this frequency due to the high volume of guests and consistently running air conditioner units. We have been and will continue on-going updates to the rooms and our amenities.  I hope that you have an opportunity to return to our property in the future to experience these new features! Until next time, Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: We just stayed for one evening and night but had very pleasant time at this Hotel in Los Angeles. They have beautiful outdoor swimming pool, big property. Well maintained hotel premises. The Hotel is located away from the Buzz on LA and we went for nice walk to nearby supermarket.  Staff was very nice.

We decided to celebrate the end of the school year with a little getaway to Knott's. We drove up from San Diego and arrived at the hotel at 9:00 am. There were a few people in line in front of me but the front desk people were quick and efficient. Our room was not ready, but they gave us our tickets to the amusement park and told us we could get in at 9:30 am. That was a pleasant surprise, I didn't know we got early entry for being a hotel guest. They took my cell number and they said they would text me when our room was ready. I thought that was a nice touch.  We had 4 adults and one child to stay in the room. The room was very big with two double beds and they brought in a roll away bed for the child. You could tell that they had updated the rooms a little but you could still

I found this to be an older but nicely kept hotel. Very comfortable with a very friendly and helpful staff. The location is ideal to visit Knott's Berry Farm and you are not far from Disneyland either. I like the hotel as the rates are reasonable and there is a lot less of a crowd here.

My family's experience with Knott's Berry Farm was fantastic. We were visiting the park and hotel for our son's 10th birthday. From the moment we entered the hotel the staff was greeting us with big smile's ande welcomes to their facility, from there I would say the food inside the hotel resturant was exceptional. The park and accomodations were great especially the rides.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding you recent stay at our hotel. I am happy to learn that our staff was welcoming, and enjoyed the food that was served at Amber Waves. We hope to have you back soon.  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We drove to San Diego for a wedding and decided to go to Knotts Berry Farm on our way back up after the wedding.  We only stayed here for one night so our impression is based on that.  The hotel isn't really in the park itself, but it is a very close.  Overall, we didn't have any problems with our stay.  The biggest issue we had was that there was only one plug (except for what was in the bathroom area) available to use.  For us, that was a major inconvenience because our family had 2 cell phones and 3 tablet devices between the three of us.  I ended up plugging my phone into the outlet in the bathroom.

The hotel was not fancy but it was clean, comfortable and quaint. I have nothing negative to say about the hotel or staff. We asked very little from the staff but when we did, they exceeded our expectations. We enjoyed our stay and will be returning. Very close to Disneyland, too. Excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your hotel stay with us. I am very happy to learn that our staff exceeded your expectations, as we do our best to provide the best customer service for each and every guest. We hope to see you back soon!  Michael Raskin - Guest Services Team Leader

Summary: We had never been to KBF before so we got the same kind of package most people do. It was a combination of room rate and tickets to the park. We stayed for two nights and no one got a good night of sleep. Our bed seemed to be made of stone. Remember how Wreck It Ralph had to sleep on bricks? That is exactly what this felt like. I contemplated sleeping on the floor since it might have been softer. We had to pay extra for a fridge, but at least they offered that. the front desk was generally pleasant and helpful. We also left an item behind which they sent back to us, so that was very nice. The shower had great water pressure, so that was relaxing after a long day.
Manager Response: While I am pleased to learn that the service was positive, it never nice to read a review that suggests that the stay was anything less than perfect. It is also great to learn about the convenience that you experienced with our lost and found department. I am pleased to inform you that we have upgrade many of the mattresses throughout the hotel that were known to be causing trouble for our guests. I assure you that a future stay will definitely show you our dedication to the comfort of our guests. Thank you again for your business and we hope to see you again soon!  Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: This is our 3rd year staying at the Knott's Berry Farm Hotel.   We did the Ultimate Package that includes the single park pass, room, parking and free breakfast.  Also, we got 20% off at the Amber Waves restaurant.  The hotel pool is awesome.  A large pool and a nice hot tub.  My daughter seemed to never want to come out of the pool.  Easy access to the park is very convenient since it's only a 5 minute walk to the entrance.  The hotel staff is very helpful and attentive.  This is a no brainer for staying in Buena Park.  Can't wait to go back.

nice rooms, snoopy came to room and tucked my son in, and got kids eat free at hotel! Free food was a full meal not something small, Snoopy is always around during breakfast or dinner. Will stay again in future, other hotels in area are not as nice, and it's a 5 min walk to the park. And we got into park early for staying at hotel

You just can’t beat the hotel/park package.  You get the room, parking, tickets to the park and breakfast for less than what we would have paid for entry into other parks.  The room was large and clean (the bathroom was a bit dated, but everything worked well).  The breakfast buffet was fresh and yummy and Snoopy was in the dining room for pictures.  Our day in the park was a blast!  Wait times for rides can be an hour or more in the afternoon, so I highly recommend purchasing a “Fast Lane” pass if you want to bypass the wait times.  For a party of 4, we paid $45/person for the Fast Lane and it was worth every cent!  We walked onto almost every ride on the Fast Pass list (which is all of the most popular rides). We finished off the day with a dinner of Mrs. Knott’s fried

I stayed at this resort in january of 2014 and loved it as apart of G'day USA trip, the hotel was lovely and clean, rooms were cleaned daily. The location was a big bonus close to everything and close to Knotts Berry Farm an easily 5 minute walk. we have a view from our room of most knots berry farm. we were able to go to knots berry farm, disneyland, old san diego town, and universal studios. breakfast and dinner were wonderful. if anyone would like anymore info on this resort don't hesitate to message me

Summary Heading: Great location to Knott's Berry Farm park
Summary: Overall, our stay at Knott's Berry Farm. Hotel was very nice, not having to worry about parking and could basically just walk a short distance to the park was very convenient.  We did have two things that completely happy about during our stay. We stayed in a "ADA accessible room" well described as, it was not. The hotel needs to update these rooms and possibly all the others. The toilet needs to be raised, and the tub needs to be a walk-in or roll-in shower. The other problem we had which isn't completely the hotel's fault: a bus driver parked his bus blocking the handicap ramp and after informing him of this he closed the door and did not move the bus. My husband with assistance, managed. So overall, the hotel is very nice and convenient.

The front desk staff was the best.  When we arrived we received a friendly greeting and they quickly checked us in and took care of getting our vouchers for tickets and breakfast.  When we entered the room, we immediately noticed how clean it was, how quiet, and comfortable it was.  Had great night sleep - very comfortable bed.  Had the breakfast buffet - highly recommended.  Quality food, and great service.  After a great night sleep and a great breakfast, headed to the park - a very easy walk.  Staying here makes life very simple when going to Knott's Berry Farm.

We book a trip in conjunction with our 2 year old daughter's birthday and were so impressed with this hotel. At check in the staff was warm and friendly , with one of the staff commenting on my daughter . I mentioned it was her birthday weekend and she promptly made a great birthday button for her and made a big deal about it . The  Camp Snoopy room  experience was wonderful , my daughters loved the stuffed toys and adored Snoopy tucking them in ,  and the Breakfast in the morning capped the visit off perfectly ! We will be back soon to "Noopy's House" as my 2 year old dubbed the Resort !!!

Knotts berry farm resort hotel was fabulous the staff were helpful and very friendly. The virgin holidays staff were brilliant at recommending trips and tours and were great when I had to cancel a tour too. The resort area was very safe and as a single traveller was never concerned for my safety. Be prepared for L.A. To be very spread out it is about an hours drive to Hollywood but air conditioning in every vehicle helps! I can't recommend more than to stay at Knotts berry farm with virgin holidays as everything ran so smoothly even connecting at heathrow from Edinburgh

Summary Heading: The best hotel we've ever stayed at!!
Summary: Let me start by saying the people at the Knott's Hotel are the best!! we have stayed at many hotels in many places across thecountry and  this hotel overall is the best!! if you have the chance we recommend The Knott's Hotel  the Addis's

Went here with family, they are very friendly and Snoopy comes out once in awhile to take pictures with the kids!  The breakfast was plentiful, and the rooms were nice!  Can't complain.  Easy walk to the amusement park.

The staff was awesome and it made it nice that the hotel was convient to the park. Parking was free which was nice. Breakfast was included with our package and it made it nice that there was a restaurant on site, if for some reason you didn't want to eat at the hotel there were lots of options nearby.

Summary Heading: wonderful stay and continue to recommend
Summary: I was solo for this trip and found that my stay was awesome from time of check in to check out. I am handicapped and staff was so attentive. I typically do not travel alone but found that I was felt safe the entire stay. The park, food, and shopping was exceptional! I even had picture taken with Snoopy (Im a grandma:)). Would recommend to everyone, the pool was very nice. The young man who checked me in Micheal? was wonderful very very helpful and kind!

Summary Heading: We liked out stay and would go back
Summary: It was such and easy experience stay at the hotel and right outside the park. Convenient and the breakfast was a full breakfast not continental like other hotels. Big drawback was not microwave in the room with 4 kids you kind of need that. The park wasent to packed and overall nice time,

Summary Heading: Packaged Deals Are the Way to GO!
Summary: I took advantage of the hassle-free one day packaged deal that accommodated four people. It covered the room with two queen sized beds, four theme park tickets to Knott's Berry Farm, dinner for 4 and breakfast brunch for 4 as well as free parking. You can't beat this! The park is just a hop, skip and a dance away...within walking distance. And the best thing is my granddaughter who is 6 years old she loved that Snoopy was everywhere to take photos with. So Snoopy is not elusive, he's there for our kids.Time and money well spent! Staff also very helpful and polite! Don't forget to take advantage of your emails too that Knott's sends you. You get an additional 15% off the packaged deal!

We had a wonderful time. The staff was awesome. The pool was the best and the theme park rocks. I would only be aware of the buffet meal since they run out of food and still continue selling the tickets.

Rooms are dated and need attention. Walls are very thin and you can hear just about everything coming from the next room.  Water pressure in the shower is very poor.  Do not get a room by the elevators, you hear the associated noises constantly; day and night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and for taking the time to complete a review. I am pleased to inform you that we are and have been conducting a hotel wide upgrade that will enhance several amenities in the public areas as well as our guest rooms. Should you find yourself returning to our area please reference this experience so that our agents can be sure to preassign your room away from any and all service areas. Thank you again for your review and we will forward to your future stay. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: Great value great time and great memories! We got the 1day ticket package and was such good price! 5 tickets and the room for $100 less then I would pay for one day at Disneyland! The rides are perfect for my kids and the hotel is so close we love to take a break and get the Knotts famous fried chicken and relax in the room. The hotel is a little older but the room I stayed in was just renovated and it was really nice! The only thing I can complain about is the roll away bed was a little sqeaky but other than that it was great. We'll definitely be back for Knotts Scary farm!

I was a bit spectacle when I saw some of the negative reviews but my kids love Snoopy so we tried it.  Let me tell you they exceeded every expectation.  The lobby is newly removed and is very nice.  There were plenty of front desk staff and they we all very, very nice and got us checked in quickly.  We opted for a Camp Snoopy room and were surprised the hall had its own door and was sequestered from the rest of the hotel which was great.  The room was a little small but nothing that was crowded or uncomfortable ever with two double beds and a crib.  The decor was great and seemed very up to date with comfortable mattresses.  The Snoopy tuck in every night was incredible with great interactions with my kids and us.  One night the kids had already fallen asleep but Snoopy still

Summary Heading: First choice of hotels in the area
Summary: We have been staying at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel during our trips to Buena Park for several years. The proximity to Knott's Berry Farm and Soak City is very convenient, and we always have excellent service. We always get the room and ticket package. Thank you for making our annual vacations hassle free!

We loved our stay here!! There were four of us. Two adults and two kids. We chose a basic connecting room. We ask for a room that we could see the fireworks and we could. The room was very clean ,basic decor but super comfy beds. And I'm kind of a bed snob. The service was excellent!! From check in to check out we could not believe how great everyone was. At check in they gave each of the girls a Snoopy so fun. You could also get a fridge for $20. The on site restaurant was very good. We ate breakfast, which was included, and a dinner. The dinner price was very responsible. Breakfast was hot meal selections. Serve once again , excellent. When we needed thing it came very quickly to the room. The pool is nice, huge spa and the kid area was good. Only draw back was the kid fun

Great Service, Great Location, Great Rooms, at a  GREAT PRICE!!  We bought the package deal that included Dinner, Breakfast , Tickets  to Knotts Berry Farm and of course the Hotel. It was a bargain compared to Disneyland.  They had Snoopy in the lobby at night for the kids to take pictures with. The staff was friendly at check in and the rooms were very nice. The only complaint that I have the free dinner was included but they made us pay for our drinks. They should tell people that the drinks are not included, other than that it was AWESOME.  You can walk to the park and the parking was FREE. It was my son's Birthday and they brought him a Free Brownie and Ice Cream to the Room. He was so excited about that!!

We have stayed here twice and will be staying again.  Clean quiet comfortable.  We have yearly passes to KBF which gives us a discount at the hotel our last visit cost $100 for the room and breakfast for two, parking is included and they gave me 20% off dinner at the restaurant, this is a great bargain.  Amber waves is a great restaurant the food is very good and the service was great both times.  The best thing about the hotel and KBF is the attitude of the staff they were all wonderful.

Great hotel. Very convient to the park. I went back to my room in the afternoon, rested, then went back to the park.  If you want to feel like saving money check out the packages that include the restaurant and the park.

Nothing super fancy, but if you are staying here it's because it's at Knott's!   Pool, hot tub, small gym, free parking, but you do pay a higher price because of the location. If you are traveling with kids, it's probably the best way to go since you won't have to drive to the park.  It's also only about 15 minutes away from Disneyland.

Stayed at this hotel for 5 nights recently with wife and 2 daughters aged 12 & 10. Having done our research we knew that parking would be $4 per day as was the refrigerator, so no issues what so ever there. A cheap alternative is to buy a polystryene cool box from Walmart and top up with ice - ours cost $5 and held at least 12-16 bottles/cans. Also good for taking pool side. When you take into consideration the fantastic discounts you can get for Knottsberry & Soak city, this hotel represents great value for money. The 4 of us saved close to $120 off the entry prices. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the hotel projects a safe environment for guests. Safety deposit boxes in the room are also free. The clean and large swimming pool was open to 11.00pm, a real bonus when

One night stay after arrive from night flight from hawaii. Only $200 All four park tickets ,parking and room was unbelievable. Dinner was yammy Early check in help us a lot Taking picture with snoopy was special All Sweet staff, warm service  Excellent package price  We love all😊💖💐✨👍😘 Thank you so much

Stayed here on a coach tour on way to Grand Canyon and Vegas.  Hotel reception was in the process of being renovated, but did not bother us.  Room was good, staff helpful and buffet breakfasts good value.  Went out for a walk and found the roads around the surrounding area difficult to cross as very busy.

Summary Heading: I have stayed here numerous times and it is always great!
Summary: Each year the Fabulous Fords Forever show across the street brings thousands to the area. This hotel is always recommended and it always comes through!And it is right next to the Knott's Berry Farm entrance, with shopping along the way and a bakery and restaurants.

Summary Heading: Lovely Stay at Knott's Berry Farm Hotel
Summary: The true delight of this hotel is to come back from Knott's Berry Farm and find Snoopy in the hotel lobby.  My daughter was enchanted.    Our room was adequate, the staff always helpful and pleasant, and everything was clean and nice.  We had a good price for the room, so did not expect to get a free breakfast as well.  There was a choice of breakfast buffet or items from the menu, so we did very well.  There are also many restaurants within walking distance.  We didn't use the pool because we were always at the park, but it looked nice.  Being able to walk to Knott's Berry Farm makes this hotel a great choice for families.  There is also a fairly large mall within easy walking distance of the hotel (with a Walmart and Sears), and a pharmacy sort of opposite the hotel parking

Got the Classic package via their website which included room, parking, free breakfast buffet and "kids eat free" at their Amber Wave restaurant.  Quick walk to Knotts Berry Farms so we could easily leave the park and relax a little during the day.  Parking was difficult--had to hope and pray you find one, even though you have to pay for it.  We lucked out two out of our three days and got one as close to the lobby as possible.  Friendly staff, quick to fix any issues you have.  If you plan on doing laundry, go early!! They open at 8am and it was packed.  Good stay, would stay again if we were going to Knotts.

We loved the close proximity to Knotts Berry farm, and the shuttle to Disneyland was a nice bonus too.  We had small children with us, and they loved the pool, and it was nice to have restraunts close by, we didn't have to drive anywhere once we checked in, we stayed for 3 days.

First the hotel will fail to tell u that u can not check in til 4pm.  The parking is not included in the price u will be charge the next day for that 7.00. The beds are hard as heck.  There is a wire like cable around the mattress.  No fridge in the room. No microwave.  No free breakfast or coffee in the morning.  Had to drive to get that.  The only good thing I can say about it is it was nice to be close to the park if u needed a relax midday.
Manager Response: While I appreciate you taking the time to write a review, I am very frustrated to learn of the overall quality of your experience. For future reference, the parking charge and guaranteed check-in at 4pm are listed on our confirmation emails as well as on the website and we do have complimentary coffee throughout the property. You are also able to purchase an all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet voucher at a discounted price through our Front Desk. The mattresses in many rooms have since been replaced although I was not familiar with the wire concern you referenced. With that being said, I thank you for your business and apologize for what was clearly not a positive experience. I hope that we have an opportunity to earn your loyalty in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great pool area, fun for kids!
Summary: We stayed just one night for a trip to Knott's Berry Farm. It's not a fancy hotel, but perfect for a short stay with kids. The best amenities are the pool with a water play area and the attached restaurant. I'm all about convenience, so the free breakfast and kids eat free dinner that came with our package was great.  Breakfast was a bit cold when we got there - the chafing dishes need to be warmer. The rooms are just fine - ours was a decent size although it did not have a microwave, which would have been nice as we brought popcorn for the kids. Wifi in the room is another amenity I appreciated.  It was great to stay so close to the park - just a short walk out the doors and through the parking lot, The staff was very friendly and attentive in both the hotel and the restaurant.

We stayed here for 3 nights the room was very small on the 4th floor, but it was nice and clean.  Our room had no refrigerator, but it did have a coffee maker.  The buffet was alright but the eggs were cool and the bacon was very salty.

Summary Heading: I loved the snoopy themed rooms and the short walk from the park and marketplace.
Summary: The snoopy themed rooms are so cute and snoopy comes to tuck the kids into bed if you stay in a snoopy room. Knotts Berry Farm is a short walk from hotel. The marketplace is right outaide of Knotts also. There are many restaurants near the hotel and there is a Walgreens at the corner of the street. The only thing I didn't like  was that the rooms were kinda small.

We stayed here for 3 nights and had a very nice room with 2 huge beds on the 7th floor. The hotel is huge and gas 2 theme parks nearby. The room was very clean and comfortable. It is a bit in the middle of nowhere but shops and restaurants were within 1.2 walking miles. We didn't eat in the attached restaurant but some of our party did and did not enjoy it. The swimming pool and hot tub were nice and the grounds well kept. There is a shopping outlet 1.2 miles away ... Which if you like shopping is worth a look.

Summary Heading: Family Day at Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: Our family had a wonderful time at the park.  Everything was clean and attactive.  There were some rides not operating on the day that we were there, so the children were somewhat disappointed.  Overall, a very enjoyable time was had.  We also stayed at the hotel and the rooms were very nice.  The hotel was just finishing some remodeling, but the staff made sure that the checkin and checkout process was very easy.  Would definitely stay there again.

We checked in for 2 nights at this Hotel, the staff were helpful and friendly, we were shown to a nice room, the Coffee Tray was very basic and as my Hubby only drinks Tea I went down to the Bar and ask if we could have some Tea, they were not able to meet my request, they only had Earl Gray Tea and as there was no kettle in the room it was a waste of time.but Americans only seem to drink coffee so that probably explains the lack of tea facilities.  The swimming pool was really nice and very clean, there was some work going on in the main reception but it seemed to be handles very well and not disrupt any of the facilities. We decided to take a walk to the local Wal-Mart Store but crossing the big roads is a hazard we took our life into our hands and tried to run across very
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and completing a review about your experience. I apologize for the lack of tea option and for the restaurant staff not offering to have the tea brewed for you. I was very pleased to learn that your overall experience was positive. Please come see us again if your travels have you staying in our area in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed for 2 night. We had the room of 2 queen size bed. Room was clean and spacious. Bed was comfy. Toilet was clean and adequate. Nothing posh. Hotel was big tho and had alot of aminites like gym, pool, etc. The receiption was having a renovation and check in was at the side of the restaurant. Some upgrading arnd the premises but was handled very well by the friendly staffs. Check in was abreeze. The theme park is a must go. Pls avoid weekends as it would be swarming with students. Theres a fried chicken restaurant outside of the theme park which was delicious. A must try! A good 5-8 mins from hotel is a 24hrs walgreen  mart that would be very helpful if u ever need anything.

I don't recall being told about the parking fee, so that was a surprise when we checked out.  They are renovating the lobby so there were workers all over and a makeshift check-in but signs were posted to notify you were to go.  Our room was very nice and the beds pretty comfortable, parking was ample we always got a close spot to were we wanted to be.  It was a great walk to Knotts Berry and very close to medieval times, those were the only places we went while there.  My husband forgot swim trunks, there was a Walmart very close, as well as great places to eat.  The hotel does have a very nice restaurant, it would have been nice for kids to eat free, the breakfast buffet was good.  The only issue we had was a slow drain in the shower, we made them aware so hopefully that is

I was a little concerned about staying at the Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel because of some of the reviews, but we thought we would give it a chance.  The staff are super friendly, the rooms are clean, location is awesome, value for the money was great.  We will definitely be going back.  If you stay at the hotel you get reduced park tickets and the ability to just walk to the amusement park was the best part of it all.  If you are looking for a great family getaway I say it is well worth it.  Kids had a blast and so did we.

I booked our quick vacation at Knott's because the price was so reasonable for our family of four and we were very pleased with the quality of the hotel and the awesome rides in the park. We had a blast!

The value for your money totally worth it. practically the ticket for Knotts Berry Farm it's free. El valor por lo que pague totalmente lo vale. Las entradas a Knotts Berry Farm son prácticamente gratis

I was expecting something way nicer. They were renovating, and I wasn't told that on the phone, during the reservation process. It was close to the park which was nice, but the bathroom had mold in the cracks, and the room smelled like mildew. It had no fridge and asked for 20 extra for one. This hotel was more like a motel. The gift shop gentleman was wonderful and helpful, and the room service food was really good. I may try it again if they renovate the rooms and bathrooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to complete a detailed review. While I apologize for the renovation and lack of communication I assure you the changes are absolutely beautiful. I would love an opportunity to host your family again so that you can experience our property when we are operating at our full capability. Thank you again for staying and we hope to see you in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: The Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.  In addition, they were professional in performing their duties.  Check in process, although lobby under construction, was very easy.  Rooms were bright, clean and contained terrific amenities.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay with kids!
Summary: I took my 4 and 5-year-old grandchildren to Knott's Berry Farm and we stayed at the KBF. All of the staff was very friendly and helpful. The kids loved the pool and the visit from Snoopy during dinner. The park is close enough that we walked over in just a few minutes. So convenient! I would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Clean and Well Kept
Summary: The staff at the front desk was great, checked me in within minutes.  The hotel property was clean, and everything was well maintained.  Staff members that I encountered while I was there were very friendly.  The rooms were also well kept up and up to date.  Free parking is always a plus. Everything about my experience was positive.  I will be back to this location.

The package deal was a great value, 2 nights and park tickets for a family of 4 for just over $300. Yes, there was construction going on, but a few sheets of plastic here and there did not bother us at all. We thought is was great that they are continuing to improve the facilities. The only problem we had was a very loud family in the adjoining room. After going out for dinner and some shopping we came back to the room to find the yelling and laughter were still going on. The very friendly staff were happy to move us to another room, and even went out of their way to find a room without neighbors.  The rooms were clean, nice interior corridors and nice views from the upper level rooms. The only thing we could ask for would be refrigerators included (they are offered for an

We had a fantastic stay at this hotel.  Yes there was some construction going on, but it wasn't in the way of anything.  Very convenient to the park.  In our package we had breakfast for 5 included and theme park tickets for 1 day for the 5 of us.  The room was a family room and was comfortable and big.  The pool area was great.  The staff were excellent - very friendly and helpful.  Snoopy hung out in the lobby.  If I were to return I would definitely stay at this hotel.  Thanks for making our first 2 nights in the States a good one.

Summary Heading: Should have been told about construction
Summary: I'm feeling quite irritated at Alaska Airlines Vacations--I got one of their package deals, which included hotel, and I selected this one because of the free shuttle to Disneyland. The least Alaska could have done, or the hotel, was to inform me that the place is nothing but plastic sheeting, dust, and confusion. Saws whining all day, and construction workers stomping through with massive pieces of lumber and sheetrock. Come on! My daughter and grandson were up all night coughing, which I know was from the dust.  The "front desk" was a couple of folding tables set up in the lobby and while the folks there were helpful, it was hard to get to them through the sea of cheerleaders (apparently some kind of huge competition nearby).  The pool area was nice, especially the spraying
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to complete a review of our property. I can completely understand where your frustration is stemming from if you were not informed prior to your arrival. I assure you that this information was communicated for all internal bookings as well as being advertised on our website throughout the entire lobby renovation. With that being said the third party company that you booked with clearly did not inform you and for that I apologize. I am happy to see that some elements of your experience were positive and I assure you the changes made to the lobby are absolutely beautiful. I hope that you and your family have a chance to return to our property so that we can be provide you with the positive experience you should have received on your first visit. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: This is the best deal around, lovely hotel, clean, decent, amazingly friendly and accommodating staff and right on the Knotts Berry Farm property.  You can't beat it.  Other theme parks should take notice... you don't need to be ridiculously overpriced.  I highly recommend this hotel, and Knotts Berry Farm itself.  They are jewels!

We stayed here a few years ago and had a great time. Our son was only 3 at the time, but he loved our Snoopy themed room. The free snoopy plush toy was super nice!The room was average and had been well worn, but the price was great for staying at a resort hotel that was connected to the park. We couldn't have been happier! There is such a great selection of food to eat and places to explore, we are already planning another trip soon!

We really had a lot of fun ,with our grand kids . The park is within walking distance, which was really nice. Dinner at the chicken restruant was yummy. The shops are very cute in displaying there merchandise . Difinetly will be going back.

We stayed here for the Fabulous Fords Forever Car Show, which  we had our car in. We have stayed @ Knotts Berry Farm Hotel in the past for other car shows. We live in Santa Barbara County, so to far to drive the car so we trailered it down. Knotts Hotel has plenty of parking for trailers so was perfect. Room was great and we received the perfect location we had requested. Front desk personnel where great & found all the other employees friendly,helpful & interested in the Car show as well.  Only problem was the very very slow service @ the Amber Waves Restaurant. The bus boy had to give us coffee after I got up to ask for it. & Then he had to try and take our order. No waitresses??? Over all we had a wonderful stay and enjoyed our time @ Knotts and the Car Show. Sy db

We stayed for one night for $250 on Friday May 2, 2014. The package included dinner for 2 from a select menu (limited, but decent selections) and breakfast buffet for 2 at Amber Wave, which is located in the hotel lobby. It also came with 2 tickets to Knott's Berry Farm. The park entrance is a short walk away. Even though we checked out on Saturday, we were allowed to keep our vehicle parked on the hotel lot while we went to Knott's (just need to be gone by midnight). If you are staying at the hotel there is no charge for parking. The pool was nice. Also had had a fair fitness center with weights, cardio machines, sauna and steam room (water and towels provided). The issue we had was that none of the Coca-Cola machines were stocked. There is a gift shop you can by refreshments

You could not be closer to Knott's Berry Farm.  Lobby was under construction.  The room could use more electrical outlets.  I would have liked a small fridge in the room as well.  We didn't spend much time in the room though and we were just there overnight but I really liked that I could keep my car in the parking lot while we spent the whole day at Knott's.

We had such a great time.  Snoopy hangs out In the lobby and My son loved every second of it.  Very friendly staff and will go out of their way to help you out. Can't wait to plan our next trip.  We have stayed many times before and love going around the Christmas holidays.  The lobby is decorated beautifully for the holidays.

We came to Knotts after 4 nights in LA. The kids felt at home straight away and staff were  very welcoming. We loved Amber Waves restaurant and ate there 4 nights of our 9 night stay. Rooms were spacious and clean and everyone we met just seemed happy and relaxed. LOVED Knotts Park  and took advantage of free shuttle to Disney with a range of departure and pick up options.We could see Disney fireworks from hotel window. Snoopy was around quite a bit which my son's loved. Have raved about this hotel on return to UK and we will be back in a couple of years.

We had a great experience. The hotel was clean, staff friendly and professional. We had a suite and a connecting room, 8 people and it was fantastic. I would highly recommend this hotel and will stay again.

Stayed 5 night in this hotel. My first impression of this hotel is that it is really old and in need of major renovation.  The bad: 1. The lobby is really unimpressive.  2. Customer service is possibly the worst we ever got from a resort hotel. We are given a queen bed even though we requested for a king sized bed. We ask to stay at least a night in a bigger room. Manager said it is not available even for a night which is weird coz im sure not many people when we checked in. So,  3. we really dont have good experience inside the room. It is way at the corner near emergency exit, bed is small, i really hate hotel that is being fixed with pre-made toilet and this is one of them (weird for 3.5 star hotel). Room termostat does not work as well.  The good: 1. Very convenient to go
Manager Response: Thank you for completing a review of our property. While this review shows a disappointing stay I greatly appreciate you highlighting the positives as well. I am pleased to inform you that since your stay our lobby has been completely redone and it is very impressive. I am not sure what the situation was surrounding the wrong room type and poor service but obviously those are not things that we take lightly. I apologize for this experience and hope that you give us an opportunity to earn back your trust should you find yourself returning to our area in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: Location was very convenient.  The oversized rooms and beds were well worth the money.  The towels had hair on them before we used them and their were hairs in the shower before we used it.  This is a small detail but I think that it is a simple fix for housekeeping.  I found some bottle caps and can tops on the pool deck which could have led to an injury but luckily no one had stepped on them.  Bottom line - we would stay here again if visiting the park.

My wife and I and our daughter stayed there towards the end of April. The staff were very professional and very helpful. Excellent hotel service! The rooms were ok and nothing more. If you're looking for luxury, look elsewhere. The room walls are very thin and you can hear your next door neighbor(s). I've slept in better beds, but if you like your beds on the more firm side, hey...enjoy! The elevators are a huge problem. Always people coming and going and it's tough to get onto one the first time around. The ice makers don't make a lot of ice, but I'm sure that's because some clown and his/her family decided to fill up their coolers. As far as the hotel restaurant.....poor service. We had to wait for about 20 minutes to be seated and there were SEVERAL clean tables that were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed review of our property. I greatly appreciate you going through each element of your stay as it gives our management an objective guest view of the property. With that being said the service in the restaurant is what I took away as something that is in our immediate control and I assure you this has been addressed since your visit. We have also upgraded our ice machines to restaurant grade on most floors and have added several mattress varieties as well. We expect a total room refresh within the next year and look forward to many upgrades to enhance the guest experience. We hope that you reconsider and give us another opportunity to reshape your opinions of our property. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: Our stay at Knott's was great, the staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was nice for the price wish they had mini refrigerator in Room, would have been nice with children . Beds where ok clean and comfortable. Bathroom dated, good for short stay.  The kids loved meeting Snoopy in the lobby and Amber waves restaurant. Close to park very short walk, was easy and convenient. The kids had a blast at Knott's, camp Snoopy is always a favorite and older grandson loved roller coasters. Have a nice little shop at hotel that was great for last minute items.

Took our first family vacation to Knotts Berry Farm and decided to go all out and rent a Camp Snoopy room. The decor was adorable and not overwhelming. Check in was easy, not too long of a wait, and the staff was friendly and helpful. It's a quick 5 minute walk to the park.  Our room was overlooking the pool (which looked fun, but we didn't get to stop in), but our room could hear the fun everyone else was having until about 10-11pm (whenever the pool closed).  We ate in the hotel restaurant the first night for dinner, and while the food was decent, the service was terrible. Not sure if our server was having a bad night, but we got help from everyone besides her. From our drink refills, to getting us bread, she wasn't around until it was time for the check and even then she

Summary Heading: Great value. Close to all Anaheim activities.
Summary: Stephen & Albert were great at front desk! Didn't get a chance to use the pool, but it looked nice & clean. Rooms are comfortable & clean. Bathroom look a bit dated, but everything worked OK. We'd stay here again.

The room was nice and clean. Took advantage of the breakfast buffet both mornings and was very pleasantly surprised! The staff was very nice and pleasant.  The pool was clean. Overall very happy with my stay!  I will be back for sure!!! Thank you!

After reading other reviews we were a bit wary, but following a 4 hour delayed flight the reception staff couldn't have been more helpful when we arrived at the hotel at 10pm.  They checked us in promptly, assisted us with maps for driving to Universal and advised us of the shuttle bus to Disneyland (which we didn't use in the end).  We were given a discount voucher for the Amber Wave Restaurant for 20% off lunch or evening meals and a kids eat free voucher for breakfast.  We had a breakfast at the Restaurant which was very nice and not too expensive compared to other places and also an evening meal there too.  The pool area was very clean and well kept, they also provided clean towels at the poolside.  There was ample parking and we only had to pay a small one off charge.  The

My children and I had a great visit!  We opted for the Camp Snoopy Bed and Breakfast package.  My children absolutely loved that Snoopy came to tuck them in at night!  Breakfast was excellent with a good variety of hot and cold options.  The room was clean and comfortable and the swimming pool/spa/play area was a favorite place to relax after the park.  The gym and sauna were also nice.  All of the employees were fantastic: polite, pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable.  The Hotel Shuttle was convenient and pleasant, as well.  The very short walk to the park was nice and the park itself was lots of fun, with rides for all ages.

We've been to Knotts Berry Farm a million times but had never stayed at their hotel until this last visit.  It was perfect. We will be staying here from now on!  The price was affordable. The rooms are spacious and clean. The Resturant was clean with friendly staff and great food.  The pool was comfortable. And not even a 5 minute walk to Knotts.

I was orginally going to stay at a Holiday Inn a few blocks away, because it's typically our choice hotel. We were pleasantly surprised to find out that Knotts hotel is the same price, it's beautiful, walking distance to the park, and my favorite...has a lovely water play feature at their pool that the kids loved! Their rooms are very clean, they have good customer service, and their restaurant is fair. That's where I would suggest some improvement. Their food could be better tasting, but the customer service is impeccable. I will definitely stay here again! Plus if you have AAA they have special rates.

We arrived too early for check-in but were allowed to park our vehicle and pass the time at the theme park.  We conveniently received a text message when our room was ready, which was still two hours earlier than posted check-in time.  Michael at the front desk was professional, timely and courteous.  The hotel is adjacent to the park and is accessible within a few minutes walk.  The room was spacious and clean.  The pool/water play area is an added treat for the kids!  My only complaint is regarding my room service order which arrived 40 minutes after the quoted delivery time. It finally arrived just as I was ready to cancel.  Being that we were really hungry, we decided to keep the order anyway.  All in all, this is a great place to stay.

Been a few years since we stayed here for our trips to Knotts Berry Farm. While this is nice and close to the park walking distance. The hotel is somewhat lax luster in the wow catagory and such. just an avg hotel with some characters that sometimes visit the kids. has a gift shop and a resturant on site for meals, and a pool. the room was avg and had two queens beds that were comfortable, and you could add laydowns for a small fee if you need more sleeping beds. The hotel itself could use some renovations and such to brighting up the surroundings. If it just sleeping arrangments you need, then this fits the bill. I would have hoped for a little better front staff and not just someone at the desk there for a JOB.

The hotel was clean, we used the free parking, hotel employees were very helpful. The short walked let us have fun at the park, come back to hotel to rest, and then go back to park. The room was nice and clean (beds were a bit hard); yes, the bathroom tub could use a bit more cleaning and service but overall great room for the price. Seeing Snoopy around the hotel was so fun! He interacted with the adults and kids. The gentleman who ran the gift shop also very friendly. We did have breakfast at the Amber Waves, don't think we'd do that again; waitress seemed very bothered by us and food was just okay. But overall, a great experience!

Beautiful clean hotel, lots of things to do in the area, free parking, helpful employees, very reasonable rates...lots of kids in the hotel because it's on an amusement park but it wasn't a problem for us.

Summary Heading: Convenient location for our visit to Knott's.
Summary: We were unaware the hotel was going under renovations (painting of lobby) during our visit. Upon arrival in the lobby we a pungent, unpleasant odor. We couldn't tell if it was from the paint or???? Luckily our room did not have that same odor. Our room was not quite ready so we walked to Knott's for a bit. The hotel is in a very convenient location and is very accessible to both Soak City and Knott's Berry Farm. We got a text letting us know that our room was ready. How convenient! Our room was pretty clean and roomy. We had the oversized 2 queen room. The rollaway bed fit nicely and there was ample room for our family of 5. Bathroom could use some updating, but other than that it served our needs fine. Visited the pool area. Nice pool and play area for kids. Plenty of lounge

Summary Heading: Camp Snoopy Room: Excellent Experience for Kids
Summary: We have stayed here a few times, but this time I decided to rent a Camp Snoopy room for the kids. Snoopy comes around to tuck the kids in at night. Make sure you are there between the times listed and do not have your Do Not Disturb on your door or he will not knock.  The rooms have cut-outs of Snoopy/Woodstock all over the room and the headboards are cut-outs of Snoopy sleeping on his doghouse. The room was clean, beds comfortable and the normal amenities are provided (soap, shampoo, coffee, etc...)  If your room is not ready, they check you in (sans keys) and will text you when your room in ready so you can go get your keys. They also have different times when Snoopy is in the lobby to greet guests.

Excellent experience - customer service is EXCEPTIONAL. Snoopy makes frequent rounds in the lobby. Rooms are very clean and comfortable. Can't get any closer to Knott's Berry Farm than the hotel. We walked from the hotel to the park!! Lots of places to eat and see within walking distance of the hotel. We will definitely be back.

We stayed 2 nights in Camp Snoopy's room.  The rooms are cute, could use more decorations.  Bathrooms are plain and need updating.  Shower head is old and needs a good cleaning.  Top of shower was full of dirt.  Needs a thorough cleaning!  Beds are very hard and pillows are lumpy and very uncomfortable.  Was nice to have Snoopy come to room but the visit was so short that he didn't tuck in boys for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am extremely disappointed in the cleanliness of your restroom during your stay back in March. I have shared your experience with our Housekeeping team in an effort to correct this problem moving forward. Since your last visit we are conducting Management inspections of guest rooms each day to ensure we are providing a high quality experience to our guests. I feel confident that these corrective measures are helping us grow closer to our goals of 100% guest satisfaction. I hope that we have an opportunity to host your family again in the future so that we may have an opportunity to earn back your trust. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Only PlaceYou Should Stay for a Knott's Vacation
Summary: Everyone at the hotel went out of their way to give us a great family stay.  Snoopy was in the lobby.  We got out tickets to Knott's Berry Farm at the front desk.  It was a 4 minute walk to the park entrance and we went right to the gate without going to the ticket booth.  The rooms were both quiet and comfortable.

This was a wonderful hotel.  We booked the oversized two queen room, it was so big, a suite actually.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable.  The wetbar was nice, the bathroom was nice.  We really enjoyed the pool and spa.  The front desk was friendly.  The food in their restaurant was delicious (although the service wasn't that great...no biggie though).  Free coffee in the bar area in the morning.  Everything was wonderful.  I can not believe some of the things people complain about on here.  Nit picking about every last detail...I laugh about it now that I see how great this place is.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.  If you think the rooms are to small, pay the extra price for the oversized room.  So very worth it!!

Booked hotel on external website for 5 people 2 adults and 3 kids ( 2 families). Option to get rollaway for 5th person. Called hotel to get rollaway and fridge and was told room too small to get a rollaway (mind you a rollaway was offered for $15). We asked if we could slide small mattress in from home they said too small. Asked if we could upgrade they said yes but only 1 night available (we are staying for 2). They said to call the external site (hotels.com) to cancel. We did and they said its. $155 cancel fee or basically 1 night stay charge. We explained their discrepancies on the website and the manager (Yiiuree ) said one of the patrons can sleep on the floor!!!!! Yes he said that. The second manager (Kevin) said not their fault and kept talking over me yet I couldn't
Manager Response: Please allow me to apologize for what was clearly a frustrating experience when you stayed with us back in March. While they were speaking within their instructed policy, the two managers who you reference in your review do not work for Knott’s and should not reflect the leadership of our property. The rollaway restriction is a legal obligation based on the size of the space you had selected when booking through the third party company you referenced in your review. With that being said I understand how frustrating this must have been and apologize for the misinformation. We value all of our guests whether they book through us or through another provider. Although this was clearly not a positive experience we hope that you are able to stay in our larger room option so that we have an opportunity to earn back your trust in the future. Stephen Ruggiero, Front Office Manager

Summary: I decided to take a trip to Knott's Berry Farm and was delighted to see they had their own hotel. I had gotten a package deal of a 1 night stay, park admission and the breakfast buffet. We got there just before 10am so we could get out park tickets. Around 2pm we were hoping to be able to grab lunch and eat in our room.We headed back to the hotel and asked if we could check-in early(Normal check-in is 4pm). They made some calls on the radio and we were able to get our room early. There were 5 of us and we got the oversize room.
